loans.name: Emelda Salomon's Group

texts.en:
Emelda is 43-years-old and lives in Sangay Daku, Ozamis City,Misamis Occdiental. She is married with 5 adult aged children. 

Emelda has a shop that sells canned goods, soap, toothpaste, noodles, etc. She has had this business for five years. 

She requested a loan of 14,900 to purchase additional goods such as canned goods, soap, toothpaste, noodles and to pay for the wedding expenses of her son. Emelda has been a member of PMPC for five years. In the future, Emelda hopes to save money. 

Emelda is the leader of a two person group.  Although they borrow as a group, each member of the group has their own business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, soap, etc., and pay for the wedding expenses of her son.

location.town: Sangay Daku, Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 47-years-old and lives in Cang-apa, Larena, Siquijor.  She is married with two children.

Editha has a general store to earn a living and has had this business for one year. She earns PHP 2,500.00 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan amounting to PHP 9,000.00 to purchase more stock for her general store.

Editha has been a member of Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative for one year.  In the future, Editha hopes to improve her family and be able to sustain this business.

loans.use: to purchase of more stock for her general store.

loans.name: Francis Mae

texts.en:
Francis Mae is married with 2 children. Francis Mae is 32-years-old and lives in Malaubang, Ozamiz City.

Francis Mae sells used clothes, bags and chorizo to earn a living and has had this business for 2 years. Each month, she earns PHP 2,000 doing this type of work. She has requested a loan for PHP 5,000 to purchase chorizo for her business.

Francis Mae has been a member of PMPC for just this year. In the future, Francis Mae hopes to expand her buying and sell dry goods.

loans.use: to purchase chorizo for her business.

loans.name: Jydyzkan

texts.ru:
Жылдызкан  42 года, не замужем, воспитывает двоих детей. Жылдызкан по специальности – преподаватель и проработав учителем в местной школе в течении 15 лет,  зарекомендовала себя как активный, ответственный и трудолюбивый человек.
	К сожалению, зарплата преподавателя в сельской местности не высока, и в поисках пути обеспечения достойного будущего для своих детей, Жылдызкан решила заняться откормом и перепродажей скота. Начав со стартовой суммы в 5,000 сом (KGS), на сегодняшний день Жылдызкан имеет доход в сумме 5,000 сом раз в два месяца. 
В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Жылдызкан обратилась в компанию «Бай Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. В будущем, она планирует продолжать свой бизнес в животноводстве, который даст возможность Жылдызкан  оплатить высшее образование для своих детей.
texts.en: Jydyzkan is 42 years old, single and is raising two children. Jydyzkan is a teacher and has been working at the local school for the last 15 years. She has a reputation of an energetic, responsible and hardworking person. Unfortunately, a village teacher's salary is not very high and to be able to provide for her children's future Jydyzkan is supplementing her income by raising cattle. She started with a small amount of money, 5000 som (KGS) and now her business yields a profit of 5000 som every two months. In order to further expand her herd Jydyzkan has turned to "Bai Tushum" for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) so that she can purchase more cattle. In the future, she is planning to expand her livestock business so that she can collect enough money to pay for college education for both of her children.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Muniraan's Group

texts.en:
Muniraan has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband who is an embroidery expert. He is very skilful and has been operating his business for many years.

With the loan, he will buy embroider material such as beads, patterns and colored threads in bulk quantity that will allow him to make beautiful looking embroidered clothes and increase his profits.

Muniraan is very supportive. She is a responsible housewife. She also does clothes sewing and embroidery work to financially assist her husband. She receives a good number of orders every month from her community clients and earns reasonably good profits.

She is a mother of 3 daughters and 3 sons. Only 2 of them are able to attend school and get their education. She is a very hopeful that an investment will help her husband improve his business and increase his profits.

She is a regular loan user of Asasah and this is her 2nd loan application. In a previous loan year, she proved herself as a responsible client by paying her installments on time and by attending every meeting.

Note: “In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Muniraan”.

loans.use: to buy embriodery material such as beads, patterns and colored threads.

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar is a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. 

She lives with her brother and 4 children; 3 sons and a daughter. All of her children are enrolled in a local school and are getting their education except for her eldest son who works in a factory. Her brother also works in a factory. 

Kosar has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her sewing business. With the loan, she will buy a new sewing machine because her current machine doesn’t produce quality work. The new machine will help her to finish the orders on time and increase her profits. 

She is very confident that this investment will help her improve her income and enable her family to live a better financial life.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for a sewing business.

loans.name: Zinaida

texts.ru:
Зинаида замужем. Она проживает в небольшом городе Павлоград, где и ведет свой бизнес.

Зинаида имеет свою торговую точку на центральном рынке города.  Она продает мужские свитера и куртки. Зинаида старается постоянно увеличивать ассортимент и привлекать новых покупателей.  Она энергичная и трудолюбивая.  Этот бизнес - единственный источник доходя для ее семьи.

Зинаида просит предоставить кредит в сумме 20,000 гривен на приобретение новых свитеров и курток к зимнему сезону.  Кредит поможет ей расширить бизнес и увеличить доход.
texts.en: Zinaida is married and lives in the small city of Pavlograd, in eastern Ukraine, where she runs her business. She owns a market stall at the central town market where she sells men's clothing, such as sweaters and jackets. Zinadia always tries to expand her inventory in order to attract new clients. She is energetic and hardworking. This business is the sole source of income for her family. Zinaida is hoping to take out a loan of 20,000 grivn in order to purchase new sweaters and jackets for the winter season. The loan will help her expand her business and increase profits.

loans.use: to purchase new winter sweaters and jackets

loans.name: Tasleem's Group

texts.en:
Tasleem is the mother of 2 daughters and a son. All of them are getting their education. She is a seamstress and works very hard to afford the education and living expenses of her family, along with her husband who operates a barber shop in the market. Through his shop he offers hair cutting and beauty services to his clients. Her has been operating his business for the past many years and is an expert in his work.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s business. He will buy scissors, creams and other hair dressing tools to provide better services to his clients. Tasleem is very confident that an investment will help her husband in growing his business further.

Note: “In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Tasleem”.

loans.use: to buy scissors, creams and beauty products for barber shop business

loans.name: Kosar's Group

texts.en:
Kosar is 36 years old, illiterate, and couldn’t get an education due to the poor financial conditions of her parents. In order to financially support her family, she does sewing work. She receives sewing orders from her community clients and earns income by completing them on time.   

She has given birth to a son and 2 daughters. Two of them study while her youngest daughter is only 3 years old. Kosar knows the importance of education and wants her children to get the best quality education and become successful in life.
  
Her husband sells goats and sheep. He buys them from the animal market at their early age, raises them up and sells to butchers for a profit. Kosar provides full support to her husband by taking care of his animals. 
 
She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husband’s business. With the loan, he will buy goats and sheep in larger numbers and then sell them for a profit after raising them up.

loans.use: To buy goats and sheep for animal sales business.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru: Владимир женат. Его супругу зовут Наталья. У них есть маленькая дочка Анастасия, ей 3 годика. Владимир работает менеджером  по продаже автошин. Он много ездит по работе, используя в бизнесе свой личный автомобиль. К сожалению, тот автомобиль, который у него есть сейчас, постоянно требует ремонта. Владимир просит предоставить ему кредит на сумму 8,000 гривен. Это недостающая сумма, которая нужна ему на приобретение новой машины. Покупка новой машины значительно облегчит работу Владимира. Также уменьшаться затраты на бензин, а следовательно, увеличится доход семьи.
texts.en: Vladimir is married. His wife's name is Natalia. They have a young daughter, 3-year-old Anastasia. Vladimir works as a manager at a business selling car tyres. He travels extensively for his job, using his personal car. Unfortunately, the car he owns is constantly in need of repair. Vladimir is asking for a loan of 8,000 UAH. This is the additional sum he needs to purchase a new car. Buying a new car would make Vladimir's work much easier. Also, the amount he spends on fuel for the car will decrease, and so the family's discretionary income will grow.

loans.use: to pay for a new vehicle for his work

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Эльмире 43 года, замужем и имеет шестерых детей. Эльмира – преподаватель биологии и работает в школе г. Нарын уже в течении 19 лет. Будучи целеустремленным и трудолюбивым человеком, Эльмира смогла привить любовь к обучению своим детям, четверо из которых получили высшее образование.  В поисках дополнительного источника финансирования для своей семьи,   в 2001 году Эльмира с мужем начали свой бизнес в разведении и перепродаже скота, вложив при этом начальную сумму 25,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день,  хозяйство Эльмиры насчитывающее 2 коровы, 60 овец и 10 коз, приносит ежемесячный доход в сумме 4,000 сом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Эльмира обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку бычка и овец. Доходы от кредита Эльмира планирует направить на пристройку дополнительного сарая для скота.
texts.en: Elmira is 43 years old, married and has six children. Elmira is a biology teacher, and has worked at a school in the city of Naryn for 19 years. As a goal-oriented and hard working person, Elmira has passed on her love for learning to her children, four of whom have university-level degrees. In search of additional income to support their family, Elmira and her husband started a business, breeding and selling animals. Initially, they invested a sum of 25,000 KGS in 2001. Today, Elmira's farm consists of two cows, sixty sheep and ten goats, bringing in a total income of 4,000 KGS per month. To further expand their farm, Elmira has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners, for a loan of 100,000 KGS, to purchase a bull and sheep. Elmira plans to use the profits gained from investing the loan to build an additional barn for the animals.

loans.use: to purchase a bull and sheep

loans.name: Nasreen's Group

texts.en:
Nasreen is an embroidery expert, and she also sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She is very skillful and has learned this art from her mother. Now, by using her skills, she supports her husband and earns reasonably good profits every month. Her husband is a bus conductor. He travels to different areas and mostly remains away from home.

Nasreen is the mother of 3 sons and a daughter. Her eldest son works while 2 of her remaining 3 children are enrolled in school and getting their education. She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further expansion of her sewing business. With the loan investment, she will purchase a new sewing machine, because her current machine doesn't produce good quality work. The new sewing machine will allow her to complete the orders on time and increase her profits.

She has been operating her business for the past many years, and she is very confident that her business will be more successful after an investment.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Nusrat's Group

texts.en:
Nusrat is married and has 3 children. All of them are enrolled in a local school and getting their education. She is a working lady and makes beautiful flower brocades which she sells for good profits. She also collects orders from different flower shops and sells to them to earn extra profits. Her brother lives with her, and he also has the same business. 

Nusrat has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her business. With the loan, she will buy flowers and thread to prepare beautiful flower brocades in larger numbers, which will allow her to fulfill the orders of her clients and increase her income. 

She has been operating her business for the past 5 years and is very confident that an investment will help her to make more profit by increasing her productivity and sales.

loans.use: To buy flowers and thread for her flower brocade making and selling business.

loans.name: Mayramkul

texts.ru: Майрамкул 44 года, замужем и имеет троих детей. Майрамкул работает поваром в местной школе и известна как жизнерадостный и оптимистичный человек.  В поисках дополнительного дохода для своей семьи,  Майрамкул начала свой бизнес в откорме и реализации скота, использовав для этого стартовую сумму в 5,000 сом (KGS).  На сегодняшний день, хозяйство Майрамкул приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме около 10,000 сом , что позволяет покрывать расходы семьи и траты на корм для скота. В целях дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Майрамкул обратилась в компанию «Бай - Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительного скота. Это позволит ей увеличить своей хозяйство, а часть доходов она планирует направить на  подготовку к свадьбе сына.
texts.en: Mayramkul is 44 years old, married and has three children. Mayramkul works as a cook at a local school and is known for being an optimistic and joyous person. As a way to provide additional income to her family, Mayramkul started her own business, raising and selling animals, initially investing 5,000 KGS. Today, Mayramkul's farm makes a profit of about 10,000 KGS per month, which covers the expenses of her family and the cost of feed for the animals. With the goal of increasing the number of animals, Mayramkul has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 KGS, to purchase additional animals. This will allow her to expand her farm, and she plans to use a part of her income on preparations for her son's wedding.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Naseem's Group

texts.en:
Naseem has studied till 8th standard. She is an embroidery and sewing expert and prepares beautiful looking clothes. Due to her good quality work she receives regular orders every month. Besides her embroidery business, Naseem also performs her duties as a housewife very well. Her husband is a driver by profession and provides transport services to his passengers.

Naseem has given birth to 3 sons and a daughter. Her eldest son is 31 years old and runs a betel leaves and cigarettes selling shop. He also contributes to his family financially from his earnings.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further expansion of her son’s business. With the loan investment, he will buy betel leaves and cigarettes of different brands that will help him in improving his sales and profits. He has been operating his business for the past many years and Naseem is hopeful that his business will improve after the loan investment, and that she will be able to save some profits for his marriage in the near future.

loans.use: to buy betel leaves and different brands of cigarettes.

loans.name: Mumtaz's Group

texts.en:
Mumtaz is 49 years old and operates a boutique business through which she sells stitched and unstitched clothes to her community clients. She is the mother of 8 children. Five of them are studying while others are doing embroidery work. 

Mumtaz has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her boutique business. With the loan, she will buy clothes in larger quantities that will allow her to make more dresses with new designs and to improve her sales and profits. She has been operating her business for the past 5 years and she is confident that after the loan investment, her business will be improved further and make her a better income.

loans.use: To buy clothes for her boutique business.

loans.name: Sayrakul

texts.ru:
Сайракул 51 год, вдова и имеет шестерых детей. Сайракул–бухгалтер по образованию, что помогло ей в основании и  успешной деятельности продуктового магазина в селе Ат-Башы.  В торговле, ставшего семейным бизнесом,  Сайракул постоянно помогали сын и невестка, которые и на сегодняшний день ведут активную деятельность магазина. Будучи целеустремленным и трудолюбивым человеком в 2010 году Сайракул начала свой бизнес в разведении, откорме и перепродаже скота. На сегодня в хозяйстве Сайракул насчитывается 3 коровы, 1 лошадь и 33 барана.   
В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Сайракул обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овец. Сайракул вложит доходы от кредита в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Sayrakul is 51 years old, a widow, with six children. Sayrakul has a degree in accounting, which has helped her to start up and successfully run a grocery store in the town of At-Bashy. Her store has become a family business, and Sayrakul's son and his wife have always helped out, to this day playing an active role in running the store. Being a goal-oriented and hard-working person, in 2010 Sayrakul started a business in breeding, raising and selling farm animals. Now Sayrakul has three cows, one horse, and thirty-three rams. To further grow her farm, Sayrakul has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 50,000 KGS to buy sheep. She would like to invest a portion of her income in further increasing the number of animals at her farm.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Fazilat's Group

texts.en:
Fazilat is married, and her husband is a salesman who sells toffees, candies and grocery items at different shops in the market. Fazilat is a housewife who stays at home and does her household duties. She is very proactive and performs her duties very well. She is the mother of 3 daughters. All of them are very young and are not of school-going age.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further expansion of her brother-in-law’s business. He also lives with her family and operates a thresher machine which is used for the separation of grain from husks. With the loan investment he will repair his thresher machine and will also buy some tools that will help him to perform his work better. He has been operating his business for the past many years, and Fazilat is hopeful that an investment will help him in securing his business assets and allow him to do his work better and make more income.

She is a new loan applicant of Asasah.

loans.use: to repair his thresher machine and to buy tools.

loans.name: Rani's Group

texts.en:
Rani has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her eldest son’s thread selling business. With the loan, he will purchase thread in bulk quantity, which will allow him to sell larger quantities and make more income.
  
Rani is the mother of 8 children. Only one of them is studying. Five of her children are involved in sewing businesses, and one operates a power loom with his parents. Her eldest son has been doing his business for the past many years, and Rani is hopeful that an investment will help him in improving his business and also increase his profits. 

She is a new loan applicant of Asasah.

loans.use: To buy thread for selling.

loans.name: Razia's Group

texts.en:
Razia is a vegetable seller who operates her business from her home and sells fresh, quality, seasonal vegetables to her clients at reasonable rates. Her husband operates a Punjabi food restaurant. He offers good quality and tasty food to his customers. Razia is the mother of a daughter and 2 sons. Her daughter is an embroidery expert and her younger son is a mechanic. Her elder son works in a factory.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further expansion of her vegetable selling business. With the loan investment, she will buy fresh seasonal vegetables that will allow her to offer good quality vegetables to her clients to earn better income. She has been operating her business for the past many years and she has a lot of confidence in herself. She is very much sure that her business will be improved after the loan investment.

Note: “In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Razia”.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for selling.

loans.name: Regina

texts.en:
Regina, who lives in the Changamwe area of Coastal Province, Kenya, has operated her printing and photocopy business for three years. She is single and has one child in school, aged eight years.

Regina joined Milango in order to access credit to improve her business operations. A loan of Ksh 40,000 will enable her to purchase printing papers and cartridges. She believes that she can open a cereals shop from the additional income obtained from this loan.

Her main challenges are the presence of counterfeit products in the market, which in turn do not offer quality services and are not easy to detect.

loans.use: Purchase printing papers and cartriges

loans.name: Mayrambubu

texts.ru: Майрамбубу 57 лет, замужем и имеет четверых детей. В поисках источника финансирования для своей семьи,   в 1991 году Майрамбубу с мужем начали свой бизнес в разведении и перепродаже скота, вложив при этом начальную сумму 50,000 сом (KGS). На сегодняшний день,  хозяйство Майрамбубу насчитывающее 5 коров,1 теленка, 45 овец и одну кобылицу, приносит ежемесячный доход в сумме 13,500 сом. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Майрамбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку кобылицы и коз. Доходы от кредита Майрамбубу планирует направить на реконструкцию сарая для скота.
texts.en: Mayrambubu is 57 years old, married, and has four children. In search of additional income for the family, in 1991 Mayrambubu and her husband started their business, raising and selling animals, initially investing a sum of 50,000 KGS. Today, Mayrambubu's farm has 5 cows, 1 calf, 45 sheep, and 1 mare , bringing in a monthly income of 13,500 KGS. To further develop their business, Mayrambubu has turned to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 KGS to buy a mare and goats. Mayrambubu plans to use the income from the loan on improvements on the barn for the animals.

loans.use: to purchase a mare and goats.

loans.name: Elburus

texts.ru:
Elburus 33 qoda. On jenat i imeyet odnogo rebonka. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda,seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione posolok Araz Dilagarda vmeste so svoyey semyoy.
Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit zapchasti dlya svoyey mashini chtobi pochinit yeyo , tak kak on ne mojet polzovatsya yeyu poka ona isporchena. On uje 4 qoda kak rabotayet taxistom.
texts.en: Elburus is 33 years old. He is married and has one child. He is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the city of Fuzuli, currently living in the town of Araz Dilagarda, in Fuzuli region, together with his family. He needs 2,000 AZN to buy spare parts to repair his car, as is it unusable in its current state. He has worked as a taxi driver for four years.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts.

loans.name: Ghazala's Group

texts.en:
The mother of a son who works in the Pakistan railway for a low income, Ghazala has been operating her crockery-sales business for the past six years. She conducts her enterprise from home, selling a variety of crockery such as plates, glass and cooking pots, etc. to her community customers for profit.

Ghazala is now requesting a loan from Kiva partner Asasah to buy crockery in larger quantities, which will allow her to offer greater selection to her customers and earn increased profits. She is very confident that the new profits arising from the loan will help her family to improve its living standard.

loans.use: to buy crockery to sell.

loans.name: Afat

texts.ru:
Afat yavlyayetsya IDP personom ona pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Ona zamujem imeyet odnogo rebonka. Afat 21 let.
Ona uje qod kak zanimayetsya pticevodstvom i razvodit kuric. Seychas ona nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit kuricci ldya razvitiya svoyego biznessa.
texts.en: Afat is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the city of Fuzuli. She now lives in the Fuzuli region with her family. She is married and has one child. Afat is 21 years old. She has raised chickens for the past year. Now she needs 2,000 AZN to buy chickens to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy chickens

loans.name: Meena's Group

texts.en:
Meena, who stays at home and performs her household duties, is a very responsible lady who takes care of her family very well. She is the mother of seven children: her eldest son is married and a driver by profession, while her other children work at a variety of jobs and remain at home.

Through business contracts with farmers, her husband buys wheat and corn at low rates and then sells them for a profit. Meena has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the betterment of his business. With the loan, he will buy wheat and corn in bulk, enabling him to earn greater profits in selling them. Meena is hopeful that the loan will enable her family to achieve a higher standard of living.

Note: In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Meena.

loans.use: to buy wheat and corn to sell.

loans.name: Faxruz

texts.ru: Faxruz ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione posolok Alixanli vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Faxruz zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit ovec. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit ovec dlya uvelicheniya kolichestva skota dlya pereprodaji.
texts.en: Faxruz is married with children. He is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the city of Fuzuli, currently living in the town of Alixanli, Fuzuli region, together with his family. Faxruz raises livestock - specifically, sheep. At the moment he needs 2,000 AZN to buy sheep, to increase the number of animals he owns, for future resale.

loans.use: to purchase sheep

loans.name: Janybek

texts.ru: Жаныбек 47-летний фермер, живущий в с .Фрунзе (северо-восточная часть Кыргызстана). Женат и воспитывает троих детей 16, 13 и 8 лет.  С 1991 года семья Жаныбека успешно занимается разведением скота и перепродажей сельхоз продукции. Особое внимание он уделяет выращиванию яблок и груш, а также переработке пшеницы. На сегодняшний день, в хозяйстве Жаныбека насчитывается 3 коровы, 2 лошади и 10 овец.  Упорный и неустанный труд в бизнесе позволяет Жаныбеку покрывать расходы своей семьи и планировать оплату контрактов детей на высшее образование. Для дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Жаныбек обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) для закупа дополнительного поголовья скота для откорма. Планируемую прибыль Жаныбек намерен использовать для реконструкции сарая в целях обеспечения хороших условия для содержания скота.
texts.en: Janybek is a 47-year-old farmer, living in the village of Frunze (in northeastern Kyrgyzstan). He is married, and raising three children: 16, 13 and 8 years old. Since 1991, Janybek's family has been successfully raising lifestock, and selling farm products. They especially focus on growing apples and pears, as well as processing wheat. Now, Janybek has 3 cows, 2 horses and 10 sheep. Janybek's perseverance and hard work has allowed him to cover his family's expenses and save for his children's post-high-school education. To further increase the number of animals at his farm, Janybek is turning to Bai Tushum and Partners for a loan of 100,000 KGS, to purchase additional animals to fatten for market. Janybek plans to use the money he makes on improvements on the barn, to ensure good living conditions for his livestock.

loans.use: to purchase cattle

loans.name: Parveen's Group

texts.en:
Parveen has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for her boutique business. She runs a boutique at her home from where she sells stitched and unstitched clothes to her community clients on profits. 

She is very talented lady who keeps herself updated about the latest trends and fashions. With the loan, she will buy clothes in bulk quantity with different varieties for the expansion of her boutique business.
 
Parveen is the mother of two sons. Each is involved in different work.
  
She is hopeful that her business will be expanded further after the loan investment and her family will be able to live a better financial life as a result.

loans.use: To buy clothes for the boutique business.

loans.name: Bushra's Group

texts.en:
Bushra has five children. All of them are enrolled in local school and getting their education except the eldest one who is 15 years old.

Her husband is a driver by profession and is the only breadwinner in family. He also runs a business of selling animals. He buys goats and sheep in their early age, raises them and sells to butchers for profit.

Bushra is a housewife who stays at home and does her household responsibilities. She also provides full support to her husband in operating his animal selling business. In his absence she takes care of the animals and gives them food.

She has applied for a loan from Kiva partner Asasah for the further expansion of her husband’s animal selling business. With the loan investment he will purchase goats and sheep to sell for profits after raising them.

He has been operating his business for the past two years and Bushra is very confident that an investment will be productive for him and will increase his income.

She is a new loan applicant of Asasah.

loans.use: to buy goats and sheep to raise.

loans.name: Awa

texts.fr: Madame Awa  est une vendeuse de  produits alimentaires tels que mil, mais,arachide. Elle a l'habitude de s'approvisionner dans le  marché central de sa région d'habitation ou bien dans un grand marché de la ville du pays ou elle vit. Elle évolue dans le secteur du commerce depuis plus de 20 ans. Elle est sociétaire dans un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC ou elle  a déjà remboursé 2 prêts antérieurs. Avec ce  prêt elle veut accroitre son fond de roulement  réaliser  d'avantage de bénéfices pour ainsi pouvoir continuer a subvenir aux besoins essentiels  de sa famille.Elle envisage développer son activité de commerce dans le futur.
texts.en: Awa C. is into retail sale of peanut, millet, and corn. She normally purchases her stock in the central market of the region where she lives, or in a large market in the town where she lives. She has been in this business for 20 years. She is a member of one of UIMCEC's branches and previously repaid two credits. With this loan she would like to grow her working capital in order to make more profits in order to be able to continue to meet her family's essential needs. She would like to develop her business further in the future.

loans.use: to buy grains and peanuts for resale.

loans.name: Gabil

texts.ru:
Gabil yavlyayetsya IDP personom on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so jenoy i sinom. Yemu 31 qod. Gabil jenat i imeyet odnogo rebonka. 
Uje 7 let kak on zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit kroovi dlya uvelicheniya kolichestva skota . Etomu biznessu on nauchislya u svoyego otca kotoriy toje zanimalsya skotovodstvom i razvodil korov.
texts.en: Gabil is an internally displaced person (IDP), originally from the city of Fuzuli and now living in Fuzuli region with his wife and son. He is 31 years old. For the past seven years, he has worked with livestock, breeding cattle. At the moment, he needs 2,000 AZN to buy cows, to increase the number animals at his farm. He learned about breeding livestock from his father, who also raised cattle.

loans.use: to buy cows

loans.name: El Hadji

texts.fr: Monsieur El hadji  est un commerçant qui gère  une alimentation générale dans la localité ou il évolue. Il  s'active dans ce secteur de  commerce de détail depuis plusieurs années  et son activité principale est la vente de produits alimentaires. Il a une expérience de plus de 10ans dans son activité.Il est sociétaire de l'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC et a déjà remboursé 6 prêts antérieurs. Il sollicite un crédit de 500000 prévu pour le renforcement de son fond de roulement et l'achat de denrées alimentaires a revendre.il veut renforcer le stock de ses produits pour faire face a la demande pressante et  croissante de ses clients en ces périodes de préparatifs de fête de Tabaski. Il s'approvisionne au marché central dans les grossistes de grande qualité.
texts.en:
El Hadji B. is a trader who runs a general food store in his area. He has been in the retail business for many years and his main activity is grocery sales. He has more than 10 years experience in this business. He is a member of one of UIMCEC's branch offices and has already paid back 6 loans.

Mr B. is applying for a loan of 500,000 francs. This loan will serve to strengthen his working capital to buy food products to resell. He wants to reinforce his stock of products in order to meet the pressing needs of customers prior to the feast of Tabaski (important religious holiday) and the strong demand he faces. He gets his supplies from high-quality central market wholesalers.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale

loans.name: Asankan

texts.ru:
Асанкан 54-летний фермер, живущий в с .Тасма (северо-восточная часть Кыргызстана). Двое детей Асанкана, так также как и их дед, стали фермерами и помогают в семейном бизнесе. С 1991 года семья Асанкана успешно занимается разведением скота и перепродажей сельхоз продукции. Начав со стартовой суммы в 20,000 сом (KGS), Асанкан смог развить хозяйство с ежемесячным доходом в 13,000 сом.   
 Для дальнейшего увеличения поголовья скота, Асанкан обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) для закупа дополнительного поголовья скота для откорма. Планируемую прибыль Асанкан намерен использовать для постройки нового сарая в целях обеспечения хороших условий для содержания скота.
texts.en: Asankan is a 54 year-old farmer, living in the Tasma village (north-western part of Kyrgyzstan).  Two of Asankan's children became farmers just like their grandfather and help out with the family business.  Since 1991, Asankans family has been successfully involved in breeding livestock and reselling agricultural products.  Starting with a capital of 20,000 som (KGS), Asankan was able to develop his business to have a monthly income of 13,000 som.  In order to further increase livestock headcount, he requested a loan in the sum of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional livestock for fattening up.  Asankan plans to use the expected profit to build a new barn in order to provide good conditions for keeping livestock.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock for fattening up

loans.name: Dieynaba

texts.fr:
Dieynaba est une vendeuse de produits alimentaires tels que bananes pommes orange et autres, elle est basée à domicile et elle fait de l'ambulante au niveau du quartier et dans les zones environnantes. 
Elle approvisionne au garage et dans les stations de dépôt de bananes, ces produits viennent souvent de la sous région ou de certains pays limitrophes. Elle est membre de l'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC. Elle sollicite un crédit de 150000 prévu pour l'achat de produits alimentaires(fruits) destinés a renforcer son activité de commerce.   Elle souhaite aussi augmenter le niveau des  bénéfices qu'elle réalise afin  qu'elle puisse continuer a subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Dieynaba is a retail merchant dealing in food products such as bananas, apples, oranges and others. From her home base she runs her business as an itinerant merchant in the neighborhood and outlying areas.

She gets her supplies from a nearby garage depot and from banana depot locations. These products often come from Casamance (southern region of Senegal) and Guinea.

The requested loan will serve to buy products and strengthen her business activity. She expects that the profits will enable her to continue meeting her family's needs.

loans.use: to buy food products for resale

loans.name: Khabibulla

texts.ru:
Хабибулле 57 лет, женат и имеет троих детей. Хабибулла – электрик по специальности и работал на местной электростанции. Но, к сожалению, зарплаты не хватало на покрытие расходов семьи и Хабибулла решил заняться собственным бизнесом в перепродаже семян.   Начав со стартовой суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS), Хабибулла смог развить бизнес с ежемесячным доходом около 20,000 сом.   
 Для дальнейшего увеличения ассортимента представленного товара и расширения торгового места , Хабибулла обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS). Планируемую прибыль Хабибулла намерен вложить в развитие своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Khabibulla is 57 years old, married and has three children.  He is an electrician and used to work at the local power plant.  Unfortunately, his salary was not sufficient to cover his family's expenses, and Khabibulla decided to start his own business of reselling seeds.  Having started with a capital of 10,000 som (KGS), Khabibulla was able to develop his business to have a monthly income of about 20,000 som.  In order to further broaden his merchandise assortment and expand his retail space, Khabibulla requested a loan in the sum of 120,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company.  He plans to invest the expected profit into the development of his business.

loans.use: to broaden merchandise assortment and expand retail space

loans.name: Laity

texts.fr: Monsieur Laity est un commerçant qui habite au Sénégal.  Il exerce une double activité de vente et d'élevage de poussins  qu'il développe progressivement. Actuellement il dispose  des poussins de 35 jours et doit supporter leur frais de nourriture jusqu'à ce qu'ils seront a terme.Par conséquent il sollicite un crédit de 200000 pour faire face a ces dépense et acheter des sacs de d'aliments pour la finition de ces sujets. . Il est sociétaire dans l'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC de la localité ou il habite.Son intention est de développer son activité d'aviculture et d'accroitre ses bénéfices.
texts.en:
Mr Laity is a merchant who lives in Senegal. He has an additional business as a poultry farmer, which he is currently developing. At this point he has 35-day-old chicks he intends to feed until they are ready for sale. This is why he will use this loan to buy bags of feed to finish the process. 

For this reason he is asking for a loan of 200,000 francs to pay for these expenses. He is a member of one of the branches of UIMCEC in his area. His goal is to develop his chicken-rearing activity to gain more profits.

loans.use: to buy sacs of food to feed his chicks

loans.name: Yulduzkhon

texts.ru:
Юлдузхон 35 лет, замужем, воспитывает  2-х  сыновей и дочку. Муж работает сварщиком.
7 лет тому назад, Юлдузхон решила заняться торговлей на центральном рынке г. Кызылкия, вложив  деньги в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS), заработанные тяжелым трудом в России, куда она с мужем  ездили на заработки. Сначала Юлдузхон пришлось нелегко, ей не хватало  средств и поэтому приходилось брать деньги в долг. Из-за такого положения дел, муж продолжал ездить на заработки, помогая Юлдузхон поставить бизнес на ноги.  
 На сегодняшний день, Юлдузхон активно работает и в настоящий момент имеет в обороте около 150,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Юлдузхон обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на пополнение оборотных средств и расширение ассортимента товаров. Это также позволит Юлдузхон работать вместе  с мужем, избегая в будущем поездок на заработки.  Мечта Юлдузхон – расширить бизнес и построить большой дом для своей семьи.
texts.en: Yulduzkhon is 35 years old, married and is raising two sons and a daughter.  Her husband works as a welder.  Yulduzkhon decided to become involved in retail sales at the local market seven years ago, after investing a sum of 25,000 som (KGS) - money that she earned through hard labor in Russia, where she and her husband used to travel for work.  Times were hard for Yulduzkhon at first because she did not have enough money and had to borrow it.  Due to this, her husband continued to travel for work, thus, helping Yulduzkhon to get her business off from the ground.  Today, Yulduzkhon actively works and currently has a revolving capital of about 150,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, she requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to increase her revolving capital and expand merchandise assortment.  This will also allow Yulduzkhon to work together with her husband and avoid future travels for work.  Yulduzkhon's dream is to expand her business and build a big house for her family.

loans.use: to broaden merchandise assortment and increase revolving capital

loans.name: Coumba

texts.fr: Mme Coumba s'active depuis des années dans le secteur du commerce.Son activité consiste a vendre a domicile des vaisselles , bols,verres, etc. En même temps elle vend des tissus qu'elle achète en provenance de quelques pays limitrophes. Elle a une expérience de 5 ans dans son activité.Pour faire face a la forte demande de sa clientèle elle sollicite un crédit de 150000 prévu pour l'achat de vaisselles destinés  a accroitre son stock.Son objectif est  d'augmenter ses bénéfices afin de mieux subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en: Mrs. Coumba Dioum is a home-based trader. She is in the tableware business (bowls, cups, etc.). She also sells fabrics from Mauritania and Gambia, which is where she has been buying them for the past 5 years. With this new loan, she would like to buy new goods in order to face her clientele's high demands, which she has been struggling to meet. She just reimbursed her first loan in one month. With this new loan, she would like to make a profit to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy new goods in order to face her clientele's high demands

loans.name: Cheikh Oumar

texts.fr: Monsieur  Cheikh est un éleveur de bétail tel mouton et vaches, il s'active depuis plus de 5 ans dans ce domaine.Il est membre d'un guichet de l'U-IMCEC et n'a jamais bénéficié de crédit dans la dite institution. Actuellement il sollicite un crédit de 300000f dans le but de financer une opération de vente de moutons.C'est une opération qu'il a testé l'année dernière et qui a connu une  réussite de sorte que cette année il souhaite augmenter son fond de roulement et reprendre la même opération.son objectif est d'accroitre ses gains financiers.
texts.en: Mr Cheikh is a livestock farmer, who raises sheep, cows, etc. He has been in this business for more than 5 years, and this is his first loan with UIMCEC. With this first loan, he would like to launch a Tabaski operation (Eid al-Adha), which he successfully did last year, with his own funds. This year, he would like to take on a loan to complete the money he already has. He gets his supplies in Fouta and in Orkedji.

loans.use: to buy sheep to resell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: achat de poissons a traiter pour la revente

loans.name: Baktiyar

texts.ru:
Бактияру 35 лет, женат и имеет четверых детей. Бактияр – фермер, занимающий откормом и перепродажей скота, а также перепродажей сельхозпродукции. Благодаря упорному каждодневному труду и настойчивости, Бактияр смог развить хозяйство с коровами, баранами и лошадьми, приносящее его семье около 20,000 сом ежемесячно с продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Благодаря доходам от бизнес деятельности, Бактияр смог купить земельный участок, где планирует построить большой дом для своей семьи.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Бактияр обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительного поголовья скота. Планируемую прибыль Бактияр намерен вложить в стройку дома .
texts.en: Baktiyar is 35 years old, married and has four children.  He is a farmer, who is involved in fattening up and selling livestock and also in reselling agricultural products.  Thanks to his persistent daily labor and diligence, Baktiyar was able to develop his farm to contain cattle, sheep and horses and to bring his family a monthly income of about 20,000 som from sales of dairy and meat products.  Thanks to his business earnings, he was able to buy a plot of land, where he plans to build a big house for his family.  In order to further develop this business, Baktiyar requested a loan in the sum of 80,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" to buy additional livestock.  He plans to invest the expected profit into the construction of his house.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock

loans.name: Issa

texts.fr: Monsieur  Issa est un commerçant qui pratique la vente de produits cosmétiques.Il exerce son activité dans un marché de la localité non loin de son lieu d'habitation  depuis 1996. Il est sociétaire du guichet de l'U-IMCEC de la région et  a déjà remboursé 2 prêts antérieurs. Actuellement il sollicite un crédit de 300000 prévu pour l'achat de cosmétiques ,  de nouveaux produits plus particulièrement ( mèches, greffages) afin d'assurer la diversification de ses produits pour la satisfaction de la clientèle.Néanmoins son objectif final est la  réalisation  de bénéfices croissants qui lui permettront de satisfaire ses besoins vitaux.
texts.en:
Mr Issa is a retail merchant dealing in beauty products. He has been based at the Moussanté market of Thiès since before 1996.

With regard to his credit history he is on his third credit loan and all preceding loans were invested in his shop.

He intends to use this loan to increase his stock supply and buy new products such as hair weaves and extensions that are missing from his shop. He resupplies in Petersen and in the central market.

With this loan he wants to meet customer demand (for the most part women) and make ​​a profit to satisfy his basic needs.

loans.use: achat de produits cosmétiques,mèches et gréffages a revendre.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to stock up on merchandise such as soap, shoes, candy, cosmetics, beans, rice, cookies, etc. for her shop

loans.name: Abdoul Aziz

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdoul Aziz est un tailleur de profession qui gère un atelier de couture au marché de la localité ou il vit.il encadre deux jeunes employés dans le domaine de son activité.il a une expérience de de plus de 5 ans dans son activité et grâce a ses revenus il parvient a satisfaire ses besoins sociaux.il est membre de l'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC et sollicite un crédit de 400000 prévu pour l'achat d'une nouvelle machine a coudre et des tissus qui lui permettront de confectionner des  habits prêt a porter destinés a la vente en vue de satisfaire la demande de la clientèle. Le développement de son activité lui donne l'opportunité de d'embaucher de jeunes garçons et de créer de nouveaux emplois.
texts.en:
Mr Abdoul Aziz is a tailor based at a local market where he manages his workshop assisted by two employees. For over five years he has been exercising a trade where he is able to answer social needs.

With this loan he wants to buy a new sewing machine and buy fabrics to enhance his ready-to-wear collection and meet the demands of his customers. All previous loans were granted by IMCEC where he has established his trustworthiness.

His market experience provides him with the opportunity to hire young people of his age.

loans.use: achat de machine a coudre et de tissus pour confectionner des habits pret a porter  a vendre

loans.name: Abdou

texts.fr: Monsieur Abdou est un Marchand qui gère   un mini sélect à coté de la station de la municipalité de la localité de sa zone d'habitation.Il capitalise une expérience de plus  de 5 ans dans son activité de commerce.Il commercialise des produits alimentaires divers. Il est membre d'un des guichets de l'U-IMCEC depuis 2 ans. il sollicite un crédit de 500 000, montant avec lequel il compte acheter de la boisson sucrée qui est très demandée en cette période d'approche  des fêtes.Son souhait est de renforcer son fond de roulement pour réaliser d'avantage de bénéfices.
texts.en:
Mr. Abdou is a merchant. For the past five years, he has been running a small convenience store next to the City Hall station. 

He will use this second loan to stock up on merchandise such as soft drinks, a product in very high demand, which will be needed for the upcoming Tabaski celebration. His experience will help him to strengthen his working capital and increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks for his convenience store

loans.name: Diakher

texts.fr: Mme Diakher Diamé est une commerçante basée à domicile, elle s'active dans le domaine des produits de détails tels que chaussures tissus produits de lait de corps . Elle s'approvisionne en gambie et en Mauritanioe, avec ce nouveua pret elle veut acheter de nouvelles marchandisezs pour satisfaire la demande de ces clients. elle est à son second prêt. Ce prêt luipermettra de gagner un bénéfice pour satisfaire ces besoins sociaux.
texts.en:
Diakher Diamé is a retailer who works out of her home. She sells various products, such as shoes, fabric, and body lotions. She obtains her supplies in The Gambia and Mauritania.

With this new loan, she wants to buy more merchandise to satisfy demand from her customers. This is her second loan, and it will allow her to make a profit which will be used for social needs.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase her capital to buy a lot of bicycle spare parts to be resold, and make great profits

loans.name: Thiane

texts.fr:
Mme Thiané Seck est une vendeuse de fruits et légumes, elle est basée chez elle , et elle fait en même temps de la marchande ambulante,elle s'active depuis plus de 20 ans dans ce secteur d'activité. 
 Elle s'approvisionhne au niveau de Kounghél et a dakr parfois,elle fait des voyages de genres une fois toues les semaines, et la semaines suivante ellle revient vers thiés ^pour satisfaire la demande de sa clientéle de thiés. 
 Avec ce prêt elle veut réalisér un bénéfice afin de pouvoir acheter un lit pour sa fille et réinvestir le reste comme fonds de roulement.
texts.en:
Thiané Seck sells fruits and vegetables. Her business is based at her home, but she also sells on foot. She has 20 years of experience in this business. Thiané obtains her supplies in  Kounghél and sometimes in Dakar. She travels once a week and the following week, returns to Thies to meet demand from her local customers.

With this loan, she wants to make a profit so that she can buy a bed for her daughter and reinvest the rest as working capital.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Sarynzhy

texts.ru:
Саринжи 48 лет, женат и воспитывает двоих детей. Саринжи  – фермер, занимающий откормом и перепродажей скота и сельхозпродукции. Благодаря упорному каждодневному труду и настойчивости, Саринжи смог развить хозяйство с 2 коровами, 10 баранами и 2 лошадьми, приносящее его семье около 12,000 сом ежемесячно с продажи молочных и мясных продуктов. Благодаря доходам от бизнес деятельности, Саринжи смог построить дом для своей семьи.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Саринжи обратился в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 130,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительного поголовья скота. Планируемую прибыль Саринжи намерен вложить в покупку кормов для скота на зиму, чтобы иметь возможность продать откормленный скот  весной по хорошей цене.
texts.en: Sarynzhy is 48 years old, married and is raising two children.  He is a farmer, who is involved in fattening up and reselling livestock and agricultural products.  Thanks to his diligent daily labor and persistence, Sarynzhy was able to develop his farm to have two cows, ten sheep and two horses, and to bring his family a monthly income of 12,000 som (KGS) from the sales of dairy and meat products.  Thanks to his business earnings, he was able to build a house for his family.  In order to continue developing his business, Sarynzhy requested a loan in the sum of 130,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to buy additional livestock.  He plans to invest the expected profit into a purchase of fodder for the livestock for the winter, in order to have the ability to sell fattened up livestock at a good price in the spring.

loans.use: to purchase additional livestock

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy a lot of potatoes for resale.

loans.name: Elich

texts.es: El cliente Elich es cliente nuevo de Emprender, se dedica a la costura de vestidos de muñecas junto a su esposa la señora Patricia nuestro cliente también tiene como segunda actividad de chofer asalariado tienen tres hijos, dos varones y una niña solo uno en edad escolar,  Elich y su familia viven en la zona de Kupini que esta ubicado a veinticinco minutos del centro de la ciudad. Ellos se dedican a la confección de ropa de muñecas  desde hace mas de tres años y actualmente tiene dos maquinas  donde confeccionan la ropa,  venden los vestidos de muñecas por la zona de la buenos aires y el alto en la feria 16 de julio,  uno de sus mayores anhelos es apoyar a sus hijos para que lleguen a ser profesionales y también poder ampliar su negocio. En esta oportunidad ellos solicitan el préstamo de dinero para la compra de telas para realizar los vestidos y una maquina eléctrica.
texts.en:
Elich is a new Emprender client.  He and his wife, Patricia, our client as well, make clothes for dolls.  Elich also works as a salaried driver.  They have three children, two boys and one girl; only one of them is still school aged.

Elich and his family live in the Kupini zone which is located 25 minutes from the center of the city.  They have been making clothes for dolls for over three years and currently own two sewing machines that they use to make the clothes.  They sell doll’s dresses throughout the Buenos Aires zone and in El Alto’s 16 de Julio street market.  

One of their greatest wishes is to support their children so that they can become professionals and also to be able to expand their business.  On this occasion, they are asking for a loan of money to buy fabric to make the dresses and to buy an electric sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine and fabric.

loans.name: Maria Beatriz

texts.es: La Sra. María es cliente antigua, ella conformaba anteriormente un grupo solidario, desde hace dos años ella trabaja con crédito individual, la actividad que tiene es la atención de una pensión de comida, ella diariamente prepara entre 80 a 100 almuerzos, la venta la realiza a las tiendas que se encuentran a su alrededor y otros clientes pensionados, la señora María se separo hace años de su esposo, ella vive con sus dos hijos que son jóvenes, quienes le colaboran especialmente en la hora del almuerzo en la atención a los comensales, ambos hijos cursan estudios superiores, la mamá los educo y crio desde pequeños y conforman una familia unida, siendo ella la cabeza del hogar es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora, el destino del crédito es la compra de refrescos para su restaurante y también para la compra de insumos para la elaboración de sus platillos.
texts.en:
María is a longstanding client.  She used to be part of a communal bank but has been working with individual loans for the last two years.  She has a catering business; she prepares between 80 and 100 meals daily that she sells to nearby stores and to some customers who are retirees.  

María separated from her husband years ago and lives with her two children who are young and help her out especially at lunch time to take care of customers.  Both children attend to higher education classes.  Their mother educated them since childhood and they are a very united family; she’s the head of household and is a very responsible, hardworking person.  

The loan will be used to buy soft-drinks for the restaurant and also to buy ingredients for her meal preparation.

loans.use: to buy soft-drinks and supplies for her business.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
This is Francisca, 61, a resident of Quezon City, Philippines. A widow, she manages her household while operating her business. She works hard to support the education of her two children who are both in high school

Francisca maintains a direct selling business. She sells clothing, footwear, undergarments, cosmetics and other products through the popular direct selling brands like Avon, Fullerlife, Natasha, Boardwalk, Marikina Shoe Exchange, and others. A customer's order is bought in cash by the dealer and then given to the customer with a one-month-to-pay credit. Dealer’s prices are lower than those in the catalog, and these are the profits that dealers count on for their income. Aside from direct selling, she sells processed meat. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 5,000 in sales every week.

She is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 36,000 that will help her to continue her business. She will be using the loan to buy orders for her customers. Her profits from business will definitely help her to sustain her daily needs. 

Francisca dreams that her business will continue to grow and she will have more sales. She hopes that her children will be able to finish their studies and enjoy a good life. She never fails to attend to the fellowship* every week. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for merchandise needed in her business.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es: La señora Lidia tiene su tienda de barrio donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad a sus clientes como abarrotes, refrescos, dulces, galletas, etc. su tienda es en su propio domicilio, ella tiene su negocio desde hace unos años y solicito el crédito para la compra de mercadería como refrescos y dulces  para surtir su tienda de barrio y así poder ofrecer variedad de productos a sus clientes, ella es u  apersona muy trabajadora dice estar eternamente agradecida por el trato recibido en la institución.
texts.en: Lidia has a neighborhood store where she offers Basic staple goods to customers like groceries, soft-drinks, candy, cookies, etc.  Her store is home-based.  She’s had the business for a few years and requested the loan to buy merchandise like soft-drinks and candy to stock the neighborhood store and be able to offer a variety of products to her customers.  She’s a very hardworking person who says that she’s eternally grateful for the treatment she’s received by the institution.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like soft-drinks and candy.

loans.name: Raykhan

texts.ru:
Райхан 40 лет, замужем, имеет троих детей -  школьников. Муж работает в паспортном столе с. Кадамжай.   В поисках дополнительного источника дохода для своей семьи, в 2008 году Райхан начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания. Благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  Райхан сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  12,000 сом (KGS) и оборотными средствами в сумме 30,000 сом (KGS).  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Райхан обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента.  Доходы от кредита Райхан планирует вложить в  расширение торгового места.
texts.en: Raykhan is 40 years old, married and has three school-age children.  Her husband works at a passport office in the Kadamjay village.  In order to find an additional source of income for her family, Raykhan started her own business of selling food products in 2008.  Thanks to her persistence and hard work, she was able to develop her business to have a monthly income of 12,000 som (KGS) and a revolving capital of 30,000 som (KGS).  In order to further develop her business, Raykhan requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to broaden her product assortment.  She plans to invest the profits from the loan into expanding her retail space.

loans.use: to broaden an assortment of products

loans.name: Nely

texts.es: La Sra. Nely vive en la zona del plan 3000 junto a su  esposo y su hijo de 3 años, vive  en la casa de su madre, ella tiene una rocola en la av. Principal de su barrio, también junto con su madre tienen una amplificación la cual también le generan ingresos ya que alquilan para fiestas matrimonios y bautizos. Su esposo es electricista y trabaja en una clínica de la ciudad de Santa Cruz, la Sra. Nely anteriormente era socia en el banco de emprendimiento Sol en el cual era responsable con el pago de cuotas. El crédito que esta solicitando es para compra de equipo de sonido  para su local. La Sra. Nelly es una persona activa, trabajadora y con ganas de salir adelante al lado de su esposo.
texts.en:
Nely lives in the Plan 3000 zone with her husband and 3-year-old son in her mother’s house.  She has a jukebox on her neighborhood’s main avenue and with her mother owns a sound amplification system that generates income when they lease it out for parties, weddings and baptisms.  Her husband is an electrician and works for a clinic in the city of Santa Cruz.  

Nely used to be a member of the “Sol” communal bank where she was very responsible with her installment payments.  The loan she’s asking for is to buy sound equipment for her locale.   Nely is an active, hardworking person who wants to get ahead alongside her husband.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Dusengedukore I Group

texts.fr:
Goreth est une commerçante âgée de 39ans qui habite au Quartier Gatumba de la Mairie de Bujumbura. Elle est tailleur et vend des habits neufs pour femmes et enfants. C’est un métier qu’elle commence alors qu’elle vendait des aliments dans un petit restaurant. Elle est veuve avec 6 enfants dont 4 sont a l’école. Elle prend aussi en charge 1 enfant de sa famille proche et lui assure les frais de scolarité.
 Le crédit Kiva de 350,000 francs burundais qu’elle obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter beaucoup de tissus a coudre et des habits neufs pour femmes et enfants à revendre  et réaliser de grands bénéfices. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Dusengedukore I»
texts.en:
Goreth is a 39-year-old merchant who lives in the Gatumba neighborhood, in the Mairie district of Bujumbura. She is a member of the Dusengedukore I community group. She is a seamstress who also sells new apparel for women and children. She entered this profession back when she was working in a small restaurant. She is a widow with six children, four of whom go to school. She also looks after the child of a relative for whom she pays tuition fees. 

Goreth is seeking a loan of 350,000 Burundian francs to increase her capital. She will stock up on fabrics and new clothes for women and children to sell and make substantial profits.

loans.use: to stock up on fabrics and new apparel for women and children

loans.name: Edna

texts.en:
This is Edna, 62, a resident of GMA, Cavite, Philippines. She is married to Ceferino, her business partner, and is the mother of five children. Four are in college and one is in high school. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Edna operates a food stall. She sells snacks, burgers and beverages to the local community. Aside from this she also earns from the apartment that she owns and the table and chairs rental that she operates. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of 500 Philippine Pesos (PHP)  in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 20,000 loan. She will be using the loan to buy more quantities of patties, buns, beverages and other products needed in her business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.  

Edna would like to buy a vehicle for their business and hopes to continuously grow her enterprise in the coming years. She faithfully meets with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. 

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients and products needed in her business.

loans.name: Mirsa Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doña Mirsa continua comercializando su ventas en ropa y cosmeticos, pues gracias a los financiamiento ha logrado mantenerse en equilibrio, captando mas clientes y comprando y vendiendo mas productos.
Sigue trabajando por catalogos y encargos, y mantiene sus productos, y venta en su casa de habitacion, cada mes la empresa les da un catalogo nuevo en donde ella promueve a sus clientes en el barrio, familia, teniendo ingresos fijos para el apoyo de sus dos hijos, quien junto a su esposo dan lo necesario para el bien comun de ellos. 
Con este nuevo financiamento comprara, productos en vanidad, pintura de labios, perfumes de dama y caballero, cremas de piel, crema de cuerpo, brillo de labios, pintura de uña, a si como ropa variada y encargo pendiente que tiene que entregar. Para ella es de gran beneficio esta inversion por que promueve el apoyo  a su familia.
texts.en:
Mirsa continues with her clothing and Cosmetics sales because thanks to the loan she was able to stay balanced acquiring more customers and buying and selling more products.

She continues working via catalogue and on prior orders and continues to store and sell her products at home.  Every month the firm gives her a new catalogue that she uses to promote among her customers and family in the neighborhood earning steady income to support her two children who with her husband’s help she’s able to provide for their common good.

She will use this new loan to buy cosmetics, lipstick, women’s and men’s scents, skin cream, body cream, lip gloss and nail polish as well as assorted clothing and the pending orders she has to fill.  For her, this investment is of great benefit because it promotes her family’s support.

loans.use: to buy clothes and cosmetics.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: La Sra. María vive en la zona del plan 3000 en casa propia junto a sus hijos, ella es promotora de cosméticos desde hace 2 años, ya  saco un crédito  anterior que fue  para aumentar su capital de trabajo. Este nuevo crédito es para la compra de material de construcción para terminar de construir un cuarto. La Sra. María ha aumentado su numero de clientes y de esa forma le ha generado mas ingresos con lo cual esta terminando de construir su casa y cuenta con el apoyo de sus hijos, ella ha tenido un buen comportamiento de pago. La Sra. María es muy proactiva, busca la forma de vender sus productos y es una persona que tiene una actitud positiva con las personas.
texts.en: María lives in the "Plan 3000" neighborhood in her own house, together with her children. She has sold cosmetics for the past two years. She has taken out a previous loan, for the purpose of increasing her working capital. This new loan is to buy construction materials to finish building a room in her house. María has expanded her customer base and thus has generated more income, which she is using to finish constructing her house. She has the support of her children, and she has had an excellent payment record. María is very proactive, always looking for ways to sell her products, and she is someone who always has a positive attitude with other people.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Dusengedukore Ii Group

texts.fr:
Ernest est un commerçant âgé de 30ans qui habite au Quartier Gatumba de la Mairie de Bujumbura. Il fait le commerce des articles divers de boutique(haricots,riz,savons,huile vegetale,souliers…) depuis 19 ans. C’est un métier qu’il commence alors qu’il était cultivateur.Il a fait ses etudes jusqu’en 6e annee primaire.Il est marie et père de 3 enfants dont 1 est a l’ecole. Il prend aussi en charge 1 enfant de sa famille proche et lui assure les frais de scolarité.
 Le crédit Kiva de 480,000 francs burundais qu’il obtient lui permet d’augmenter son capital pour acheter beaucoup d’articles divers de boutique(haricots,riz,savons,huile vegetale,souliers…)à revendre  et réaliser de grands bénéfices. 

Elle est membre  du groupe  communautaire« Dusengedukore II»
texts.en:
Ernest is 30 years old and he lives in the Gatumba neighborhood in Bukumbura town. He is a retailer and for the past 19 years, he has been selling miscellaneous items (beans, rice, soap, vegetable oil, shoes...). Ernest began this business while he was also a farmer. He went to school up to the 6th year of primary school. He is married with 3 children, one of whom is in school. In addition, he is responsible for one child belonging to close family members, and he pays for that child's school fees.

The loan of 480,000 Burundi francs will allow him to increase his capital in order to buy miscellaneous items  (beans, rice, soap, vegetable oil, shoes...) for re-sale, and to make a substantial profit. Ernest belongs to the "Dusengedukore II" group.

loans.use: to increase his capital so he can buy miscellaneous items  (beans, rice, soap, vegetable oil, shoes...) for re-sale, and make a substantial profit.

loans.name: Santos Abel

texts.es:
El señor Santos tiene 67 años de edad, vive en unión libre con su esposa, tiene 3 hijos (2 mujeres y un varón), reside en  el área urbana del municipio de Yoro.
La actividad económica de Don Santos es ofrecer el servicio de molienda de maíz a través de un molino semi tecnificado. Como actividad adicional para generación de ingresos su esposa se dedica a la producción de tortillas, actividad que realizan con el apoyo de sus hijos en sus tiempos libres ya que dos de ellos estudian.
Comenta que hace  4 años inicio con este negocio y considera que ha mejorado significativamente sus ingresos, lo que le ha permitido adquirir su propio vehículo.
Actualmente ha solicitado su primer  préstamo, el cual será invertido en la compra de una planta eléctrica para el funcionamiento ininterrumpido  del molino.
Manifiesta que la planta electrica que comprará le ayudará a superar mucho en su negocio ya que en la zona donde el radica existen muchas dificultades con la energía eléctrica, pues constantemente es suspendido dicho  servicio, lo que provoca que él suspenda operaciones.
Don Santos está muy motivado con su negocio ya que existe la demanda del servicio de molienda, el espera seguir obteniendo buenos ingresos para  apoyar a sus hijos con la educación universitaria y mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia.
texts.en:
Santos is 67 years old, and he is in a common-law-marriage.  He lives with his wife and three children (two girls and a boy) in the urban area of the Yoro municipality.

Santos’s business is grinding corn through a semi-technical mill.  As an additional business activity to generate income his wife makes tortillas.  The children help her in their free time.  Two of the children go to school.

He says that he started this business four years ago, and he believes that it has significantly improved his income.  It has allowed him to get his own vehicle.

He has currently requested his first loan.  He will use the loan to buy an electrical generator so that the mill will function without interruption.  He says that the generator that he will buy will help him improve a lot in his business.  There are a lot of electrical difficulties in the area where he lives.  The electrical service is constantly suspended.  That causes him to suspend his operations.

Santos is very motivated in his business because there is the demand for milling services.  He hopes to continue getting good income to support his children’s university education and to improve the quality of life for his whole family.

loans.use: to buy an electrical generator for his mill to grind corn.

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es: La señora María tiene la actividad de venta de café, hamburguesas de carne huevo y otros, la señora tiene una concesión en una empresa publica ofreciendo servicio de cafetería, ella ya esta un años en esa actividad, la señora tiene dos hijos pero ellos están con su padre, la señora es del departamento de Santa Cruz,  ella se vino la ciudad de La Paz  por la situación económica y buscando un mejor empleo, la señora esta actualmente separada pero confía en formar una nueva familia en un futuro, el destino del crédito será destinado a la compra de una cocina y un mueble para la mejor comodidad del cliente.
texts.en: Maria sells coffee, hamburgers, eggs and more.  She has had a concession cafeteria  in a public area of a business for a year.  She has two children but they are with their father.  Maria is from Santa Cruz department but she came to La Paz looking for a job because she needed the money.    She is currently separated; however, she is sure that she will have a new family in the future.  She will use the loan to buy cooking appliances and furniture for more comfort.

loans.use: to buy cooking appliances and furniture

loans.name: Rutilia

texts.es:
La señora Rutilia tiene 51 años de edad, es madre soltera, tiene 2 hijos, reside en la comunidad de Milla 4, en el municipio de Omoa; Cortés.
En su vivienda convive con una de las hijas y dos nietos. Hace aproximadamente 12 años, ella junto con un grupo de mujeres de su comunidad recibió por parte de ODEF OPD  capacitación y asistencia técnica   en bordado de prendas de vestir y de uso domestico (manteles de cocina). 
Además recibió cursos sobre mercadeo y organización y liderazgo, logrando  la apertura de su propio negocio (bordado de prendas) con el apoyo crediticio de ODEF Financiera S.A.
En la actualidad ella ha solicitado un préstamo para invertir en la compra de materia prima como ser: tela de manta, hilo y revistas de diseños.
La comercialización la realiza a través de pedidos y también ofrece el producto a turistas que llegan a las playas de su comunidad.
Su sueño es seguir creciendo con sus ventas y aumentar sus ganancias para apoyar económicamente a su familia.
texts.en:
Rutilia, age 51, is a single mother with two children.  She lives with one of her daughters and two grandchildren in the Milla 4 community in the Omoa municipality, Cortés.

Approximately 12 years ago she joined a group of women in her community, and they received training from ODEF OPD and technical assistance in embroidering clothing and tablecloths.  

She also took courses about marketing, organization, and leadership.  She managed to open her own business (embroidering garments) with the help of a loan from ODEF Financiera S.A.

She has currently requested a loan to buy supplies like blanket fabric, thread, and design magazines.  She sells by orders, and she also offers her products to tourists who come to the beaches in her community.

Her dream is to continue growing with her sales and to increase her income in order to financially support her family.

loans.use: to buy blanket fabric, thread, and design magazines.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase her capital to buy a lot of women's pagnes to resell and make big profits

loans.name: Rocio Maribel

texts.es: La Sra. Roció  tiene como actividad la venta de comida y la atención de un kiosco donde vende dulces y galletas, esta actividad la desarrolla todos los días de la semana, ella es una persona joven muy trabajadora su familia esta compuesta por su esposo quien también trabaja como ayudante de cocina en un club de la ciudad de La Paz y sus dos  pequeños hijos de 10 y 4 años, el destino del crédito es para compra de material de construcción para la refacción del kiosco donde ella trabaja y la compra de mercadería como dulces y galletas para surtir con variedad de productos su kiosco y de esta manera mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Señora Roció  has as her activity the sale of food and tending a stall where she sells candies and cookies.  She performs this activity every day of the week.  She is a young person and a hard worker.  Her family is composed of her husband, who also works as a kitchen assistant in a club of the city of La Paz and her two small children ages 10 and 4 years.  The purpose of the loan is to purchase building material for the repair of the stall where she works and to purchase merchandise such as candies and cookies to supply her stall with a variety of products and in this manner to improve her income and her quality of life.

loans.use: repair her stall and buy merchandise

loans.name: Roberto

texts.es: El Sr. Roberto tiene como actividad la venta de periódicos y revistas, su puesto esta ubicado en la zona central de la ciudad de La Paz,  el tiene un anaquel que esta ubicado en un lugar muy estratégico, el esta todas las mañanas desde las 7.oo de la mañana hora en la que  compra los periódicos y los vende hasta terminar que es aproximadamente hasta las 14.00 de  la tarde, sus hijos son ya mayores y dos de ellos se dedican también a la venta de periódicos, sus hijos están estudiando en la universidad y el deseo del Sr. Roberto tiene el sueño de que sus hijos salgan profesionales y ejercer su profesión, el  les ayuda con todo lo que puede y les da muchos consejos para su vida mas adelante, el crédito será invertido en la compra de libros y revistas para vender.
texts.en: Señor Roberto has as his activity the sale of newspapers and magazines.  His stall is located in the central zone of the city of La Paz.  He has a stall that is located in a very strategic place.
