He is there every morning from 7AM when he buys the periodicals and he sells them until they are gone, which is approximately 2 in the afternoon.  His sons are already grown  and two of them also work selling periodicals.  His children are students at the university and the desire of the Señor Roberto is the dream that his children become professionals and practice their profession.  He helps them with everything that he is able and gives them much counsel for their life ahead.  The loan will be invested in the purchase of books and magazines to sell.

loans.use: to buy magazines

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: increase her capital to buy many new clothes for women and children as well as shoes to resell and make great profits

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
El Sr.Juan Carlos  es un joven de 22 años que vive en la Ciudad de Santa Cruz, es soltero, y un no tiene hijos, es un joven muy emprendedor que desde un principio decidio abrir un negocio que pueda manejarlo y ademas pueda generarle ingresos para su sustento, El sr. Juan Carlos cuenta con un internet provisto de  5 equipos de computacion, las cuales son su unica fuente generadora de ingreso que le ayudan a subsistir, por tal motivo  la única manera de mejorar su calidad de vida es implementado mas computadoras en su internet; Juan Carlos ha observado que el lugar donde se encuentra instalado tiene bastante afluencia de clientes, ya que  esta en un lugar estrategico, es por ese motivo que cuenta con una elevada demanda. 
Es asi que Juan Carlos ha solicitado un credito para su negocio de cafe Internet para poder comprar mas equipos de computacion y asi generar mas ingresos.
texts.en: Señor Juan Carlos  is a youth of 22 years that lives in the City of Santa Cruz.  He is single, and does not have children.  He is a very enterprising youth that from the beginning decided to open a business that he can manage himself and also can generate income for his living.  Señor Juan Carlos relies on an internet cafe business consisting of 5 computers, which are his only source of income that helps him to subsist.  For this reason the only way to improve his quality of life is to install more computers in his network.  Juan Carlos has observed that the place where his business is located has enough affluence of clients, since it is in a strategic place and therefore is in high demand.  It is for this reason that Juan Carlos has requested a loan for his Internet cafe business to be able to buy more computers and in this way to generate more income.

loans.use: to buy computer equipment for his Internet business.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es:
El Señor Cesar tiene 37 años, está casado, tiene dos hijos que están estudiando, residen en la comunidad de San José de la Cuesta en Siguatepeque.
La actividad económica a que se dedica es la producción del cultivo de café, actividad que la aprendió a través de sus padres y desde que él era un niño.
Solicito un préstamo para la compra de fertilizantes y para proporcionar mantenimiento al cultivo (limpieza). Don Cesar se siente motivado a continuar con esta actividad ya que el cultivo de café es muy resistencia a los cambios climatológicos y los precios son muy estable.
Él espera obtener buenas ganancias en este periodo ya que los precios a nivel nacional e internacional se mantienen altos.
Sus ganancias las utilizara para brindar mantenimiento constante al cultivo, apoyar la educación de sus hijos y  mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Cesar, age 37, is married and has two children who are in school.  They live in San José de la Cuesta in Siguatepeque.

His business is growing coffee, an activity that he learned from his parents when he was a boy.

He requested a loan to buy fertilizers and to provide maintenance on his crops (clearing the fields).

Cesar feels motivated to continue with this business activity because the coffee crop is very resistant to climate changes, and the prices are very stable.  He hopes to get good income during this period because the national and international prices continue to be high.

He will use his income to provide continual maintenance for his crop, to support his children’s education, and to improve his home.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers.

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria sigue laborando para el bien comun de la familia, en zona franca,sus hijos terminando el año escolar, y su esposo con su trabajo en seguridad, para ambos las mejora a su casa es el objetivo,
El cual han venido haciendo atraves de financiamiento, hoy con este nuevo prestamo, comenzara la construccion de un cuarto en la parte de atrás de la casa,  ya que con el credito anterior eran sus planes pero solo compro materiales de construccion, lo que terminara, de comprar lo que hace falta en cemento, hierro y bloques, para comenzar la obra, y poder tener mejor comodidad, ya que al casarce su hija, hay menos espacio. Y desea dar lo mejor como madre, para mientra ella tiene lo propio.
texts.en: Marí continues working in the free zone for her family's common good.  Her children are finishing the school term and her husband continues with his security guard job; they both have as a goal to make home improvements.  They have been doing them through the loans and today with this new loan will begin to build a room in the rear of the house because the plan for the previous loan was just buy the building materials and now will buy the ones they still need like cement, iron rods and concrete blocks to start the project and have more comfort because now that her daughter got married they have less space and as a mother, she wants to give her the best until she has her own.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Oksana

texts.ru:
Оксана замужем, имеет двух дочерей. Она имеет свой бизнес и продает продукты. Ее ежемесячный доход составляет 4,000 гривен. Оксана ведет этот бизнес уже 6 лет. Ее маленький магазин находится в селении, расположенном недалеко от города Дрогобыч. Оксана обеспечивает людей, которые живут в селении, свежими качественными продуктами.

Оксана хочет получить кредит в сумме 10,000 гривен для пополнения  товарных запасов. Это поможет ей получить дополнительный доход и лучше заботиться о свой семье.
texts.en: Oksana is married and has two daughters.  She has her own business and sells products.  Her monthly income is 4,000 hryvnia.  Oksana has been running this business for six years.  Her small store is located in a village near the town of Drogobych.  Oksana supplies local residents with fresh and quality products.  Oksana wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 10,000 hryvnia to refill her product inventory.  This will help her earn an additional income and take better care of her family.

loans.use: to refill her product inventory

loans.name: Jorge Rodimiro

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Honduras! Le presento a Jorge, un agricultor que reside en la aldea de Nueva Esperanza en el municipio de Santa Cruz de Yojoa. Jorge tiene 38 años de edad y lleva 13 años de casado con su esposa Igna, lo cual también es agricultora. La pareja tiene 3 hijos: dos muchachas de 13 y 5 años de edad y un muchacho de 11 años de edad. Los dos mayores están estudiando. 

El señor Jorge solicitó un crédito de L4000 para el mantenimiento y siembra de un vivero de café. Jorge es lo que llamamos un caficultor. Empezó a cultivar café hace 8 años y dedica 3 horas diarias a su vivero. Especializa en la producción de pergamino húmedo: en este estado los granitos de café están listos para tostar.  Don Jorge llegó a tener este negocio con su propio esfuerzo y ahora tiene previsto incrementar su producción de café. Él nota que el costo de vida es cada día mayor y quiere rendir más ganancias para mejorar su calidad de vida y darle todo a su familia.
texts.en:
Greetings from Honduras!  Meet Jorge, a farmer who lives in the Nueva Esperanza village in the Santa Cruz municipality of Yojoa.  Jorge is 38 years old, and he has been married to his wife, Igna, for 13 years.  She is also a farmer.  The couple has three children; two boys who are 13 and 5, and one girl who is 11.  The two oldest are in school.

Jorge requested a loan of 4,000 lempiras for the maintenance and planting of a coffee nursery. Jorge is what we call a “caficultor” (coffee grower).  He started cultivating coffee eight years ago.  He works three hours a day in his nursery.

He specializes in the production of wet parchment coffee.  In this state the coffee beans are ready to toast.  Jorge came to have this business through his own efforts.  He now intends to increase his coffee production.

He notes that the cost of living is greater every day.  He wants to produce more income in order to improve his quality of life and to give his family everything.

loans.use: to perform maintenance and to plant a coffee nursery.

loans.name: Ida

texts.es: Ida, de 28 años, es una joven mujer con ganas de surgir y tener muchas cosas para su futuro. Ella convive con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de 3 años. Juntos habitan  tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su pareja y su menor hijos, ella junto a su pareja trabajando mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su hijo. EL trabajo de Ida consiste en la venta de comida por las noches, ella sale a vender en la vereda de su casa, estuvo vendiendo en forma continua por siete años, pero dejo hace un año aproximadamente por algunos problemas, pero hace seis meses volvió a vender y esta nuevamente en el negocio, ella como tiene buena sazón, sus clientes siempre la buscan para poder degustar de sus deliciosos y exquisitos platos, trabaja sola y desea progresar haciendo su buen trabajo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene tiempo para estar a lado de su menor hijo, además para hacer algunas cosas del hogar, le esta yendo bien, pues sus clientes le son muy fieles ya que encuentran en ella buena atención y una sazón exquisita, espera seguir vendiendo por mucho mas tiempo y mas adelante mejorar las condiciones de su venta en cuanto a infraestructura. Este será el segundo préstamo con la institución MFP, la primera vez que hizo un préstamo le fue muy bien y espera poder seguir yendo así, agradece mucho el préstamo otorgado ya que le permitió retomar el trabajo que realizaba y le esta yendo mejor ahora. Con el monto solicitado 1500 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir con su venta de comida, espera poder comprar por grandes cantidades ya que así gana mas.
texts.en:
Ida is 28 years old.  She is a young woman who has a desire to get ahead in life and do well for her future.  She lives with her partner by whom she has a three-year-old son.  They live together in their own home and, together with her partner, Ida works hard to provide their son with a better quality of life.  Ida's business is selling food in the evenings.  She goes out to sell her products on the sidewalk outside her house.  She had been selling her food continually for seven years but stopped approximately one year ago owing to some problems.  However, six months ago she started selling her food again and her business is up and running again.  As her food is tasty, her customers are always seeking her out so that they can eat her delicious dishes.  She works alone and would like to make progress, doing her good work.

What Ida likes about her work is that it gives her time to be with her young son and she also has time to take care of her household.  Her business is doing well as her customers are very loyal.  This is because she provides good customer service and delicious food.  She hopes to continue selling her food for a long time to come and, in the future, she would like to improve the infrastructure of her business.  

This will be Ida's second loan from MFP.  Her first loan went very well and she hopes to be able to continue doing well.  She is very grateful for the loan she has been given as it will allow her to re-start the work that she used to carry out which is going better now.  She will use the sum of 1,500 soles that she has requested to buy ingredients and supplies so that she can continue with her food sales business.  She hopes to be able to buy in bulk as this allows her to earn more.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and supplies

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith, de 31 años, es una mujer joven y alegre, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de 14 años, aunque su hijo no esta cerca de ella pues vive en la ciudad de Lima. Ella trabaja mucho para brindarle lo mejor, pues necesita aún educación. Tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su pareja quien la cuida mucho pues está con nueve meses de embarazo y necesita de mucho cuidado. El trabajo de Judith consiste en la venta a crédito de productos lácteos, ya que se encarga de distribuir productos lácteos con vitaminas y enriquecidos con diversos productos que hacen un componente fuerte para el cerebro y cuerpo. Tiene como clientes a sus amigos, vecinos y familiares. Lleva ya un año realizando esta actividad y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sola. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para realizar otras actividades, pues se dedica también en una distribuidora y le da tiempo suficiente para poder repartir sus productos  diversos puntos de venta. Le esta yendo bien, ya que tiene doble ingreso además de ganar un promedio de 3 soles por cada lata de lácteo que vende. Espera mas adelante tener su propia distribuidora para así poder generar mayor ingresos en su hogar. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, la primera vez que le otorgaron un crédito lo invirtió de buena manera, le generó buenas ganancias y por eso pudo pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual, ahora ella espera poder invertir igual para así seguir creciendo junto a su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará productos lácteos ya que si compra en mayor cantidad le dan a menor precio y así evitará gastos de la inversión.
texts.en:
Judith, 31, is a cheerful young woman. She lives with her partner, and they have a 14 year-old son, although her son isn't near her, as he lives in the city of Lima.  She works hard to provide him the best, as he is still going to school. She has her own house, where she lives with her partner, who takes good care of her; she is nine-months pregnant and needs a lot of care. 

Judith sells dairy products on credit, as she handles the distribution of dairy products with vitamins, and enriched with various products to strengthen the brain and the body.

Her customers are her friends, neighbors, and family members. She has been doing this work for a year now, and up to now she has done it on her own. What she likes about her work is that it gives her time to do other work, since she also works for a distributor, and this job gives her enough time to be able to distribute her products to various sales outlets.

Things are going well for her, as she has a double income, besides earning an average of three soles for each can of dairy product that she sells.

In the future, she hopes to have her own distributorship, which will enable her to generate more household income.  

This will be her second loan with MFP, the first time they granted her a loan she spent it well, and it generated good earnings for her. That is why she could pay her instalments on time.  Now she hopes to use the loan in the same way to keep her business growing.  With the amount applied for, she will buy dairy products, since if she buys in greater quantity, they give her a lower price, and in this way she will avoid investment expenditures.

loans.use: To buy dairy products for her business.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es: Manuela, de 33 años, es una mujer muy amable, buena y sobre todo responsable. Es madre soltera de una hija de 13 años, vive en casa de su tía a quien ayuda en los gastos que se generan en el hogar. EL trabajo de Manuela consiste en la venta de lencería, tiene muchas amigas en el centro en donde labora, y es ahí en donde ella puede colocar las prendas exclusivas de diseños únicos y de calidad excelente, es por eso que sus clientes siempre le solicitan dicha mercadería. Lleva  ya más de tres años en este negocio y hasta el momento lo ha hecho sola. Tiene dos lugares en donde vende, en su casa y en el colegio en donde labora como docente. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le da tiempo para poder realizar ambos trabajos, además está contenta por que le va bien, ya que genera buenas ganancias. Sin embargo hay clientes que demoran en pagarle. Anhela tener una tienda de venta de rooa. Este será el sexto crédito con la institución MFP, esta contenta con el grupo al que pertenece, espera poder seguir siendo la socia responsable y puntual como lo ha sido hasta ahora. Agradece mucho por la oportunidad que le dan de poder tener mayor capital de trabajo y espera seguir trabajando juntos por mucho más tiempo. Con el monto solicitado, comprará mercadería de lencería para así seguir ofreciendo lo mejor a sus fieles clientes.
texts.en: Manuela, 33, is a woman who is very friendly, kind, and above all, responsible. She a single mother with a 13 year-old daughter.  She lives in her aunt's house, and she helps her with the household expenses.  Manuela has a business selling lingerie.  She has a lot of friends in the center where she works, and she sells a lot of her garments there.  She has exclusive garments of unique designs and excellent quality, which is why her customers always seek out her merchandise.  She has been working in this business for more than 3 years, and up until now she has done it alone.  She has 2 places where she sells: in her house and in the school where she works as a teacher.  What she likes about her work is that it gives her the time to carry out both jobs.  Also, she is very pleased because it is going very well and the business is generating good earnings.  However, she has some customers who are late with their payments.  Her desire is to have her own clothing store.  This will be her 6th loan with MFP, and she is content with her communal bank.  She hopes to be able to continue being a responsible member who is punctual with her payments, as she has been up until now.  She is grateful for the opportunity that that is being provided to her to have more working capital in her business, and she hopes to continue to work with Microfinanzas Prisma for a long time.  With the sum requested, she will buy more lingerie merchandise, so that she can continue to offer the best to her loyal customers.

loans.use: to buy more lingerie to sell

loans.name: Marjjie

texts.es:
Marjjie, de 48 años, es una mujer amable, buena y muy trabajadora. Convive con su pareja con quien no tiene hijos, pero ella tiene cuatro hijos con su anterior esposo. Ahora vive a lado de su conviviente en una casa propia, juntos trabajan para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Marjjie, tiene como trabajo el de la venta de bebidas en eventos de la ciudad, además ella vende comida y tiene un vehiculo con el que su pareja hace transporte de carga. Cada fin de semana, hay eventos, así que lleva sus materiales para armar ahí su puesto en donde se encarga de saciar la sed de los asistentes y también el hambre. Lleva realizando este trabajo por cinco años, lo hace sola, pero tiene la ayuda de su pareja para poder transportar sus cosas, además su pareja la ayuda en los gastos del hogar realizando el transporte de pasajeros en el vehiculo de ambos. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo, le da tiempo disponible para realizar diversas actividades en su hogar, le va muy bien hasta ahora ya que se va a muchos eventos en donde vende mucho y le alcanza con eso para pagar sus cuotas, además tiene un ingreso adicional con el alquiler de su auto, y espera mantenerse así y mas adelante mejorar su camión de transporte. Este será el crédito 12 con la institución MFP, le esta yendo bien trabajando juntos es por eso que lleva bastante tiempo en su grupo el cual son personas muy responsables y siempre son cumplidos, espera seguir trabajando juntos por más tiempo y poder así crecer con su negocio.
Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas para arreglar su vehículo y  además para arreglar su auto que lo da en condición de alquiler a un chofer.
texts.en: Marjjie, 48, is a friendly, hardworking woman. She and her partner have no children, but she has four children from her previous marriage. She now lives with her partner in a home of their own, and together they're working to have a better life. Marjjie sells refreshments at town events. She and her partner have a truck that they use to transport cargo. There are events every weekend, so she takes her supplies to set up her stand, where she ministers to the thirst and hunger of the attendees. She has been doing this work for five years on her own, but her partner helps her with transporting her things and also contributes to the family income by using the truck to tranport passengers. What she likes best about her work is that it gives her time to do a lot at home. Her business is going well, as she attends a lot of events and has good sales, enough to pay her bills. She also gets some income from renting out her car, and hopes to continue supporting family and in the future be able to improve their transport truck. This will be her twelfth credit with MFP. She and the other members of her village bank work well together, since they are all very responsible, conscientious people, and she hopes to keep working with them for some time and be able to expand her business. She will use the requested loan to repair her truck, as well as repairing her car, which she rents to another driver.

loans.use: to repair her transport vehicle.

loans.name: Marlo

texts.es: Marlo, de 33 años, es un hombre bueno que se dedica a su familia y a su trabajo, esta casado y dos hijos de 9 y 7 años. Él tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su esposa y sus dos hijos quienes son su motor para salir adelante. El trabajo de Marlo consiste en el transporte de pasajeros de un lugar a otro dentro y fuera de la ciudad, es así que desde muy temprano sale en busca de pasajeros. Tiene diez años realizando esta actividad y hasta el momento lo ha hecho solo. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede tener el tiempo suficiente para dedicarle a su familia. Le esta yendo bien, pues es muy rentable este negocio. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP; el primer préstamo se consolido como un buen socio, puntual y responsable, ahora espera seguir. Con el monto solicitado, comprará algunas piezas para su mototaxi, además pagará al mecánico que le hará los cambios y refacción de algunas cosas de su mototaxi.
texts.en: Marlo, 33, is a good man who is devoted to his family and his work. He is married and has two children, 9 and 7 years old. He owns a house, where he lives with his wife and their two children, who are the reason he does everything he does. Marlo works transporting passengers both in town and outside the city, so he gets up early to start looking for passengers. He has been doing this job for 10 years and has been working alone up to this point. What he likes best about his job is that it gives him time to spend with his family. It's going well for him, as the business is quite profitable. This will be his second loan with MFP; with the first, he established himself as a prompt and responsible member, and now he hopes to keep going. He will use the requested loan to buy parts for his motorcycle taxi, as well as paying the mechanic to swap them out and repair some things on the vehicle.

loans.use: to buy parts for his motorcycle and take it to the mechanic for repairs.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Nelly, de 63 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy trabajadora. Es madre de cuatro hijos que ya son mayores y son fruto de su matrimonio, quien lamentablemente su esposo falleció hace ya bastante tiempo. Ella tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su hija y su yerno mas un nieto quien es su alegría. El trabajo de Nelly consiste en la costura de prendas de vestir, ella realiza sus propios diseños, además trabaja arreglando y cosiendo nuevas prendas para sus clientes que siempre se van en su búsqueda ya que saben que realiza un buen trabajo. Ella tiene su pequeño taller en su casa en donde lleva realizando su trabajo por 47 años; pues ella toda su vida se dedico a la costura. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le encanta coser, todo el tiempo trabajo con este negocio que le dio la oportunidad de educar y criar a sus hijos. Este será el crédito 16 con la institución MFP, le esta yendo bien con el grupo ya que todos son buenos y muy responsables, espera seguir siendo una buena socia como la conocen. Con el monto solicitado, comprará zapatos, ya que esta iniciando con nuevos proyectos y venderá para la campaña navideña estos productos.
texts.en: Nelly, 63, is a friendly, hardworking woman. She has four adult children from her marriage, but her husband sadly died a long time ago now. She owns her home, where she lives beside her daughter and son-in-law, plus a grandson who is her pride and joy. Nelly works as a seamstress. She designs clothing, as well as making repairs and sewing new clothes for her customers, who always seek her out because of the quality of her work. She has a small workspace in her home where she has been working for 47 years, since she's been sewing all her life. She loves sewing, which is her favorite part of this job. It has also given her the opportunity to educate and raise her children. This will be her sixteenth credit with MFP. She and the other members of her village bank work well together, since they are all very responsible, conscientious people, and she hopes to continue being the good member they've come to know. She will use the requested loan to buy shoes, since she's starting some new projects and plans to sell these products for the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Nerva

texts.es: Nerva, de 46 años, es una mujer amable, honesta y muy luchadora. Es madre soltera de un hijo de 13 años, por quien día a día trabaja mucho para brindarle lo mejor. Ella tiene una casa propia en donde también ve por los cuidados de su madre y de su hijo. El trabajo de Nerva consiste en la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su bodega, ella posee una tienda de abarrotes, ahí vende azúcar, arroz, detergentes, leches, verduras y más. Su negocio esta ubicado en su casa, en una calle muy concurrida de la ciudad. Tiene dos años trabajando de está manera, tiempo suficiente para ganarse el cariño de sus clientes,  ya que con ella reciben una buena atención y sobre todo un excelente servicio. Le esta yendo bien, ya que los ingresos de su bodega son para los ahorros, mientras que percibe ingresos en un trabajo que es del estado y estos son derivados para los gastos de su casa. Espera mas adelante agrandar su negocio y así tener mejor ingresos. Este será el sexto crédito con la institución MFP, hasta ahora le fue siempre bien y espera poder seguir siendo puntual en sus pagos. La ultima vez invirtió en su negocio y le dio buenos resultados, es por eso que esta vez esta con bastante expectativa es esta nueva etapa en su grupo.Con el monto solicitado, comprará productos para su bodega ya que si compra en mayor cantidad le darán a menor precio, comprará algunos sacos de azúcar, arroz, cajas de leche y otros productos mas necesarios y que salen a diario.
texts.en:
Nerva is 46 years old and a friendly, honest, and determined woman. She is a single mother of a 13-year-old son. Nerva works hard day after day so that she can provide him the best. She has her own home where she looks after her mother in addition to her son. Nerva’s work involves managing a grocery store where she sells basic necessity products such as sugar, rice, detergents, milk, vegetables, and other items. Her business is located in her home, which is situated on one of the busiest streets in the city. Nerva has been in business for two years, which is enough time to gain the affection of her customers. She provides them a great amount of attention and, above all, excellent service. Nerva is doing well. The income from her store is designated for savings while the salary she earns from her job is used for the household expenses. She hopes to expand her business so that she can have more income.

This will be her sixth loan with the MFP organization. Until now, Nerva has always done well and expects to remain punctual with her payments. She achieved good results with her last investment. Since she has reached a new stage in her group, Nerva has greater expectations. The amount she requested will be used to buy products for her store in greater quantity. This will enable to get a lower price on items such as sacks of sugar, rice, cases of milk, and other necessary products that sell on a daily basis.

loans.use: to buy sacks of sugar, rice, cases of milk, and other products.

loans.name: Nilsa

texts.es: Nilsa, de 47 años, es una mujer amable y muy sencilla. Ella convive con su pareja, con quien tiene cinco hijos. Ellos ya son mayores y tienen familia, solo uno aún vive en su casa que es propia. EL trabajo de Nilsa consiste en la venta de comida y la venta de chupetes (Helados a base de frutas regionales), desde entonces se va muy temprano a un almacén de procesamiento de maíz de la ciudad, ahí tiene un pequeño puesto de comida y desde donde expende su comida a los trabajadores que trabajan en dicha industria. Ahí mismo vende bebidas heladas y sus deliciosos chupetes hechos a base de pura fruta y con delicioso sabor. Lleva trabajando ahí ya por tres años, lo hace sola aunque en ocasiones recibe la ayuda de su pareja, quien trabaja como empleado en esa fabrica. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene que cocinar ya que esta actividad fue siempre su pasión, le esta yendo bien en su trabajo ya que le genera buenas ganancias. Este será el primer crédito con la institución MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir con la elaboración de comida, además comprará algunas mesas y sillas para atender mejor a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Nilsa, 47, is a nice and very modest woman.  She lives with her partner, with whom she has five children.  They are all grown already and have families; only one still lives with them in their home, which is their own.

Nilsa's job is selling food and frozen pops (ice cream made from regional fruits).  Since then she goes very early to a corn-processing plant in the city where she has a little food stall from where she sells her food to the workers who work in that industry.  Right there she sells ice-cold beverages and her delicious frozen pops made from pure fruit with delicious flavor.  She has worked there for three years already.  She works alone, although sometimes she receives help from her partner, who works as an employee in that factory.

What she likes about her job is that she has to cook.  Since this was always her passion, it's going well for her in her job because it generates good profits for her.

This will be her first loan with the MFP institution, for which she hopes for the support of each one of you.

With the requested loan she will buy ingredients and supplies to continue making food; she also will buy some tables and chairs to better serve her customers.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food and to buy tables and chairs.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.en:
Alexander is married and has a 12-year-old daughter. He is a businessman from Berdyansk. 

Alexander sells plumbing equipment in one of the local marketplaces in his home town. He has many loyal clients and potential customers as his good quality inventory comes at affordable prices. Alexander has unique advertising techniques that help him to keep his business sustainable. He launched his enterprise 10 years ago.

Alexander is a born entrepreneur, capable of coping with economic challenges and routine struggles every businessman faces each day. His customers characterize him as a businessman of integrity, which is a valuable asset these days.

Alexander is requesting a 5,000 UAH loan to increase assorted merchandise for further retail sale in his vending kiosk.

loans.use: to increase assorted merchandise.

loans.name: Maria Edubina

texts.es:
Le presento a María, una caficultora que reside en la aldea de El Dorado en el municipio de Santa Bárbara. La señora María tiene 53 años de edad y lleva 28 años de casado con su esposo Lázaro, lo cual es agricultor. La pareja tiene una hija de 20 años de edad, la cual no está estudiando actualmente.

La señora María solicitó un crédito de L12,000 para la siembra de vivero de café. Ella empezó a cultivar café hace 30 años y hoy en día se dedica a tiempo completo a su cultivo. Varias generaciones de su familia se han dedicado a la agricultura. María especializa en la producción  y manejo de pergamino húmedo. En este estado, los granos de café están listos para ser tostados. 

María sacó un crédito anterior con ODEF de L6000 y con ello, logró incrementar la producción de su vivero. Con el crédito actual, María espera mejorar su ingreso. Espera continuar mejorando su producción cada día y superar la dificultad de falta de mano de obra que hay en la zona.
texts.en:
Meet María, a coffee grower who lives in the El Dorado village in the Santa Bárbara municipality.  María is 53 years old, and she has been married to Lázaro, a farmer, for 28 years.  The couple has a 20 year old daughter who currently is not in school.

María requested a loan for 12,000 lempiras to plant a coffee nursery.  She started growing coffee 30 years ago.  Nowadays she works full time on her crop.  Various generations of her family have devoted themselves to farming.  María specializes in the production and management of wet parchment coffee.  The coffee beans are ready to be toasted when they are in this state.

María took out a previous loan from ODEF for 6,000 lempiras.  She managed to increase the production of her nursery.  With the current loan María hopes to improve her income.  She hopes to continue improving her production every day and to overcome the difficulty of the lack of manpower in her zone.

loans.use: to plant a coffee nursery.

loans.name: Yurik

texts.ru:
Юрику 51 лет , родился и живет в  городе Капан. Имеет высшее образование,окончил Ереванский педагогический институт. В 1988 году женился и живет с женой. Имеет сына 22 лет который служит в армии,дочке 19 лет учится  на третьем курсе Ереванского лингвистического института ,по специальности преподаватель иностранных языков. Жена Юрика работает в военкомате города Капан.
Юрик  с 2006года  занимается дистрибютерской деятельностью . У Юрика контракт с фирмой который производит натуральньные соки, мороженое, печенье, кондитерские изделия ,мясные полуфабрикаты,котлеты и т.д. Все эти продукты и соки Юрик покупает оптом и доставляет из Еревана и оптом продает в  магазинах городов Капан,Каджаран,Агарак и Мегри. Для своего бизнеса Юрик  имеет склад и холодильные камеры у себя дома. 
Юрик  работает почти без выходных и уже имеет постоянных клиентов в этих городах, которые долгие годы предпочитают оптом покупать и в своих магазинах перепродавать товары которые привозит Юрик из Еревана. 
Благодаря выручке от своего бизнеса Юрик содержит семью и платит за учебу дочери .
Юрику нужен кредит 1.000.000 армянских драмов для покупки новых продуктов для Новогодней  и Рождественской продажи
texts.en:
Yurik is 51 years old. He was born and lives in the town of Kapan. He has higher education and graduated from the Pedagogical Institute of Yerevan. In 1988 he got married and now lives with his wife. He has a 22 year old son who is now serving in the army. His daughter is nineteen and she is studying in her junior year at the Yerevan Institute of Linguistics with specialty as a teacher of foreign languages. Yurik's wife works in the military recruitment office in the town of Kapan.

Yurik has been in the distribution business since 2006. He has a contract with a firm which manufactures natural juices, ice cream, cookies, confections, meat products, cutlets and etc. Yurik buys all these products and juices in wholesale, delivers them from Yerevan and then sells them in wholesale to the stores in towns of Kapan, Kadjaran, Agarak and Mergi. Yurik has storage and refrigerators in his house for the business. 

Yurik works almost without any days off and already has many regular customers in these towns who for many years prefer to buy in wholesale what Yurik brings from Yerevan and then sell in their own stores. Thanks to the profit from his business Yurik can support his family and pay for his daughter's education. Yurik needs a loan in the amount of 1,000,000 Armenian dram to buy new products for the New Year and Christmas sales.

loans.use: to buy new products for Christmas and New Year sales.

loans.name: Valerik

texts.ru:
Валерик  родился в 1968г. в  селе Ачанан (Achanan) Капанской области. Имеет среднее образование, специальность электромеханик.В данный момент работает оператором в Капанской кислородно- заправочной станции . Валерик женат и  имеет сына и дочь. Сыну 18 лет , учится в Капанском коледже на втором курсе юридического факультете , а дочке 21 которая  учится в магистратуре Ереванского Архитектурного университета . Жена  помогает Валерику по хозяйству.
Валерик почти 10 лет занимается  сельскохозяйственным бизнесом и имеет в деревне Ачанан  собственый земельный участок  где выращивает вместе с женой овощи и пшеницу. Кроме того у него есть крупно рогатый скот, пчелы(2 улья). Вместе с женой он реализует овощи из огорода на рынках Сюникской области а  мясо, молоко ,пшеницу и мед у него покупают постоянные скупщики прямо из дома .С дохода от сельскохозяйственого бизнеса Валерик платит за учебу детей и содержит семью. 
Валерику нужен кредит 800.000 армянских драмов, для покупки сена для скота и для покупки  нового сорта пшеницы для посевных работ.
texts.en: Valerik was born in 1968 in the Achanan village in the Kapan region.  He has a secondary education and is an electromechanics professional.  Currently, he works as an operator at the Kapan oxygen fueling station.  Valerik is married and has a son and a daughter.  His son is 18 years old and is a second-year law student at the Kapan college.  Valerik's daughter is 21 years old, and she attends a master program at the Yerevan Architecture University.  Valerik's wife helps him with the business.  He has been involved in an agricultural business in the Achanan village for almost ten years and has his own plot of land, where he and his wife grow vegetables and wheat.  Besides this, he owns cattle and bees (two beehives).  Together with his wife, Valerik sells vegetables from his land at the Syunik regional markets, and his loyal wholesalers buy meat, milk, wheat and honey right from his house.  Valerik uses his profits from the agricultural business to pay for his children's education and to support his family.  Valerik needs a loan in the sum of 800,000 Armenian dram to buy hay for his livestock and to buy a new variety of wheat for sowing.

loans.use: to purchase hay for livestock and to buy new wheat varieties for sowing

loans.name: Alan

texts.es: Alan, de 28 años, es un joven soltero, que lo único que desea es darle lo mejor a su madre. Vive en casa de ella y además en compañía de su abuela, su hermana. El trabajo de Alan, consiste en el transporte de pasajeros y carga en su unidad móvil que posee. Su trabajo empieza desde las 2 de la madrugasa, sale en busca de pasajeros aquellos que vienen de la ciudad y necesitan de sus servicios en las agencias de carros interprovinciales. Tiene dos años realizando esta actividad. Lo que le gusta, es que se da tiempo para realizar otro trabajo, que es en una empresa distribuidora. Le esta yendo bien, ya que genera doble ingresos en su hogar y eso ayuda a su economía. Él quisiera mas adelante acodicionar habitaciones para alquilarlos y así tener un ingreso adicional. Este será el primer crédito con la institución MFP, espera que le vaya todo bien pues tiene muchas responsabilidades, espera seguir trabajando por mucho tiempo juntos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará algunas piezas, entre ellas llantas, aros  y otros para arreglar su mototaxi, además iniciará comprando algunos listones y tablas para hacer algunos cuartos.
texts.en:
Alan, 28, is a young single man who only wants to be able to improve life for his mother. He lives at home with her and his grandmother and sister. Alan works in passenger and cargo transport on his vehicle. He starts at 2am and goes to look for passengers coming into this city who need his services at the inter-provincial terminals. He has been doing this for 2 years. He likes it because it gives him time to do other work, his distribution business. It's going well for him, since he's generating 2 incomes for his home which helps with their finances. He wants to be able to prepare bedrooms so that they can rent them out and have another income source. 

This will be his first loan with MFP and hopes that it goes well because he has a lot of responsibilities. He hopes to continue working together for a long time. With the requested loan, he will buy some parts like tires and rims to fix his motorcycle taxi and will also start buying planks and wood laths to make some rooms.

loans.use: to buy tires and rims, as well as laths and planks to make bedrooms.

loans.name: Carmela

texts.es: Carmela, D. 47 años, es una mujer amable, buena y muy trabajadora, ella esta casada hace muchos años y es madre D. tres hijos D. los cuales dos ya son mayores e independientes. Ahora vive en compañía D. su esposo e hijo D. 12 años en su casa propia, trabaja mucho y arduo para así brindarle lo mejor a su hijo quien aún depenD. D. ella, mientras que su esposo ayuda para los estudios y su alimentación. El trabajo D. Carmela consiste en realizar dos actividades, primero es la administración económica D. dos moto taxis que posee, y por las tarD. se dedica a vender comida. Sin embargo éste último trabajo no lo esta ejerciendo por ahora, solo el fin D. semana, venD. en la esquina D. su casa, parrilladas. Tiene 15 años trabajando en esta actividad, y hasta el momento le ha generado ingresos. Por otro lado, ella es profesora D. educación primaria y labora en una institución educativa D. la ciudad. Le esta yendo bien ya que a diario tiene ganancias. y su sueldo como docente lo utiliza para los gastos mensuales D. su casa. Espera poder tener una venta D. repuestos en su casa ya que su hijo sabe mucho D. mecánica y le gustaría ayudarlo con éste negocio. Este será el quinto crédito con la institución MFP, le esta yendo bien en su grupo ya que son muy responsables, espera seguir trabajando bien y con la puntualidad que le caracteriza. Esta muy agradecida con los préstamos recibidos anteriormente. Con el monto solicitado, comprará equipos D. video juego, ya que iniciará un nuevo negocio, que consistirá en el alquiler D. video juegos.
texts.en: Carmela, 47, is a good, hardworking and friendly woman.  She has been married for many years, and she is the mother of 3 children, two of whom are adult and independent.  She is now lives with her husband and 12 year-old son in her own home.  She works very hard to proviD. the best for her son who is still dependent upon her, while her husband helps to proviD. for his education and food.  Carmela has two economic activities.  She manages a business with 2 moto-taxis that she owns, and in the afternoons she sells food.  However, she does this second business only on the weekends, selling barbequed meat from the corner of her house.  She has been doing this type of work for 15 years, and up until now it has generated income for her.  In addition, she is a primary school teacher, and she works in an educational institute in the city.  This is going well, and gives her daily earnings; she uses the salary she earns as a teacher to pay for the monthly household expenses.  She hopes to be able to have a business selling spare parts from her house, since her son knows a lot about mechanics, and would like to help her with this business.  This will be the 5th loan  that she has taken with MFP, and it is going well because her group members are very responsible.  She expects that they will continue to work well together, and that the members will continue to be punctual with their payments as they have in the past.  She is very grateful for the loans that she received previously.  With the sum she requests she will buy video game equipment, since she plans to start a new business renting out video games.

loans.use: to buy video game equipment

loans.name: Dan

texts.es: Dan, de 38 años, es un hombre honesto, trabajador y sobre todo muy responsable. Vive en compañía de su pareja y de su hijo de trece años, en casa de su suegra. Lo único que desea es brindar una buena educación y una mejor calidad de vida. EL trabajo de Dan consiste en el transporte de pasajeros y a veces de algunas cargas dentro y fuera de la ciudad. Es así que desde muy temprano sale en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros. Tiene trece años realizando esta actividad y gracias ello pudo tener una profesión que hoy es docente en una escuela primaria de la ciudad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede realizar dos actividades al mismo tiempo, le esta yendo bien ya que genera doble ingresos en su hogar. Su anhelo es comprar uun moto taxi más. Este será el primer crédito con la institución MFP, espera que le pueda ir bien y que los demás integrantes de su grupo lo apoyen en el proceso de inserción a su grupo solidario, espera trabajar juntos por más tiempo y poder progresar juntos. Con el monto solicitado, comprará piezas para la arreglar su vehiculo, además compraró toldo, llantas y pagará al mecánico que le hará todo el trabajo de restauración a su mototaxi.
texts.en:
Dan, 38 is an honest, hardworking and, above all, responsible man. He lives with his wife and their 3-year-old son in his in-laws' house. All that he wants is to give his soon a good education and a better quality of life. Dan works in passenger transport and occasionally carries cargo in and out of the city. He leaves very early in search of passengers. He has been doing this for 13 years and thanks to this now has a profession, as a teacher at a primary school in the city. What he likes about his work is that he can have 2 jobs at the same time. It's going well, because he can generate double the income for his home. His dream is to buy another motorcycle taxi.

This will be his first loan with MFP, and he hopes that it will go well and that the other members of his group will support him in the process of joining this united group. He hopes to work together for awhile and to move forward together. With the amount requested he will buy parts to fix his vehicle, as well as a sunshade and tires, and will pay the mechanic for his work fixing the motorcycle taxi.

loans.use: to buy repair parts, a sunshade and tires, and to pay a mechanic.

loans.name: Ely

texts.es: Ely, de 21 años, es una madre luchadora, a su edad ella es madre soltera de un niño de 2 años, trabaja mucho y duro para poder brindarle lo mejor a su hijo. Vive en casa de sus padres a lado de sus dos hermanos. El trabajo de Ely, consiste en la venta de variados productos, como ropa, juguetes, accesorios para el hogar. Sus ventas lo hace en la calle, como ambulante, y entre sus principales clientes son sus amistades, vecinos y familiares. Tiene dos años realizando esta actividad. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene ingresos a diario, lo que no le gusta es que tiene que caminar mucho, pero si no vende no tiene con que darle las comodidades a su hijo. Le esta yendo bien, pues considera que se gana bien siempre y cuando te dediques mucho a eso. Su anhelo es tener una tienda de juguetes, pero por el momento no puede pro que le falta capital de trabajo. Este será el tercer crédito con la institución MFP, se siente cómoda con su grupo de trabajo pues todos son muy responsables y solucionan sus problemas como grupo que son. Con el monto solicitado, comprará más mercadería para seguir ofreciendo variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en: Ely, 21, is a tenacious woman.  She is a single mother of a 2 year-old child.   She works very hard to be able to provide the best for her child.  She lives in her parent's house with her two brothers.  Ely has a business selling a variety of products including: clothing, toys and accessories for the home.  She makes her sales in the street from place to place, and her main customers are her friends, neighbors and relatives.  She has been doing this work for 2 years.  What she likes about this work is that she gets daily earnings, but she dislikes having to walk around so much.  But if she doesn't sell, she doesn't have the means to provide comforts for her child.  Her business is going very well; she thinks that as long as she dedicates herself she can always make good earnings.  Her desire is to someday have a toy store, but at the moment she lacks the capital to do this.  This will be her 3rd loan with MFP, and she feels comfortable with her communal bank because everyone is very responsible, and they solve problems together as a group.  With the sum requested she will buy more merchandise so that she can continue to offer a variety of products to her customers.

loans.use: to buy more clothing, toys and items for the home

loans.name: Linder

texts.es: Linder, de 41 años, es una hombre con muchas ganas de progresar, es muy responsable y desea darle lo mejor a su familia, Esta casado y tiene tres hijos de 19, 15 y 4 años. Juntos habitan en una casa propia en donde vive a lado de sus hijos y su esposa. EL trabajo de Linder consiste en el transporte de carga y pasajeros en su mototaxi, él sale desde muy temprano en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros, se moviliza de un lugar a otro en busca de clientes para así poder generar mayores ganancias en su día. Además, cuando puede realiza otras inversiones ya que posee dos mototaxis, de los cuales uno maneja y otro lo maneja un chofer. Paralelo a ello, vende ropa, zapatillas, que trae de la ciudad de Lima y los vende a amistades y familiares, así logra tener más ingresos. Tiene once años en el trabajo de transporte, mientras que en la venta de ropa y zapatillas recién dos años. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le permite disponer de su tiempo ya que el es docente de una institución educativa y trabaja medio tiempo ahí y el resto de las horas del día se dedica a trabajar en su mototaxi, es por eso que le esta yendo bien ya que genera ingresos. Este será el segundo crédito con la institución MFP, la primera vez que recibió un préstamo pudo invertirlo de buena manera teniendo buenas ganancias. Desea que le sigan otorgando los préstamo ya que le es de mucha ayuda para realizar la inversión en su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará repuestos0 ntre ellos toldos, llantas, y piezas del motor de sus mototaxi, además pagara al mecánico que le brindará el servicio de reparación de sus unidades.
texts.en:
Linder is 41 years old. He is a man with a great desire to get ahead. He is very responsible and wants to give his family the best. He is married and has three children who are 19, 15, and 4 years old. They all live together in their own house, he, his children, and his wife. Linder’s job is transportation of cargo and passengers in his motorcycle taxi. He goes out very early in search of his eventual passengers. He goes from one place to another, seeking clients so that he can generate good earnings each day. Also, when he can, he makes other investments because he has two motorcycle taxis, one of which he drives and the other is driven by a driver. Along with this business, he also sells clothing and shoes that he brings from the city of Lima, which he sells to friends and family so that can have more income. He has been working in the transportation business for eleven years, and has been selling the clothing and shoes for two years. 

What he likes about his job is that it allows him to manage his own time. He is a teacher at a school and works part time there and the rest of the hours in the day he spends driving his motorcycle taxi. This is why things are going well for him, because he is making money. This will be his second loan with the Microfinanzas Prisma institution. The first time he received a loan he was able to invest it in a good way and have good earnings. He hopes that they will continue granting him loans because they are a lot of help to him in investing in his business. With the amount requested, he will buy replacement parts such as tarps, tires, and motor parts for his motorcycle taxis. He will also pay the mechanic that will provide the service of fixing his taxis.

loans.use: to buy tarps, tires, and motor parts for his motorcylce taxis and also to pay the mechanic.

loans.name: Olmedo

texts.es: Olmedo, de 44 años, es un hombre separado, es padre de dos hijas de 17 y 15 años. Pero ellas viven a lado de su madre y cada mes le envía sus gastos y necesidades. Él vive en casa de su padres en compañía de ellos y de su hermana. El trabajo de Olmedo consiste en el transporte de pasajeros, desde muy temprano sale en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros. Tiene dos años dedicándose a esta labor, pero antes trabajaba como electricista hasta que un lamentable accidente le causo la mutilación de tres dedos. Ante ello decidió incursionar en este rubro de tranasporte. Hoy tiene dos moto taxis. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que le genera buenos ingresos, además tiene tiempo libre para poder realizar sus cosas. Este será el cuarto crédito con la institución MFP, le va bien en su grupo, gracias a los prestamos recibidos anteriormente ya que pudo comprar una moto más. En esta oportunidad solicita 3000 soles, con el monto utilizará para enviar a reparar sus dos mototaxis, ya que están deteriorados por el uso y el mal estado de las pistas por donde transita.
texts.en:
Olmedo is 44 years old. He is separated and is the father of two daughters who are 17 and 15 years old. They live with their mother and every month he sends them money for their expenses and necessities. He lives in his parent’s house, with his parents and his sister. Olmedo’s job consists of transporting passengers. He leaves very early in search of his eventual passengers. He has been doing this job for two years. He used to work as an electrician until an unfortunate accident caused the mutilation of three of his fingers. Facing that difficulty, he decided to get into the business of transportation. He now has two motorcycle taxis. What he likes about his job is that it generates good income and that he also has free time to do his own things. 

This will be his fourth loan with the Microfinanzas Prisma institution. Things are going well in his group. Thanks to the loans he has received previously he was able to buy another motorcycle taxi. This time he is requesting PEN 3,000.00. With this amount, he will have his two motorcycle taxis repaired because they are in a deteriorated state due to wear and tear and the poor condition of the streets where he drives.

loans.use: to send his two motocycle taxis to the mechanic.

loans.name: Rodolfo

texts.es: Rodolfo, de 31 años, es un hombre que se dedica mucho a su trabajo. Vive en compañía de su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de ocho años en casa de su madre. El trabajo de Rodolfo consiste en el transporte de pasajeros y carga dentro y fuera de la ciudad, el desde muy temprano empieza su labor, pues ha contratado a tres choferes que manejan cada uno un mototaxi, pues es dueño de cuatro unidades y uno lo maneja él. Tiene 10 años realizando este trabajo. Por otro lado, se dedica a la venta de comida, ya que en su casa posee un patio  para ejercer este negocio. Disfruta mucho su trabajo, gracias a ello tiene ingresos fijo y a diario. Mas adelante empezará a vender comida por las noches, así logrará tener mayores ingresos para su hogar. Este será el sexto crédito con la institución MFP, tiene todas las ganas de seguir trabajando mucho para poder pagar a tiempo sus cuotas, además manifiesta estar muy agradecido con los prestamos recibido ya que le sirvieron para invertir en su negocio. Con el monto solicitado, comprará tablas, listones de madera, y otros materiales para terminar el patio de su casa y así empezará a vender también por las noches, además invertirá en comprar ingredientes e insumos para la preparación de comida.
texts.en:
Rodolfo, 31, is a man who works very hard in his job.  He lives with his partner with whom he has an eight-year-old son in the house of his mother.

Rodolfo's job consists of transporting passengers and cargo in and outside the city.  He begins working very early, since he has hired three drivers who each drive a motorcycle taxi.  Rodolfo owns four motorcycle taxis and he drives one of them.  He has been doing this work for 10 years.

He also works selling food, since in his house he has a patio to carry out this business.  He enjoys his work a lot, and thanks to it he has fixed earnings daily.

Later he will begin to sell food at night so he will have greater income for his household.  This will be his sixth loan with the MFP institution.  He wants so much to continue working a lot to be able to make his payments on time.  He is very grateful for the loans he has also received that he used to invest in his business.

With the loan he is requesting he will buy planks, strips of wood, and other materials to finish his patio.  In this way he will begin to sell at night as well.  He also will invest in buying ingredients and supplies for preparing food.

loans.use: to buy strips of wood to equip the patio of his house and to buy materials to prepare food.

loans.name: Saroeun

texts.en:
Saroeun and her husband, Sokhann, live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1989 and have two sons and two daughters. Two assist in their parents' farming business and the other two are in school.
 
Saroeun and her husband are farmers. They grow cauliflower, cucumbers and other crops on their farmland in the village. 

Saroeun is requesting another loan of $1,200 to continue her farming business by buying seeds, fertilizer and pesticides and paying for plowing.

loans.use: To purchase seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain her farm.

loans.name: Chantha

texts.en:
Chantha and his wife, Samoeun (pictured together), live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1980 and have three sons and one daughter. 

Chantha and his wife sell mangoes. In addition, he also drives a motor taxi. He is applying for another loan of $1,000 to purchase mango under contract for sale.

loans.use: To purchase mango under contract for sale.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 19 años, es una joven madre muy alegre y amable, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de cinco meses. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. EL trabajo de Rosa consiste en la venta de productos de primera necesidad, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su casa en una concurrida calle, en donde vende azúcar, arroz, leche, detergentes, jabones, panes, y otros, además ella tiene ahí cosméticos y productos de belleza y algunos productos de perfumería. Tiene un año realizando esta actividad y le esta yendo bien, trabaja sola ya que su pareja se dedica a otras actividades. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que puede tener tiempo libre para hacer algunas otras actividades, además el dinero que genera en su negocio gira a diario, y gana buen porcentaje de ello. Espera abastecerse de más mercadería y mayor cantidad de productos para así tener más clientes en su bodega. Este será el primer crédito con la institución MFP, espera poder cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas de manera puntual y le gustaría trabajar juntos por mucho tiempo para que así pueda tener mayor capital.Con el monto solicitado, comprará productos para su bodega ya que le hace falta algunas variedades como jabón, detergente y leche que son las cosas que salen a diario en su bodega.
texts.en:
Rosa, 19, is a very happy and pleasant young mother.  She lives with her partner, with whom she has a five-month-old child.  They live in their own home.

Rosa's job is selling basic household necessities.  She has a small grocery store in her home on a popular street.  She sells sugar, rice, milk, detergent, soap, bread, and other products.  She also has cosmetics, beauty products, and some perfume products.  She has been doing this work for a year and it's going well for her.  She works alone since her partner works on other activities.

What she likes about her job is that she can have free time to be able to do other activities.  Besides, the money she generates in her business turns around daily, and she earns a good percentage of it.  She hopes to supply herself with more merchandise and a greater quantity of products to have more customers in her store.

This will be Rosa's first loan with the MFP institution.  She hopes to be able to make her payments punctually, and she would like to be able to work together for a long time so she can have greater capital.

With the loan she is requesting, she will buy products for her store, since she need a few items such as soap, detergent, and milk, which are the things that sell daily in her store.

loans.use: to buy soap, detergent, and milk.

loans.name: Roeun

texts.en:
Roeun and his wife, Khing, live along the Tonle Basac River, a tributary of the nearby Mekong River, about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh. They have been married since 1991 and have two sons and three daughters. Two are in school and the other three assist their parents in their farming business.

Roeun and his wife are vegetable farmers. He is asking for a loan of $600 to buy seeds, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his farm.

loans.use: To purchase seed, fertilizer and pesticide to maintain his farm.

loans.name: Samuon

texts.en:
Samuon is 54 years old and her husband, Theun, is 56 years old. They live in a village across the Mekong River about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have four sons and two daughters. Three are married and live outside the family home, one is a policeman and the others are in school.  

Samuon is a rice farmer. Her husband is a village leader and he also assists in his wife’s rice farm. 

Samuon is asking for a loan of $1,000 to renovate the house where she lives. She will also use a part of the loan to buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.use: To renovate the house where she lives and buy a motorbike for commuting.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario, de 34 años, es una mujer amable y muy responsables. Viven en compañía de su pareja, con quien tiene tres hijos de 15, 10 y 5 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia junto a su padre. EL trabajo de Rosario consiste en la venta de comida, todos los días ella vende menú en su casa pero solo a personas a quienes ella da pensión, trabaja en este negocio desde hace diez años, y lo hace sola. Asimismo los domingos se dirige a un centro educativo, donde se realizan campeonatos de ex alumnos y ahí aprovecha a vender parrilladas, cebiches y otros platos que sus clientes saben que llevará y esperan con ansias para deleitarse con su exquisita sazón. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que tiene independencia además de poder manejar ella su tiempo como mejor le parece, le esta yendo bien ya que genera mucho buenos ingresos, además tiene el apoyo de su pareja quien es el sostén en la economía de su hogar. Este será el cuarto crédito con la institución MFP, esta muy contenta de trabajar con su grupo ya que todos desde el principio le dieron muchos ánimos para ser una buena socia. Con el monto solicitado, comprará materiales para mejorar la infraestructura de su negocio en su casa, además comprará ingredientes e insumos para seguir con la preparación de sus deliciosos platos todos los días y fin de semana.
texts.en: Rosario, 34, is a very friendly and responsible woman.  She lives with her partner and their three children: 15, 10 and 5, in their own house next to her father.  Rosario sells food every day in her house but only to those people who rent from her.  She has been in this business for ten years and she handles it on her own.  She also works on Sundays at an educational center where ex alumni have camps.  There she sells grilled meat, ceviche (marinated shellfish) and other dishes that her customers know she will bring and they wait eagerly to enjoy her delicious food.  What she likes most about her work is that she is independent and she can work around her schedule as she sees fit.  The business is going well and generates good money.  She also has her partner’s support since he covers their  living expenses.  This will be her fourth loan with MFP.  She is very happy to work with this group since from the beginning they encouraged her to be a good member.  With the amount requested she will buy materials to improve the infrastructure of her home business, as well as to purchase ingredients and supplies to continue preparing her delicious food weekdays and weekends.

loans.use: to buy basic ingredients to prepare food

loans.name: Savuth

texts.en:
Savuth is 29 years old and her husband, Kosal, is 31 years old. They have been married since 2004 and have no children. They are living on an island in the Mekong River about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Savuth is a weaver and she raises pigs and chickens at home. Her husband is a motor taxi driver. 

She is asking for a loan of $1,200 to buy pig feed and more chickens to raise.

loans.use: To buy pig feed and more chickens to raise.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es: Vicente, de 31 años, es un hombre bueno y muy responsable. Vive en compañía de su pareja, con quien tiene dos hijos de 7 y 6 años en su casa propia.  El trabajo de Vicente consiste en el transporte de carga y pasaje dentro y fuera de la ciudad, el posee dos mototaxi, en una trabaja él movilizando a sus pasajeros, mientras que en el otro mototaxi trabaja un chofer que le alquila a diario. Por otro lado también tiene un galpón donde cria aves de corral, tiene un promedio de 300 pollos, EL proceso de crianza es de 40 días y los saca a vender en los diferentes mercados de la ciudad, tiene ya dos años en esta actividad,  mientras que con su mototaxi esta ya mas de 10 años. Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es la libertad que le da el hecho de poder andar por toda la ciudad ya que el admisntra su tiempo, por eso le esta yendo bien, pues gana bien con sus dos trabajos. Mas adelante desea consolidarse en la crianza de aves y comprar un par más de mototaxi más. Este será el tercer crédito con la institución MFP, le agrada pertenecer a este grupo ya que le va muy bien y sus socios son muy responsables. Con el monto solicitado, comprará muchas piezas para la refacción de sus dos mototaxi, tiene que restaurar el tapizado, llantas, los aros y dar mantenimiento.
texts.en: Vicente, 31 years old, is a good man and very responsible.  He lives in his own house with the company of his partner, with whom he has two children, 6 and 7 years old. Vicente’s work consists of the transport of cargo and passage within and outside the city. He has two motorcycle taxis. In one he works transporting passengers while in the other motorcycle taxi is rented to a driver daily. On the other hand, he has a barn where he raises poultry. He has an average of 300 chickens. The breeding process takes 40 days, and then he takes them to sell them in different markets in the city. He has two years in this activity, while with his motorcycle taxis he already has more than 10 years. What he likes about his job is the freedom that it gives him and being able to walk around the city on his own schedule. So it is going well and it pays well with his two jobs. Later he wants to strengthen his business raising birds and buy another pair of motorcycle taxis. This will be the third loan with the institution MFP. He likes belonging to this group as it is doing very well and he has very responsible partners. With the amount requested, he will buy many parts for the renovation of his two motorcycle taxis. He has to restore the upholstery, tires, rims and conduct maintenance.

loans.use: To send his motorcycles to the mechanic, buy parts, tires, and upholstery.

loans.name: Roel

texts.en:
Roel is 46 years old and married. He has two school-age children. He is from the village of Salimpono, Panaon Misamis Occidental.

To earn a living, he owns and operates a tricycle transport business for the people of his village. The main source of income for the business comes from offering tricycle transport services. Roel has been engaged in this business for over four years and earns approximately 6,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) a month doing this type of business.

In 2011, Roel joined GDMPC to seek monetary funds for business activities to make his family's lives better. Roel is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP, which will be used to repair an existing vehicle for better service. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Roel from GDMPC. 

He plans to save the revenue generated from his service business for the education of his two children, and use some to purchase an additional vehicle for transport.

loans.use: to repair an existing vehicle for better service

loans.name: Sokly

texts.en:
Sokly (pictured above) is a weaver. She also buys additional silk fabrics from weavers in her village and transports them to sell in other provinces. Her husband, Rithy, is now a security guard. Sokly is requesting a loan of US $700 to purchase a motorbike for her husband to get to work. 

The couple has been married since 2000, and they have two sons who are in school. They live on an island in the MeK. River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for her husband to get to work

loans.name: Mak

texts.en:
Mak (pictured here) is a motor taxi driver. His wife, Pao, is a tailor. The couple also raises fish at home. They live in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City and have three children, one son and two daughters. One is a garment-factory worker, another one attends school, and the other assists his parents in fish farming. 

Mak is asking for a loan of $500 to purchase a new motorbike because the old one breaks down often.

loans.use: to purchase a new motorbike

loans.name: Sok

texts.en:
Mrs. Sok is a 45-year-old married woman who has been living in Prey Chor, Kompong Cham Province. She is in the business of cultivating rice crops alongside her husband on her fields. Typically, she can earn around $2.00 per day from her farming business. She is the mother of four children, three of whom are living and working as garment-factory workers in Phnom Penh City.

As shown in the photo, Sok’s house is extremely old and damaged by weather conditions. It’s hard for the family to live there, and Sok actually wants to repair her house. However, she doesn’t have enough money. So she decided to ask for some funds from HKL and Kiva to buy wood, zinc, and other materials to fix this house. She is hopeful that all funders will kindly help her to fulfill her dream of having a comfortable house to live in. In the future, Sok intends to own a general store and sell mixed products to the people in her community.

loans.use: to buy more wood, zinc, and other materials to fix her house

loans.name: Pisey

texts.en:
Pisey  is 23 years old and her husband, Vanny is 30 years old. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have one young son. 

Pisey is a weaver and her husband is a farmer. She is asking for a loan of $500 to purchase seed, fertilizer and pesticide for her husband's farming business and to buy weaving materials for her weaving business.

loans.use: To purchase seed, fertilizer and pesticide and  to buy weaving materials.

loans.name: Vuth

texts.en: Vuth works as a garment factory worker in Ang Snoul, Kandal, Cambodia. Vuth works in order to raise her two children and support their educations. She normally works 8 hours a day. In the morning, she starts working from 7am-12pm and she starts again from 1pm-4pm in the afternoon. She is able to earn around $100 per month. Vuth wants to upgrade her living and provide her children good opportunities to join the university after they finish high school. So now she is taking out a loan in sum of $600 to purchase some piglets for raising. This loan provides her a chance to start up pig raising business. If this business creates a good profit for the family, she will expand it  in the future.

loans.use: to purchase some piglets for raising.

loans.name: Chho

texts.en: Chho is 36 years old and a diligent woman who lives in Ornlong Veng district, Siem Reap. To earn a living, she has to walk around the commune to buy recycled materials from the villagers, and then she resells them again for a profit to the recycled material industry. From this simple business, she normally generates an average of $4 per day to cover her household expenses. Chho has 4 children who live under her care and who she provides for. This is Chho’s first loan with Kiva. She has requested it to use as capital for the purchase of recycled materials. She hopes that this loan will help her make additional profit from this  business.

loans.use: to use as a capital for the purchase of recycled materials.

loans.name: Chem

texts.en:
Chem and her husband, Vit, live in a village about twenty-five kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 1999 and have five children-one son and four daughters. All of them are in school.  

Chem is a garment worker, while her husband raises pigs at home. She is applying for a loan of $500 to assist in her husband’s pig farming business by buying pig feed.

loans.use: To assist buy pig feed.

loans.name: Yman Jayzer

texts.en:
Yman Jazer is 18 years old and single. He is from the barangay of Cagay-anon, Sinacaban Misamis Occidental

Yman Jazer owns and operates a business venture in the services sector providing motorcycle transport to his village community. The main source of income for the business comes primarily from operating motorcycle transport services.

Yman Jazer has been engaged in his business for over 2 years and earns approximately 68000 PHP a month doing this type of business.

Yman Jazer became a member of GDMPC just this year and he has applied for a loan of 20000 PHP which will be used to purchase spare parts to repair his existing vehicle. This loan will be the first loan taken out by Yman Jazer from GDMPC. He plans to purchase additional vehicles for his transport business from the revenue generated.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for motorcycle repair

loans.name: Yon

texts.en:
Yon, pictured here, and her husband, Phally, live in a village across the Mekong River, about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have five sons and two daughters. Yon is a farmer who raises pigs at home, while her husband is a fisherman and farmer. 

Yon is requesting a 1,200 USD loan to assist her husband’s farming business by buying seed, fertilizer, and pesticide. She will also use a part of the loan to expand her pig farming business by purchasing more piglets.

loans.use: to buy seed, fertilizer, and pesticide and to buy piglets

loans.name: Seng

texts.en:
Seng and her husband sell vegetables at a rented booth in a local market of Ornlong Veng district, Siem Reap. The couple has good communication skills and is friendly to their customers. Seng, 50, has been engaged in this business since 2009 and typically earns around 4 USD each day to support her family. She really enjoys her business which is the sole source of her income. 

Seng is requesting a loan from the Kiva partner HKL to expand her business by purchasing additional kinds of vegetables to sell. She is thankful to the lenders who help improve her business activities.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables to sell

loans.name: Minea

texts.en:
Minea, who is pictured here, is 26 years old. She and her husband, Tharong, have been married since 2009 and have one young son. The family lives in a village outside of Phnom Penh City. Minea and her husband are garment workers.

Minea is requesting a 1,000 USD loan to purchase a motorbike to get to work.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike to get to work

loans.name: Chansiman

texts.en:
Chansiman, picutured here, is 28 and single. She lives with her widowed mother in a village outside of Phnom Penh City. Chansiman is a garment worker. 

Chansiman is requesting a loan of 800 USD to purchase a motorbike to get work. Currently, she travels to work by bicycle.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike

loans.name: Kheam

texts.en:
Kheam is 44 years old and the mother of five children. One of her children recently married and lives with her husband out of the house. Kheam is a local farmer as well as a plastic-kindling maker. She lives in the Ornlong Veng district. Kheam grows rice crops in the rainy season and spends most of her time during the dry season making plastic kindling that is normally used by housewives to produce fire. She can generate approximately 6 USD daily through her effort and skills. 

Kheam is requesting a loan to purchase an additional plot of land for farming.  She will use her remaining loan to buy the raw materials to make plastic kindling. She hopes that her loan will help increase her family’s income.

loans.use: to purchase a plot of land

loans.name: That

texts.en:
That (in the photo) sells Chinese noodles with soup in her village. Her husband, Mao, is a construction worker and helps his wife in the business when he is free. The couple has been married since 1993 and has three children--one son and two daughters. One is a garment worker, one attends school, and another one is still young. The family is living in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

That asked for a Kiva loan once already. She is now requesting another loan in the amount of US $1,000 to buy one more motorbike for her daughter who is a garment worker to get to work.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike for her daughter to get work

loans.name: Lack

texts.en:
Lack (pictured with her loom) is single and lives with her parents and brothers and sisters in a village across the Mekong River, about 15 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Lack is a silk weaver. Her parents are farmers. She is requesting a loan of $900 to continue her weaving business by buying silk material.

loans.use: to buy weaving material for her weaving business

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is married with no children yet. He is 30 years of age. He is from the village of Rizal Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. To earn a living, Julius owns and operates an Internet cafe for the students in nearby villages. His Internet cafe is for research, encoding, and printing. Julius has been engaged in his business for over three years and earns 8,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) doing this type of activity.

Julius joined GDMPC early this year to gain financial assistance from the cooperative to engage in business activities. Julius is requesting a loan of 30,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase one computer unit set. This is the first loan cycle he has taken out from GDMPC. He plans to use the returns from his business to help him build on space and not to rent anymore.

loans.use: to purchase one computer unit set

loans.name: Batbileg

texts.en:
