texts.en: Florencia is 53 years old, married, and has three children. She continues running her grocery store business. She sells basic household products such as rice, sugar, milk and cookies. She also continues selling chicha (a corn-based drink) and jora corn which is an ingredient used in making chicha. Florencia would like to expand and improve her grocery store business and her chicha business. She is requesting this loan to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk and noodles wholesale, and also to buy jora corn for preparing her chicha. Florencia is happy to be receiving her loan and pledges to make her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy products such as rice, sugar, milk and noodles wholesale, and to buy jora corn for making chicha

loans.name: Doris

texts.es: La señora Doris se dedica a la agricultura produciendo verduras y tuberculos; además, su esposo trabaja como albañil.  El credito lo requiere para la compra de dos vacas lecheras de mediana calidad ya que desea producir leche y mejorar los ingresos familiares con esta nueva actividad que es lucrativa en todo el sector del altiplano boliviano. Vive en casa en casa de sus padres la misma queda ubicada en la localidad de Palomar del departamento de  La Paz; está casada y aún no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que Doris obtiene un crédito con la esperanza de mejorar la situación económica de su familia y al mismo tiempo aumentar  su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Sra. Doris engages in agriculture, which includes growing vegetables and tubers. Her husband works as a bricklayer. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy two dairy cows of moderate quality. She wants to produce milk in order to improve the family income. This type of business is lucrative in every sector of the Bolivian highlands. Doris lives at home with her parents in the town of Palomar in the Department of La Paz. She is married and still has no children.

This is the first time Doris has obtained a loan. She hopes to improve her family’s financial situation and increase her operating capital.

loans.use: to buy two dairy cows.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.es:
Marcos, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, es agricultor, aprendió de su padre el oficio del cultivo, además atienden la venta de verduras y su esposa prepara tortillas para vender, son una familia trabajadora, se esfuerzan por tener todo en el hogar.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, como abono y herbicidas, para aplicarlos a la siembra de maíz, este préstamo le ayudara para tener lo necesario así que su trabajo pueda tener la producción abundante de maíz.
El objetivo de Marcos es apoyar a su familia, gozar de buena salud para trabajar todos los días y juntos poderse superar.
texts.en:
Marcos lives with his wife and three children.  He is a farmer - a trade he learned from his father.  He also sells vegetables and his wife prepares tortillas to sell.  They are a hard-working family who work hard in order to have everything their household needs.

Marcos is currently requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides to apply to his corn crop.  This loan will help him to have what he needs in order to enjoy an abundant production of corn.

Marcos' goal is to support his family, to enjoy good health so that he can work every day, and to make progress together with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his crops

loans.name: Luzmery

texts.es:
Luzmery, de 27 años de edad, convive con su pareja hace 11 años. Ambos tienen 4 hijos de 11, 5, 3 y 2 meses de nacida. Ellos viven en una casa propia en el distrito de La Unión. Luz, como la llaman de cariño, se dedica a la panadería. Desde el mes de mayo que el horno y el local se los compró a su suegro, ahora con mayor independencia puede disponer del negocio de acuerdo a sus necesidades. De ese modo, se encarga de preparar panes todas las noches, los que vende todas las mañanas en la puerta de su casa, y que aún no tiene un local adecuado para expenderlos. “Diario invierto 70 soles, comprando harina, azúcar y manteca; del preparado salen 25 latas de masa y por lata obtengo 35 panes”, explica Luz, además comenta que inmediatamente recupera sus 70 soles de capital y gana otros 70 soles, “es muy rentable”, agrega. En el trabajo apoyan su esposo y un personal al que pagan mensualmente, por ser una labor ardua y cansada. Antes, ella y su esposo vivían en una casa alquilada, ahora la compraron. Sus ansías de progreso no descansan, ahora están tramitando la licencia de funcionamiento para una bodega y panadería a la vez. Con su ayuda, Luzmery podrá acceder a su primer préstamo de MFP, por esa razón se muestra firme en su idea de pagar sus cuotas los días programados. Con el dinero del crédito, ella podrá comprar más insumos para la preparación de panes, tales como sacos de harina, sacos de azúcar y bolsas de manteca. 

a
texts.en: Luzmery, 27, and her partner have been together for 11 years.  They have a 2-month old baby and three older children who are 11-, 5-, and 3-years old, respectively  They live in a house they own in La Union.  Luz, as she's know, operates a bakery business.  She bought the bakery from her father-in-law in May so she can now manage it in a way that better suits her.  She makes batches of bread each night and sells what she makes in the mornings after.  She sells the bread from her house because she doesn't have a large enough shop for selling.  Luz says, "I spend 70 soles a day buying flour, sugar and butter to make" [a nightly batch of bread].  She says, too, that she makes back the 70 soles she spends on supplies plus another 70 soles.  "It's very profitable", she adds.  Her husband helps her with the business.  She also has an employee who she pays by the month to help her with the difficult and tiring work.  She and her husband rented before, but they own their own house now.  Luz's drive to get ahead knows no bounds: she is processing the paperwork to get the licenses she needs to operate the business as both a bakery and a shop.  With your help, Luzmery will be able to secure her first MFP loan.  She is committed to repaying the loan on time and says she will use it to buy flour, sugar, butter and the other supplies she needs to operate her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies for her bakery business.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
Santiago, vive con su esposa y tres hijos, él es agricultor en pequeño y administra una granja pequeña de pollos, él tiene 15 años de estar dedicado en esta actividad, lo aprendió a través de su padre.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas como abono y herbicidas, además de comprar pollos para la granja, este aporte será muy necesario para Santiago, ya que podrá aplicar lo necesario para el cultivo y aumentando su granja.
La aspiración de él es seguir mejorando, tanto los cultivos como la granja, así podrá dar a su familia lo necesario.
texts.en:
Santiago lives with his wife and three children.  He is a small-scale farmer and runs a small chicken farm.  He has been in this business, which he learned from his father, for 15 years.

Santiago is currently requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides.  He will also buy chickens for his farm.  This support is essential for Santiago as he will be able to apply what he needs to his crops and increase the size of his farm.

Santiago's aspiration is to continue improving, both with his crops and with his chicken farm, so that he can provide his family with what they need.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Marco Antonio

texts.es: El sr. Marco vive en la zona sur, el Sr. Marco se dedica a la construcción, es casado tiene 4 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el solo se ocupa de la manutención de sus hijos,  vive en casa familiar, es cliente antiguo en la institución ya que esta en su tercer ciclo anteriormente estaba en un grupo solidario, luego se le dio un crédito individual en el cual demostró un buen comportamiento de pago y por el cual se le esta otorgando este nuevo crédito. El crédito que esta solicitando es para comprar una mezcladora de cemento ya que tiene 2 contratos de construcción y no abastece con la que tiene. El sr. Marco es una persona trabajadora y  responsable.
texts.en:
Sr. Marco lives in the Zono Sur area. He works in construction, is married, and has four school-aged children. He alone provides support for them. He lives in the family home.

Marco is a longtime member of the institution as this is his third loan cycle. In the past he received a loan as a member of a group, but then he obtained an individual loan which he paid back responsibly. Now he is seeking a new loan to buy a cement mixer; he has two construction contracts and needs the cement mixer for this work.

He is a hardworking and responsible person.

loans.use: to buy a cement mixer

loans.name: Leonor Consuelo

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Consuelo; ella tiene 38 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia sigue en su negocio de agencia de turismo,ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,el negocio de transporte por el momento ya no lo esta realizando porque se esta dedicando el tiempo completo a su agencia de viajes,ella vende servicios a turistas nacionales y extranjeros a diferentes lugares como machupicchu,valle sagrado de los incas entre otros lugares,la socia por medio de este negocio saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de agencia de viajes . 
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
38-year old Sra. Consuelo is married and has three children. She continues operating her travel agency and works from 7 am to 6 pm. Her transport business is no longer operational at the moment as she is spending all her time on her travel agency. She helps both local and foreign tourists plan their journeys to different places such as Machu Pichu and the Sacred Valley of the Incas.

Through her business Consuelo is helping her children get ahead. She wishes to expand and better equip her travel agency. She is happy to get this loan and promises to repay the money.

loans.use: to expand and better equip her travel agency by buying a desk etc.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: El señor  Luís trabaja en un restauran como chef. El crédito lo requiere para la compra  insumos como carne, verduras, condimentos, etc.,  ya que desea abrir su propio negocio. Vive en casa en anticretico la misma queda  ubicada en la zona de San Pedro  de la ciudad de La Paz; Luis es soltero  y no  tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente obtiene un crédito en IMPRO y por sus deseos de superación y emprendimiento empresarial es que se canaliza a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Luis works in a restaurant as a chef. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy supplies such as meat, vegetables, condiments, and other products because he wants to open his own business. He lives in a rental house in the District of San Pedro in the city of La Paz. Luis is single and has no children.

This is the first time he has obtained a loan from IMPRO. Because he desires to succeed in this entrepreneurial endeavor, his loan request is being referred to Kiva.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, condiments, and other supplies for starting a food business.

loans.name: Rubia Carolina

texts.es:
Rubia, esta solicitando nuevamente un préstamo, ya que necesita comprar abono y herbicidas, también comprara unas plantas de chile, ella se decidió por el nuevo financiamiento debido al buen manejo que realizo en el préstamo anterior, ya que le permitió incrementar la producción y ganar en las ventas.
Su familia continua siempre trabajando, están contentos con los préstamos que Rubia está tomando, pues sirven para el trabajo de todos.
texts.en:
Rubia is now seeking a new loan as she needs to buy fertilizer and herbicides as well as some chili plants. She decided to apply for this new loan as she managed to pay back the first one easily, and it helped her to increase production and make more sales.

Her family continues working too. They are happy with the loans that Rubia is able to obtain as they help with everyone’s work.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, herbicides and chili plants

loans.name: Thimothe

texts.fr:
Client de 53 marie et père de 4 enfants qui sont tous sur le banc de l'école.A la fin de la guerre qu'a connu le pays, le Congo, il perd son emploi, et avec le peu d'argent qu'il avait il ouvre une mini station de pétrole et  avec le temps, il va ajouter des cartes prépayées.
Ayant déjà bénéficié de plusieurs prêts de Hope , il a su faire preuve de bonne volonté, il a fait des remboursements constants et a des épargnes considérables.

Avec ce nouveau prêt il va acheter 8 tonneaux de 200litres de pétrole soit 1600 litres et des cartes de differents réseaux comme Airtel,MTN, Congo Telecom.
Il fait preuve de plusieurs stratégies, comme vendre a ses clients des bidons de 25l et des litres et demi litres, ses recettes ont largement augmentes et il épargne toujours, avec ses benefices , il prend soin de sa famille .
Dans l'avenir il est entrain d'investir dans l'achat des équipements pour ouvrir une station service de vente de pétrole, gasoil et essence.
texts.en:
This Client is 53 years old, married, and has four children who are all in school. At the end of the war that afflicted the Congo, he lost his job, and with the little money that he had he opened a small petrol station. Over time, he also began to sell prepaid phone cards.
Having already received several loans from Hope, he has proved his willingness by making constant repayments and managing to set aside considerable savings.

He intends to use this new loan to buy eight 200-litre barrels of petrol, for a total of 1600 litres, and also phone cards for different networks such as Airtel,  MTN and Congo Telecom.
He has several strategies, such as selling his customers 25 litre cans as well as litre and half litre bottles. His revenues have greatly increased and he is able to add to his savings regularly. He wants to use his profits to take care of his family.
In the future he is going to invest in the purchase of equipment to open a service station selling oil, diesel and petrol.

loans.use: to buy phone cards and a small kerosene station

loans.name: Gobokamuhinzi Group

texts.fr:
Modeste fait partie du groupe Gobokamuhinzi. Il a 52 ans et il est marié avec 9 enfants de 12 à 32 ans, dont 5 scolarisés. Il a 1 personne en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Modeste est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire la race améliore du riz. Dans les prochaines années, Modeste voudrait acheter d’autres champs après la récolte. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Modeste belongs to the Gobokamuhinzi group. He is 52 years old. He is married, with nine children ranging from 12 to 32 years, five of whom are in school. He has one additional dependent apart from his children. His educational level is six years of primary school.

Modeste is a rice farmer. This is his first loan cycle with ACB. He is going to use his loan in order to buy chemical fertilizers for growing rice. His business strategy is to grow a better variety of rice. In the years to come, Modeste would like to buy additional fields after harvesting. He plans to use his income to support his children and provide for their education.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizers for growing rice

loans.name: Lilian Marisol

texts.es:
Lilian, vive con sus dos hijos D. 7 y 10 años D. edad, viven en casa D. una tía, ella administra una tienda donD. ofrece artículos D. primera necesidad, lleva 4 años en el negocio, todos los vecinos y amigos D. la zona son clientes.
Ella necesita un préstamo para la compra D. aceite, jabón, arroz, sal, cal, boquitas,  esta compra incrementara el inventario y le ayudara a mejorar la atención a la clientela.
Su aspiración es apoyar a sus hijos, darles el estudio para que se puedan superar, además D. esforzarse en el trabajo para tener ingresos y cubrir todas las necesidades.
texts.en:
Lilian lives with her two children who are 7 and 10 years old.  They live in an aunt's house.  Lilian runs a store where she sells basic household products.  She has been in this business for four years.  All her neighbors and friends from her area are customers.  

Lilian needs a loan to buy oil, soap, rice, salt, lime and snacks.  This purchase will increase her stock and will help her to improve her customer service.

Lilian's aspiration is to support her children, proviD. them with an education so that they can do well in life, and to work hard in her business so that she makes income with which to cover all her needs.

loans.use: to buy oil, soap, rice, salt, lime and snacks

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
El Sr. miguel Ángel, tiene 39 años de edad, casado desde hace 9 años, tiene 2 hijos de 1 y 9 años de edad, uno de ellos estudia en la escuela, vive en Las Flores Santa Bárbara.

Miguel tiene 20 años de dedicarse a la producción de café, ha trabajado con su familia la mayor parte de su vida, actualmente este negocio esta siendo muy rentable en el país. Hace tres años aproximadamente que compro un terreno de 2 manzanas para establecer su propia finca, el comenzó cultivando 0.5 de manzana ahora tiene cultivado 1.5 de manzana y su sueño es llegar a tener cultivado las 2 manzanas.  Esta muy feliz porque su finca es propia, esta bien ubicada, la zona es apta para este cultivo.  Adicional al café también siembra frijoles para el consumo.

La producción la vende en pergamino húmedo (grano fresco),para exportación en variedades Catimor y café Lempira.
Este es su primer préstamo, y es para invertirlo en comprar fertilizantes y herbicidas para mantenimiento de su finca.
texts.en:
Miguel Ángel is 39 years old, and he has been married for nine years.  He has two children; ages one and nine.  One of them goes to school.  He lives in Las Flores, Santa Bárbara.

Miguel has devoted himself to coffee production for 20 years.  He has worked with his family for the greater part of his life.  This business is currently very profitable in his country.  Approximately three years ago he bought two “manzanas” (a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters or 1.728 acres) of land in order to establish his own farm.  

He started cultivating 0.5 manzana, and now he has cultivated 1.5 manzanas.  His dream is to come to have cultivated the two manzanas.  He is very happy because the farm is his own, it is in a good location, and the zone is suitable for this crop.  In addition to the coffee he also grows beans for consumption.  He sells the production as wet parchment coffee (fresh bean) for exporting the Catimor and Lempira varieties of coffee.

This is his first loan.  He will use it to buy fertilizers and herbicides for farm maintenance.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and herbicides for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Eusebio

texts.es: El señor Eusebio tiene un pequeño taller de carpintería donde efectúa reparaciones de muebles y confecciona muebles nuevos. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como ser madera en diversas clases, cola, barniz, para continuar con su trabajo, pues es su única fuente ingresos .Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Pasankeri en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene cinco hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron anteriormente desde el año 2009. Esta es también la segunda vez que solicita que su crédito sea financiado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Eusebio works in a small carpentry workshop where he does furniture repair and produces new furniture pieces. The loan he is requesting will be used to buy materials such as different types of wood, glue, and varnish so that he can continue his work since this is his only source of income. Eusebio lives in his own home in the District of Pasankeri in the city of La Paz. He is married and has five children.

Eusebio is very satisfied with the previous loans he has received since 2009. This is the second time his loan request is being financed through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy wood, glue, varnish, and other supplies.

loans.name: Gladis Matilde

texts.es:
Gladis, tiene tres hijos de 9, 7 y 5 años de edad, vive alquilando vivienda, ella se dedica a la venta de pupusas, inicia desde las 2:00pm hasta las 8:00pm, además vende atol y pan en el mercado municipal.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de 3 quintales de maíz y aceite, papel plástico, quesillo, chicharrón, para la elaboración de las pupusas, esta compra le ayudara para mantener todos los materiales necesarios, así poder continuar en el negocio.
Las aspiración de Gladis es algún día poderles ofrecer a sus hijos una casa propia, que a través de su esfuerzo puedan un día estar más cómodos.
texts.en: Gladis has three children who are 9, 7 and 5 years old. They live together in a rental house. Gladis' business is selling pupusas. She starts work at 2.00pm and finishes at 8.00pm. She also sells atol (a drink) and bread in the town market. Gladis is requesting a loan to buy three 100lb sacks of corn, oil, plastic wrap, quesillo (soft cheese) and chicharrón (ground, cooked pork) for making her pupusas. This purchase will help her to have all the materials she needs so that she can continue in her business. Gladis' aspiration is to some day be able to offer her children a home of their own so that, through her hard work, they can one day be more comfortable.

loans.use: to buy three 100lb sacks of corn, oil, plastic wrap, quesillo (soft cheese) and chicharrón (ground, cooked pork).

loans.name: Gregorio

texts.es: El señor Gregorio se dedica a la Fabricación, arreglo y reparación de zapatos,  su taller se encuentra ubicado en su mismo domicilio, el vive por la zona de Pasanqueri, en casa familiar en la casa de su hermana, el se dedica  ya varios años a esa actividad,   tiene un hijo pero el Sr. Gregorio es soltero,  solicita el crédito para la compra de material para la fabricación y arreglo de zapatos, como cuero, hilos, etc.  Y así de esta manera poder  incrementar  su capital  de trabajo y también realizar  mantenimiento a su maquina de costura, es una persona joven y trabajadora se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Gregorio makes, mends and repairs shoes.  His workshop is located in his own home.  He lives in Pasanqueri district, in his sister's house.  He has been in this business for several years.  Gregorio has a son but he is single.  He is requesting this loan to buy materials for making and mending shoes such as leather, thread, etc.  In this way, he will be able to increase his working capital and also have maintenance work carried out on his sewing machine.  Gregorio is a young, hard-working person who feels grateful to the institution for the support they have given him.

loans.use: to buy raw materials such as leather and thread

loans.name: Gricelda Yamileth

texts.es:
Griselda, vive con su esposo, él trabaja como seguridad, y ella se dedica a la elaboración de loza (ollas, comales, sartenes de barro), ellos tienen aproximadamente 6 meses de estar casados, no tienen hijos por el momento, Griselda elabora sus productos de 8:00am a 12 mediodía, durante la tarde los deja que se sequen con ayuda del sol, en el día hace como 12 comales.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de barro, nacazcol, leña, y que tenga una parte de efectivo para disponer para el pago del transporte, este préstamo le ayudara para mantener la producción y poder generar para su hogar ganancias.
La aspiración de Griselda es que a través del apoyo de los préstamos, pueda aumentar sus ventas para comenzar a ahorrar para la construcción de su propia casa.
texts.en: Griselda lives with her husband who works as a security guard. Her business is making products from clay (pots, comales and skillets). She and her husband have been married for 6 months and don't have any children yet. Griselda makes her products from 8.00am to 12 o'clock midday. In the afternoon, she leaves her products outside to dry in the sun. She makes around 12 comales a day. Griselda is requesting this loan to buy clay, nacazcol (a dye) and firewood and to have some cash available so that she can pay for transportation. This loan will enable her to keep her production going and to make profits for her household. Griselda's aspiration is to increase her sales, through the support of loans, so that she can start saving up to build her own home.

loans.use: to buy clay, nacazcol (a dye) and firewood to make clay pots and comales (special griddles for cooking tortillas)

loans.name: Zoila Marina

texts.es:
Zoila, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de productos para el negocio, como las papayas, uvas, bananos, cebollas, tomates, papas, chiles, aguacate, ella se decidió a invertir nuevamente, ya que la mercadería comenzó a bajar en el negocio, y se vio en la necesidad para fortalecer la disponibilidad de frutas y verduras para los clientes. Estos préstamos le han ayudado a mantenerse en el comercio y continuar generando ganancias para su familia.
A través de los préstamos su negocio ha crecido, teniendo mayor número de clientes.
texts.en:
Zoila is again applying for a loan to buy produce for her business, such as papayas, grapes, bananas, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, chilis, and avocados.  

She decided to invest in her business again, as her merchandise was beginning to run low, and she needed to build up her supply of fruits and vegetables for her customers.

These loans have helped her stay in business, and continue generating income for her family. Through the loans, her business has grown, attracting more customers.

loans.use: To buy papayas, grapes, bananas, onions, tomatoes, potatoes, chilis, and avocados.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: El señor Guillermo tiene un pequeño taller de imprenta y además recibe una pensión por ser rentista jubilado. El crédito lo requiere para la cancelación de unos estudios dirigidos en el área grafica así mejorar los productos y servicios que ofrece a su distinguida clientela. Vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Villa Nueva Potosí en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y  tiene dos  hijos. El cliente se encuentra muy satisfecho con los créditos que se le otorgaron ya que le dieron la posibilidad de crecer como pequeño microempresario. Es muy loable su actitud de que, a sus 59 años de edad, haya decidido tomar unos cursos para estar mejor preparado en su área de trabajo.
texts.en:
Sr. Guillermo has a small print shop, but he also receives a retirement pension. The loan he is requesting will be used to pay for some graphic design courses so that he can improve the products and services he offers to his distinguished clientele. Guillermo lives in his own home in the District of Villa Nueva Potosí in the city of La Paz. He is married and has two children.

Guillermo is very pleased with the loans that have been granted to him because they have provided him the opportunity to grow as a small businessman. At 59 years of age, he should be commended for having the right attitude in deciding to take a few courses so that he can be better prepared in this line of work.

loans.use: to pay for courses in graphic design.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy tables, chairs, pots, pans, and food containers for the expansion of her restaurant.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Paulina; ella tiene 34 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de bebidas calientes en forma ambulatoria,la socia tambien esta trabajando en una empresa en el area de cocina,por medio del negocio y del trabajo la socia saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere que sus hijos terminen de estudiar. La socia solicita el préstamo para pagar las mensualidades de estudio de sus hijos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Paulina is 34 years old, in a common-law relationship, and has two children. She continues with her business of selling hot beverages as a street vendor. Paulina also has a job that involves cooking. Through her business and her job, she is able to help her children move forward. Paulina wants her children to finish school, so she is requesting a loan to pay their monthly tuition.

She is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to pay for her children's tuition.

loans.name: Martha

texts.es: La señora Martha trabaja elaborando pan y masitas en su propia casa. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como ser harina, huevos, azúcar y demás insumos, pues la demanda por sus productos ha crecido enormemente y necesita satisfacerla. Esto es muy bueno para ella pues significa mayores ingresos. Vive en casa en anticrético  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Villa Nueva Potosi en la ciudad de La Paz; es viuda y tiene cinco hijos.  Martha es cliente de Impro desde el año  2008 y su negocio ha crecido poco a poco. Esta será la tercera vez que su crédito es canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sra. Martha makes bread and pastries in her home. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy supplies such as flour, eggs, sugar, and other products. The demand for her products has grown enormously, so she needs to keep her customers satisfied. This is very good for her because it means she will have more income. Martha lives in a rented house in the District of Villa Nueva Potosi in the city of La Paz. She is a widow and has five children.

Martha has been a client of IMPRO since 2008 and her business has grown a little bit at a time. This will be the third time that her loan is being referred to Kiva for funding.

loans.use: to buy flour, eggs, sugar, and other supplies.

loans.name: Utamaduni Group

texts.en:
Salum, who is in his early 20 is single with one child of two years.  He has had a business of selling Irish potatoes and beans for two years . He works from 7 a.m to 8 p.m daily and is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Salum's  2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to take care of his child and increased  the Irish potatoes stock. He has paid back his loan successfully. He wants a loan to buy more sacks of Irish potatoes to sell to chips sellers and beans to shop keepers. He hopes to one day be able to increase his capital and buy more sacks of beans.

Salum will share this loan with his loan group "Utamaduni" which has 18 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of  Irish potatoes to sell to chips sellers and beans to shopkeepers.

loans.name: Fermin

texts.es: El señor Fermín tiene un vehículo que funciona como “trufi” (significa que tienen una ruta establecida) y  está afiliado en uno de los sindicatos de choferes de la ciudad de La Paz. El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehículo, pues necesita un cambio de todos los aceites y fluidos, además de un chequeo de frenos y del motor. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Achachicala en la ciudad de La Paz. Fermin es divorciado y tiene tres hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que solicita que su crédito sea canalizado a través de Kiva.
texts.en:
Sr. Fermín has a vehicle that functions as a “trufi” (a taxi that has an established route). He is affiliated with one of the taxi driver unions in the city of La Paz. The loan he is requesting will be used for the maintenance of his vehicle. All of the oil and fluids need to be changed. In addition, the brakes and the engine need to be checked. Fermín lives at his parents’ house in the District of Achachicala in the city of La Paz. He is divorced and has three children.

This is the second time that his loan request is being referred to Kiva.

loans.use: to pay for vehicle maintenance.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fabrics, thread, buttons, clasps, and zippers.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Asunta; ella tiene 50 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de compra y venta de papa y tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de menestras como quinua,trigo y cebada,la socia por medio de este negocio la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de papa y negocio de venta de menestras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar papa y menestras como quinua,trigo y cebada al por mayor.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Asunta is 50 years old, married, and has four children. She continues with her business of buying and selling potatoes. Asunta also sells grains such as quinoa, wheat, and barley. By continuing to work, she wants to expand her businesses of selling potatoes and grains. She is requesting a loan to buy potatoes, as well as grains such as quinoa, wheat, and barley in bulk.

Asunta is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to buy potatoes, quinoa, wheat, and barley in bulk.

loans.name: Ever

texts.es: Ever, de 24 años es un hombre trabajador. Vive en compañía de su esposa Gabriela con quien tiene 3 hijos: Brigith, Avilson y Mayte a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el anexo de Conopa. Gracias a su trabajo como albañil, este joven padre de familia, pudo comprar su casa propia a las afueras del anexo. Cada 20 días viaja a la capital donde trabaja en diferentes obras, pues ahí gana mayor cantidad de dinero. Como sus ingresos no son estables, pues dura muy poco; también se dedica a la siembra de arveja, habas y maíz en sus 3 hectáreas de terreno productivo. En está actividad se requiere de mucho cuidado, es por eso que cuando él se ausenta su esposa se dedica a cuidar sus sembríos, como también a las 180 ovejas y 2 cerdos que posee. De esa manera también tienen ingresos pues en cada cosecha comercializa su producción en la ciudad de Huancayo y vende las cabezas de ganado ovino y porcino, cuando le soliciten los carniceros. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Conopa” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas. Ever de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un toro pequeño para el arado de la tierra.
texts.en: Ever, who is 24 years old, is a hardworking man.  He lives in the company of his wife, Gabriela, with whom he has 3 children:  Brigith, Avilson and Mayte.  He takes care of them in his own house, which is located in the Conopa annex.  Thanks to his work as a brick layer, this young man and husband was able to purchase his own house in the outskirts of the annex.  Every 20 days he travels to the capital where he works on different projects, since that is where he earns more money.  Since his income isn't stable, it doesn't last very long.  So he also earns a living growing peas, beans and corn in his 3 hectares of productive land.  This is a business that requires a lot of care, so when he is away, his wife takes care of his plantings, as well as the 180 sheep and 2 pigs that he owns.  This is another source of income, since at each harvest he sells his produce in the city of Huancayo and sells heads of sheep and pig when the butchers request them.  Ever belongs to the communal bank “Conopa” and this is his first loan with MFP, with whom he hopes to collaborate to continue with his objectives.  In addition, he promises to be punctual in repaying his loans.  Upon receiving his support, Ever will invest the money in the purchase of a small bull to plow his land.

loans.use: to purchase a small bull.

loans.name: Cecilio

texts.es:
Cecilio, es casado, vive con su esposa y dos hijos de 27 y 16 años de edad; Cecilio trabaja en la crianza de cerdos y ganado, esta actividad necesita mucha dedicación, se levanta desde muy temprano para atender los corrales, además le gusta sembrar maíz, por lo que no tiene un horario fijo para atender sus ocupaciones, Tambien en su vivienda tiene una tienda de productos domesticos que su esposa en su mayoria de tiempo atiende.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para  la compra de una vaquilla y un cerdo, esta compra le servirá para reforzar el negocio, aumentando su granja, y permitiéndole una mayor rentabilidad en el negocio.
Los sueños de Cecilio son: tener un corral más amplio, con más ganado y cerdos, crecer en el mercado con la venta, y mejorar las condiciones de vida de la familia.
texts.en:
Cecilio is married and lives with his wife and two children, ages 27 and 16.  Cecilio works raising pigs and cattle.  This work requires a lot of dedication.  He gets up very early to take care of the corrals.  He also likes to grow corn.  He doesn't have a fixed schedule to take care of his jobs.  Also, in his home he has a store of household products that his wife tends to most of the time.

He is requesting a loan to buy a heifer and a pig.  This purchase will serve to strengthen his business, expanding his farm and allowing him a greater profitability in the business.

Cecilio's dreams are to have a bigger corral with more cattle and pigs, to grow in the market with sales, and to improve the living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to buy a heifer and a pig.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: La señora Elizabeth trabaja como profesora en una unidad educativa estatal de la ciudad de La Paz y su esposo es técnico electricista. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de ladrillo, cemento, arena, estuco para  refacción de un par de habitaciones de su casa. Vive en casa propia  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Tembladerani en la ciudad de La Paz; Elizabeth es casada y tiene tres hijos. Ella es cliente de IMPRO desde el año 2005; esta será la segunda vez que su solicitud de crédito sea canalizada a través de Kiva por deseo de Elizabeth.
texts.en: Elizabeth works as a teacher at a public school in the city of La Paz and her husband’s an electrician.  She needs the loan to buy bricks, cement, sand and stucco to repair a couple of rooms in her house.  She lives in her own house located in the city of La Paz’s Tembladerani zone.  Elizabeth is married and has three children.  She’s been an IMPRO client since 2005.  This will be the second time her loan request will be channeled through Kiva as per Elizabeth’s request.

loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Aouth Guenold

texts.fr:
Client de 23 ans, celibataire sans enfant, il se lance dans la menuiserie après son brevet d'études  techniques.Ayant deja beneficie de plusieurs cycles de pret, il a agrandi son atelier et a un petit atelier d'exposition des meubles, il a rembourse avec succes et il a favorablement epargne.Ses revenus ont largement augmentes , il a en moyenne 300.000 frs a 450.000frs par mois.

Avec ce nouveau prêt, il va continuera agrandir son atelier en achetant des planches comme les bastings, des lattes, contre plaques, des éponges , des tissus en velours et des boites de colles.
Il use des nouvelles  stratégies  pour faire avancer son activité, il fabrique des tableaux, des tabourets, des pouffes et des tables de cuisines , des tires lires, des tables a manger et des fauteuils sur commande  qu'il vend a tout instant a des prix favorables. 
Pour le futur , il a l'ambition d'être un grand entrepreneur,et commencer avec des cours d'apprentissage de menuiserie aux jeunes défavorisés.
texts.en:
This client is 23 years old, single, with no children. He entered the profession of furniture making after obtaining his technical studies certificate. 

As he has already enjoyed several previous loans, he has been able to expand his workshop and he has a small furniture showroom. The loans were properly repaid, and he has been able to save. 

His income has increased substantially, now averaging 300,000 to 450,000 francs/month. With this new loan, he will continue to expand his workshop by purchasing supplies such planks, slats, plywood, sponges, velour fabric and boxes of glue. Using new strategies to advance his business, he makes trays, stools, ottomans, kitchen tables, money banks, dining tables and armchairs to order, which he sells at competitive prices. 

In the future, he plans to become a successful entrepreneur, starting with offering apprenticeships to at-risk youth.

loans.use: to purchase materials like plywood, nails, glue, sponge, velour material

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy school supplies.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es: El señor Nelson tiene un taxi con el que trabaja en transporte Libre de pasajeros; además trabaja como profesor de educación física en una unidad educativa privada. El crédito lo requiere para el mantenimiento de su vehículo, pues necesita cambio de aceites y fluidos y un chequeo general de frenos, caja de cambios y llantas. Vive en casa de sus padres  la misma queda ubicada en la zona de Alto San Pedro en la ciudad de La Paz; es soltero y no tiene hijos.
texts.en: Nelson has a taxi that he uses to provide passenger taxi services; he’s also a Physical Education teacher at a private school.   He needs the loan to provide maintenance for his taxi because it needs an oil and other fluids change and a general brake check, transmission repair and new tires.  He lives in his parents’ house located in the city of La Paz’s Alto San Pedro zone; he’s single and has no children.

loans.use: to pay for taxi maintenance.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, D. 29 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía D. Raúl, su esposo desD. hace 11 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el anexo D. Conopa. Como padres responsables, desean una buena educación para sus hijos; por ello alquilaron un cuarto en L. ciudad D. Huancayo, dónD. sus hijos puedan estudiar. Todas estas responsabilidades lo asumen juntos, como pareja. Su esposo, trabaja en el trasporte público con el carro que posee, su ruta es muy larga, por lo que a veces tarda un día en regresar a su casa, ahí obtiene una ganancia D. 100 soles como mínimo al día. Aún están terminando D. pagar el carro que compraron con esfuerzo. Por su lado Carmen, se dedica a L. agricultura con L. siembra D. papa, habas, maíz y arveja e sus terrenos propios, los que en cada cosecha comercializa en L. feria D. L. localidad D. Acostambo. Además cría vacas y cerdos en cantidad, los que enseba para luego comercializarlo a los carniceros que visitan su zona. Ahora elL. desea mejorar sus ingresos y terminar D. pagar su carro, pues es su principal preocupación. ElL. pertenece al grupo solidario “Conopa” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donD. está muy contenta D. saber que recibirá el apoyo que tanto necesita. Además cultiva L. responsabilidad en su asociación, por ello promete ser puntual con el pago D. sus cutas.  Carmen comenzará con su sembrío, por ello D. recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en L. compra D. un toro para arar L. tierra, pues cuenta solo con uno y necesita dos.
texts.en: Carmen, who is 29 years old, is a hardworking woman.  She lives in the company of Raúl, her husband of 11 years.  They have 3 children, who they care for in their own house, which is located in the Conopa annex.  As responsible parents, they hope to give their children a good education.  And so they rented a room in the city of Huancayo where the children can study.  They take on all their responsibilities together, as partners.  Carmen's husband works in transportation using the car he owns.  His route is very long, and so sometimes it takes an entire day for him to get back home.  He earns a minimum of 100 soles a day.  They are still finishing up paying off the car, which took a lot of effort to purchase.  Carmen, on the other hand, makes her living in agriculture.  She plants potatoes, beans, corn and peas on her own land.  She sells her produce after each harvest in Acostambo's market.  In addition, she raises a lot of cows and pigs which she fattens to later sell to the butchers who visit the area.  For now, she hopes to improve her profits and finish paying off the car, which is her primary concern.  Carmen belongs to the communal bank “Conopa,” and this is her third loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will receive the help that she really needs.  In addition, she encourages responsibility in the association, which is why she promises to be punctual in making her payments.  Carmen will start with her plantings, and once she receives the support, she will invest the money in the purchase of a bull to plow the land.  She currently has one bull, but she needs two.

loans.use: to purchase a bull.

loans.name: Elmer Dubey

texts.es:
El señor Elmer tiene 35 años de edad, es soltero, reside en la comunidad rural del Peñón en el municipio de Taulabe.
El vive en compañía de sus padres, siendo el único responsable del cuidado y sustento familiar.
La actividad económica de Don Elmer es la agricultura, dedicándose a la producción del cultivo de café. Desde muy joven  aprendió con la ayuda de su padre a cultivar la tierra. 
Actualmente tiene una parcela de café en producción y espera aumentar el área en dos manzanas más de finca con el financiamiento que ha solicitado.
Los recursos económicos para invertir en su cultivo los ha obtenido de préstamos  que ha sabido administrar muy bien, considera el apoyo financiero muy importante ya que le ha permitido brindar la asistencia técnica al cultivo.
Él espera obtener buenos ingresos en esta cosecha ya que la producción de café tiene buena rentabilidad y los precios son estables.
texts.en:
Elmer is 35 years old and single.  He lives in the rural community of Peñon in the Taulabe municipality.  He lives with his parents as he is the only one responsible for the care and support of his family.

Elmer’s business is farming.  He devotes himself to growing coffee.  When he was very young he learned, with help from his father, how to cultivate the land.  He currently has a parcel of coffee in production.  He hopes to use the requested loan to increase his farm with two more “manzanas” (a land measurement unit equivalent to 7000 square meters or 1.728 acres).

He has gotten the financial resources to invest in his crops from the loans that he has known how to manage very well.  He considers the financial support to be very important because it has allowed him to provide technical assistance to his crops.

He hopes to get good income with this harvest because coffee production is very profitable and the prices are stable.

loans.use: to buy supplies and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es: Elizabeth, de 26 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Fredy, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Herli y Odaliz, a los que cuidan en su casa propia ubicada en el caserío de Quebrada imperial. Todas las mañanas como es de costumbre, se dirige a cuidar de sus terrenos de cultivo; sus principales sembríos constan de maca y diversas variedades de tubérculos. También comparte su tiempo con el cuidado de sus hijos, a los que lleva a la escuela y alimenta. Pero los fines de semana la dedican a su esposo, quien regresa de la ciudad de Pampas, donde trabaja como albañil en el gobierno local. Juntos, se dirigen a sus terrenos para ver como se encuentran creciendo, además de disfrutar del hermoso paisaje de Quebrada. Los planes de está pareja es terminar de construir su casa y mejorar sus sembríos, pues tienen 2 hectáreas de terrenos productivos, donde quieren sembrar productos de calidad y de esa manera obtener buenas ganancias. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Los puquiales” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado promete una vez más, cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal; porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Elizabeth, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en completar el dinero para la compra de 250 kilos de semilla de maca que piensa sembrar.
texts.en: Elizabeth, who is 26 years old, is a hard-working woman.  She lives in the company of Fredy, her husband.  They have 2 children, Herli and Odaliz, who they take care of in their own house in the village of Quebrada Imperial.  Every morning, as usual, Elizabeth tends to her planted fields.  Her main crops are maca and several varieties of tubers.  She also spends time taking care of her children, who she takes to school and feeds.  But the weekends are dedicated to her husband, who returns from the city of Pampas, where he works as a bricklayer for the local government.  Together, they head out to their plots of land to see how the crops are growing and to enjoy to beautiful Quebrada landscape.  The pair's plan is to finish construction on their house and to improve their plantings.  They have 2 hectares of productive land on which they want to plant high quality products and thereby earn a better profit.  Elizabeth belongs to the  “Los Puquiales” communal bank, and this is her second loan with MFP.  She hopes for their help to be able to fulfill her plans.  In addition, she promises once again to comply with her payment plan, like she did with her previous loan.  Also, she is grateful to be a part of the communal bank because all of the members are responsible and supportive people.  Elizabeth, once she receives her support, will invest the requested money in the purchase of 250 kilos of maca seeds, which she intends to plant.

loans.use: to purchase 250 kilos of maca seeds.

loans.name: Santusa

texts.es: La señora Santusa se dedica  a la confección de sombrillas y carpas,  es una cliente antigua, trabaja con en el banco de emprendimiento Bienvenidos, tiene una familia de 2 miembros y su esposo se encuentra de viaje en la ciudad de Santa Cruz por motivos de trabajo, la Sra. Santusa  se encuentra confeccionando sombrillas y con el crédito tiene pensado comprar fierro y lona para poder rebajar sus costos comprando por cantidad, ella piensa estocarse de materia prima para poder abastecer la demanda que existe de estas sombrillas en época de lluvia, con el tiempo tiene pensado agrandar su negocio y que su esposo permanezca en la cuidad de la paz y que sus ingresos mejoren.
texts.en: Santusa's business is making umbrellas and tents.  She is a long-standing client and works with the 'Bienvenidos' (Welcome) community bank.  Her family has two members and her husband is away in the city of Santa Cruz for work reasons.  Santusa sews umbrellas and she plans to use her loan to buy metal and canvas so that she can lower her costs by purchasing in bulk.  She plans to stock up with raw materials so that she can meet the demand that exists for her umbrellas during the rainy season.  Over time, she plans to expand her business, for her husband to stay in the city of La Paz, and for their income to improve.

loans.use: to buy metal and canvas for making umbrellas

loans.name: Mapinduzi Group

texts.en:
Salumu, who is in his early 20s, is single with one child who is still a baby.  He has had a fruit and vegetables business for three years now.  He works from 5 a.m to 9 p.m daily and is able to make a good monthly profit. 

This will be his 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  He used the previous loan to take care of his child and increased his business. He has paid back his loan successfully.  He wants a loan to buy more fruit and vegetables to sell. His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Mapinduzi" which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy more fruit and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia es la Sra. Hilda; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia se sigue dedicando al negocio de venta de plateria,ella vende aretes,anillos y collares y tambien la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de tejidos y textiles,la socia vende en la plaza de Chinchero,la socia por medio de este negcoio saca adelante a sus hijos,la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de plateria y negocio de venta de tejidos y textiles . La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar aretes,collares y anillos y tambien para comprar tejidos y textiles al por mayor.
La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Hilda is 35 years old, married, and has two children. She continues with her business of selling silver jewelry such as earrings, rings, and necklaces. Hilda also has a business of selling woven products and textiles. She sells in the town square in Chichero. Through these businesses, she is able to help her children move forward. Hilda wants to expand both her businesses of selling earrings, necklaces, and rings, as well as woven products and textiles. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to purchase these items in bulk.

Hilda is happy with the loan and promises to complete her payments.

loans.use: to purchase woven products, textiles, and silver jewelry to sell.

loans.name: Norbil

texts.es: Norbil, de 22 años es un joven emprendedor. Vive en compañía de su mamá Emilia su papá Leoncio y sus 3 hermanos menores; en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad de Huancayo. Como todo joven, tiene planes y los está concretando. Siempre ayudó a su padre en su negocio de compra y venta de sombreros típicos de la zona. Ya cuando comenzó a estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Civil, en una universidad reconocida; se abrió paso el mismo y con la experiencia heredada, comenzó a vender sombreros de paño boliviano; pero esta vez en diferentes lugares del Perú, como Huancavelica, Huanuco y Bolivia, donde el viaja constantemente. Le va muy bien en su negocio tanto así; que hace 2 meses abrió un pequeño locutorio, donde sus clientes pueden llamar a cualquier parte del país y del mundo, es así que desea invertir más en sus negocios y de esa manera poder apoyar a sus hermanos y terminar su carrera y así ser un profesional respetable. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Conopa” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además agradece la oportunidad que le brinda, razón por lo que promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.  Norbil, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de sombreros para surtir su mercadería.
texts.en: Norbil, 22, is a young entrepreneur.  He lives with his mother, Emilia, and his father, Leoncio, and three younger siblings.  They live in their own house in the city of Huancayo.  Like all young people, he has goals and is focused on them.  He always helped his father in the business of selling traditional hats from the area.  When he began his Civil Engineering studies at a well-known university he set out on his own with the experience he had gained and started selling Bolivian felt hats.  But he sold them in different places in Perú such as Huancavelica and Huanuco, and in Bolivia, where he travels constantly.  Business is going well for him and two months ago he opened a small telephone services outlet where customers can call any part of the country or world.  He wants to invest in even more businesses so he can help his siblings and finish his education and become a respectable professional.  He belongs to the communal bank "Conopa" and is requesting his first loan through MFP, where he is counting on support to carry out his plans.  His is grateful for this opportunity and committed to paying back the loan on time.  Norbil plans to use the loan to buy hats to increase his inventory.

loans.use: To buy hats to increase his inventory.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo, de 28 años es un hijo admirable. Vive en compañía de su mamá Sofía y su papá Eulogio; a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Chilca.  Todas las mañanas desde las primera hora del día, se prepara para realizar un viaje largo, pues él se dedica al trasporte público, cubriendo las rutas de Huancayo hacia la ciudad de Ayacucho, el viaje dura un promedio de un día, por eso siempre va preparado para cualquier desgracia que tuviera. Gana un promedio de 60 soles diarios; pero los fines de semana tiene mayor pasajeros y puede hacer hasta dos viajes, todo depende la cantidad de personas que soliciten sus servicios. Ahora desea incursionar en el negocio de cabinas de Internet, donde los jóvenes y adultos que no cuenten con Internet en casa, puedan navegar. Para ello ya dio el primer paso, con la compra de algunas computadoras y la instalación de red. Aún le falta capital de trabajo, por ello incursionó en su asociación y está seguro que logrará su objetivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Conopa” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera del apoyo de todos ustedes; pues tiene muchos planes. Además promete ser puntual con el pago de sus cuotas.  Wilfredo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 computadoras nuevas para su negocio.
texts.en: Wilfredo, 28, is an admirable son.  He lives with his mother, Sofía, and his father, Eulogio, and takes care of them in their own home in the district of Chilca.  In the early morning he gets ready for work since he is a public transport driver and covers the long route between Huancayo and the city of Ayacucho.  The average trip takes a whole day and he must always be prepared for any type of accident.  He earns an average of 60 PEN a day.  On weekends he has more passengers and can do two trips, depending on the number of people requiring his services.  Now he wants to go into the Internet services business for young people and adults who do not have Internet at home.  He has already taken the first step buying computers and installing a network.  He needs more working capital and joined the association because he is sure he can meet his objectives.  He belongs to the communal bank "Conopa" and this is his first loan through MFP.  He is counting on your support since he has many plans.  He is committed to paying back the loan on time.  Wilfredo plans to use the loan to buy two new computers for his business.

loans.use: To buy two computers.

loans.name: Jose Vidal

texts.es:
José, vive con sus cinco hijos de las edades de 24, 22, 18, 16, 14 años, él es viudo, dos de sus hijos estudian, los demás le ayudan a él en su oficio que es la crianza de cerdos y ganado, José aprendió este oficio por la necesidad de proveer para sus hijos, lo atiende desde las 5:00am.
Actualmente solicita un préstamo para la compra de una vaca horra y además comprara concentrado para los cerdos, este préstamo le ayudara para aumentar el número de ganado y para tener disponible la alimentación para los cerdos, el riesgo que corre es en el verano que aumentan los precios en el alimento para el ganado y los cerdos.
La aspiración de José es mejorar sus pastos, aumentar el ganado y ayudar a sus hijos, enseñándoles el oficio de la ganadería y permitiéndoles estudiar.
texts.en:
José lives with his five children who are 24, 22, 18, 16 and 14 years old.  He’s a widower.  Two of his children go to school and the rest help him in his business which is raising pigs and cattle.  José learned this occupation because he needed to support his children.  He starts work at 5am.

At present, he asks for a loan to buy a grazing cow and also to buy feed concentrate for the pigs.  This loan will help him increase his herd size and to have feed available for the pigs.  The risk he runs is that feed prices for cattle and for pigs rise in summer.

José’s goal is to improve his grasses, increase his herd size and help his children teaching them animal husbandry and allowing them to study.

loans.use: to buy a grazing cow and pig feed concentrate.

loans.name: Santa

texts.es:
Santa cuenta con 48 años de edad es soltera tiene un hijo el cual se  llama óscar él se encuentra estudiando 1º grado de preparatoria.

Ella es maestra y también se dedica al comercio vende comida en el mercado santa invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los insumos para elaborar la comida como son: aceite, verduras, carne, etc. ahora solo espera que le ayude a mejorar su negocio ya que le gustaría que su negocio creciera y  establecer una local con una fonda para vender su comida.
texts.en:
Santa is 48 years old.  She is single and has one son called Óscar who is in his first year of high school.

Santa is a teacher and also has a business selling food in the market.  She will invest her loan in buying supplies for making her food such as oil, vegetables, meat, etc.  She hopes that this will help her to improve her business as she would like her business to grow and would like to set up a small restaurant where she can sell her food.

loans.use: to buy supplies for making food such as oil, vegetables, meat, etc.

loans.name: Jose Alfredo

texts.es:
José Alfredo cuenta con 23 años de edad, es casado tiene dos hijos uno que está cursando 1º grado de primaria se llama Betza y Alan solo tiene 1 año de edad su esposa se llama Silvia se dedica a ama de casa.

El se dedica al comercio vende huaraches lo cual invirtió su préstamo en surtir  mas modelos de huaraches, a José le gustaría que su negocio creciera un poco mas ya que quiere establecer un local para poner su negocio.
texts.en:
José Alfredo is 23 years old, married and has two children, one named Betza who is in the first grade, and Alan who is only one year old. His wife is named Silvia and she devotes herself to keeping up the home. 

He devotes himself to business. He sells sandals, and invested his loan in stocking up on more models of sandals. José would like his business to grow a little more since he wants to establish a storefront from which to run his business.

loans.use: to stock up on more models of sandals.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia, de 21 años es una mujer joven y con muchas ambiciones. Sola cuida de su pequeña hija Asumi, a la que cuida con mucho amor en casa de su tía, ubicada en el anexo de Conopa.  Su principal característica es la sonrisa que irradia de su rostro. Ella es una mujer responsable y con mucho coraje. Cuando tenía 18 años su madre murió, desde entonces se dedicó a producir los terrenos agrícolas que heredó. Ahí siembra quinua y linaza en gran cantidad, cuenta que tiene 8 parcelas; las que después de la cosecha comercializa a los mayorista de Acostambo. Al mismo tiempo cría cerdos y ovejas que enseba para luego vender su carne a un mayor precio. Pero la actividad que le brinda buenas ganancias, es la venta de sombreros típicos, en las diferentes ferias de la ciudad. Cuenta que gana un promedio de 10 nuevos soles por cada ejemplar vendido. Su meta, es vender más sombreros, “tengo que recorrer todas la ferias”, comenta; ya que de esta manera será conocida y obtendrá nuevos clientes. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “Conopa” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar. Además promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. 
Sonia, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sombreros para abastecer su negocio.
texts.en:
21-year-old Sonia is a young woman with a lot of ambition.  She cares for her young daughter, Asumi, on her own.  She looks after her, with a lot of love, in her aunt's house which is located in the small village of Conopa.  Sonia's main feature is the smile that lights up her face.  She is a responsible woman who has a lot of courage.  Her mother died when she was 18 years old and Sonia started growing crops on the farmland that she inherited.  There she grows quinoa and linseed in large quantities.  She tells us that she has eight plots of land.  After she harvests her crops, she sells them to the wholesalers in Acostambo.  At the same time, she also raises pigs and sheep which she fattens so that she can later sell their meat for a higher price.  However, the business that makes her the most money is selling traditional hats in the different street markets in the city.  She says that she earns, on average, 10 soles for each hat she sells.  Her goal is to sell more hats.  "I have to cover all the markets" she says, as in this way she will become well known and will gain new customers.

Sonia belongs to the 'Conopa' community bank and this is her second loan from MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support as this makes her feel certain that she will make progress.  For her part, she pledges to be punctual in making her loan repayments.  With your help, Sonia will invest the money she has requested in buying several hats with which to stock her business.

loans.use: to buy a variety of hats in different designs to stock her business

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María cuenta con 50 años de edad es casada tiene a cargos tres nietos lo cuales están estudiando linda está cursando 2º grado de prepa, cristina esta en 2º de secundaria y maría de los ángeles esta en 4º grado de primaria, su esposo se llama Leobardo se dedica al campo.

Ella se dedica al comercio vende mariscos y zapatos por catalogo lo cual invertirá su préstamo en la compra de los mariscos para salir a vender y surtirá su pedidos pendientes a doña maría le gustaría que su negocio fluyera un poco mas ya que lo quiere incrementar aun mas.
texts.en:
María is 50 years old, married, and is responsable for three grandchildren who are in school. Linda is in her second year of high school, Cristina is in the second year of middle school and María de los Ángeles is in the fourth grade. Her husband Leobardo devotes himself to rural activities. 

She devotes herself to business, selling seafood and shoes by catalog. She will invest her loan in the purchase of seafood for selling door-to-door and will fulfill her pending orders. Doña María would like business to flow more since she wants to expand her business even more.

loans.use: to purchase seafood for selling door-to-door and fulfill her pending orders.

loans.name: Blanca Maritza

texts.es:
La señora Blanca tiene 38 años de edad y vive en la aldea Rio Chiquito en el municipio de El Progreso. Ella tiene 3 hijos de 18, 15, y 12 años de edad, los cuales están estudiando.  Su esposo Reyes es agricultor y la pareja lleva 18 años de casados. La familia depende de los ingresos de la pareja para vivir. 

Blanca tiene una pulpería donde vende una gran variedad de productos incluyendo lácteos, granos, carnes, embutidos, harina, frijol, pan, manteca y golosinas. Ella se puso la pulpería hace 4 años debido a sus deseos de superarse. Ella nota que había una demanda para el negocio porque la gente comentaba que hacía falta una pulpería en el barrio.

Un crédito anterior le ayudó a surtir más el negocio. Con el crédito actual de L21,000, Blanca va a aumentar su inventario comprando granos básicos, manteca, pan, refrescos y golosinas. Ella espera ofrecer una buena variedad de productos y tener satisfechas las necesidades de sus clientes. También desea superar las bajas ventas que ella atribuye a las fuertes lluvias que han caído en Honduras.
texts.en:
Blanca, age 38, lives in the Rio Chiquito village in the El Progresso municipality.  She has three children; ages 18, 15, and 12.  The children go to school.  Her husband, Reyes, is a farmer.  The couple has been married for 18 years.  The family depends upon the couple’s income to live.

Blanca has a grocery store where she sells a great variety of products including dairy products, grains, meat, sausages, flour, beans, bread, lard, and sweets.  Four years ago she established the grocery store because of her desire to improve herself.  She notes that there was a demand for the business because people were saying they needed a grocery store in the neighborhood. 

A previous loan helped her stock her store more.  With the current loan for 21,000 lempiras Blanca will increase her inventory by purchasing basic grains, lard, bread, soft drinks, and sweets.  She hopes to offer a good variety of products and to satisfy her customers’ needs.  She also hopes to overcome the low sales that she attributes to the heavy rains that have fallen in Honduras.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, lard, bread, soft drinks, and sweets.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es:
Eva cuenta con 37 años de edad es mama soltera tiene una hija la cual se encuentra estudiando 2º grado de la preparatoria  ella se llama Ana yaritza.

Ella se dedica al comercio de carnicería vende carne lo cual invirtió su préstamo en comprar puercos para matanza a doña Eva le gustaría que su negocio fuera creciendo más ella dice que sacara su negocio adelante para así irlo incrementando día a día.
texts.en:
Eva is 37 years old.  She is a single mother and has one daughter who is in her second year of high school.  Her name is Ana Yaritza.

Eva's business is selling meat.  She invested her loan in buying pigs to slaughter.  Eva would like to grow her business further so that she can continue increasing her business every day.

loans.use: to buy pigs to slaughter

loans.name: Jose Armando

texts.es:
José armando cuenta con 36 años de edad es casado tiene 5 hijos los cuales se encuentran estudiando la primaria sayuri está cursando 6º grado de primaria, melisa esta en 5º grado Jairo en 2º y jaseer 3 de preescolar mientras que el pequeño tiene 3 años de edad, su esposa se llama lucero ella se dedica a la casa.

El es chofer de su propio taxi es transportista urbano de taxis lo cual invirtió su préstamo en el mantenimiento del auto, a José armando le gustaría poner otro taxi para así ir aumentado su negocio.
texts.en:
José Armando is 36 years old, married, and has five children who are in school.  Sayuri is in sixth grade, Melisa is in fifth grade, Jairo is in second grade and Jaseer is in his third year of pre-school.  Their youngest is 3 years old.  José Armando's wife is called Lucero and she takes care of their home.

José Armando drives his own taxi.  He is an urban transport provider.  He invested his loan in having his car serviced.  José Armando would like to have another taxi so that he can continue growing his business.

loans.use: to have his taxi serviced

loans.name: Adelina

texts.es:
Adelina cuenta con 32 años de edad, es casada tiene 4 hijos los cuales están estudiando el mayor Wendy está cursando 6º grado de primaria, yovanna esta en 5º grado y Edwin 4º grado de primaria su esposo se llama Fernando él es empleado de gobierno.

Ella es comerciante vende ropa lo cual invirtió su préstamo en la compra de nuevos modelos de jeans, blusa, playeras, vestidos, a doña Adelina le gustaría que su negocio incrementara mas ya que quiere poner una tienda de ropa.
texts.en:
Adelina is 32 years old, married, and has four children who are in school.  Her eldest, Wendy, is in sixth grade, Yovanna is in fifth grade and Edwin is in fourth grade.  Her husband is called Fernando and he is a government employee.

Adelina is a retailer.  She sells clothes and invested her loan in buying new designs of jeans, blouses, t-shirts and dresses.  Adelina would like to further grow her business as she would like to set up a clothes shop.

loans.use: to buy new designs of jeans, blouses, t-shirts and dresses

loans.name: Yumayra

texts.es:
Yumayra cuenta con 29 años de edad, es mama soltera tiene tres hijos los cuales están estudiando Jennifer está cursando 4º grado de primaria y Anthony 2º de primaria y chisthofer 3º de preescolar.

Ella se dedica al comercio vende ropa y perfumes e invirtió su préstamo en la compra de mas ropa nuevos modelos de pantalones, blusas, vestido, a Yumayra le gustaría que negocio creciera mas ya que le gustaría establecer un local para su vender su ropa.
texts.en:
Yumayra is 29 years old, a single mom and has three children who are in school: Jennifer is in the fourth grade, Anthony in the second grade, and Chisthofer, the third year of preschool. 

She devotes herself to business, selling clothing and perfumes. She invested her loan in the purchase of more clothing: new styles of pants, blouses, and dresses. Yumayra would like her business to grow since she would like to establish a storefront from which to sell her clothing.

loans.use: to purchase more clothing: new styles of pants, blouses and dresses.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María cuenta con 52 años de edad, es viuda su esposo falleció ahora tiene 6 hijos los cuales son muy independientes ellos mismo y también ayudan a doña María.

Ella se dedica a la costura pero no basta para doña María porque también es comerciante ella vende perfumes por catalogo lo cual ella invirtió su préstamo en la compra de telas para su costura y surtió sus pedidos que tenía pendientes doña María dice que les tal yendo muy bien con su negocio a ella le gustaría que su negocio creciera un poco mas incrementarlo más.
texts.en:
María is 52 years old and a widow.  She has six children who are very independent.  They also help her out.

María has a sewing business but that is not enough for her as she is also a saleswoman.  She sells perfumes through a catalog.  She invested her loan in buying fabric for her sewing business and filling some orders that she had.  María says that her business is doing very well and she would like to grow and increase her business a little more.

loans.use: to buy fabric for her sewing business and to fill some orders that she has

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es:
Juan, es soltero, no tiene hijos, vive con la familia, se dedica a la compra y venta de pan, además de atender la agricultura, lleva 5 años en la siembra de maíz y frijol, la venta de pan la realiza desde hace dos años, esta venta es de forma ambulante, distribuyendo a clientes en su bicicleta.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de abono y herbicidas, para aplicarlos al cultivo de maíz, esto le ayudara para fortalecer la planta y que esta produzca mejor.
La aspiración de Juan es terminar sus estudios universitarios, apoyar a su familia con lo poco que pueda de sus ganancias.
texts.en: Juan is single and has no children.  He is a bread merchant and also a farmer.  He’s been farming corn and beans for five years and has been selling bread for two years.  He’s a street merchant selling the bread to customers from his bicycle.  He’s asking for a loan to buy manure and herbicide for his corn crops which will help him strengthen the plants so that they will produce better.  Juan’s goal is to complete his university studies and to support his family which whatever little he can with his profits.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Alexander

texts.es: Alexander, de 30 años es un hombre soltero y trabajador. Vive en compañía de su mamá a la que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Tambo. Todas las mañanas se levante muy temprano, pues tiene que trabajar con su auto trasportando a la gente a diferentes lugares de la ciudad. Lo que más le gusta a él es tener su propio trabajo, velando por su progreso y desarrollo. Además lo ayuda a solventar los gastos del hogar, pues aunque sea soltero, ayuda a sus padres y hermanos. Por esa razón trabaja sin descanso, incluso durante toda la noche, en especial los fines de semana, donde tiene mayores ganancias. Ahora el desea mejorar la calidad de su auto, pues ello le ayudará a no gastar en repuestos y demás problemas que aquejan al funcionamiento de su carro. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “rompiendo fronteras” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Alexander de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero en cambiar a gas su auto que funcionaba a petróleo y de esa manera minimizar gastos.
texts.en:
Alexander, 30, is a single, hardworking man.  He lives with his mother who he cares for in his own house located in Tambo District.  He rises very early every morning because he works transporting people to various parts of the city.  What he likes best is having his own business, seeing to its progress and development.  Besides, it helps him cover household expenses because even though he’s single, he helps his parents and siblings.  Because of this he works tirelessly sometimes through the night and especially on weekends when profits are greater.  Now, he wants to improve his car’s quality and save on replacement parts costs and other problems that his car’s having.  

He belongs to the “Rompiendo Fronteras” communal bank and this is the second MFP loan.  He is happy because he’ll have financial support and will feel surer of advancing with his work.  He promises to make his installment payments.  He enjoys being part of his association because all the members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.  If Alexander were to receive your support he will use the money to convert his car from gasoline burning to natural gas burning to reduce costs.

loans.use: to convert her car's engine from gasoline to natural gas.

loans.name: Marling Esther

texts.es: Marling dentro de algun tiempo será administradora de empresas, solicita el crédito para pagar el curso de titulación para coronar su carrera. Le inspira a finalizar su carrera sus dos hijos, ya que desea darles el ejemplo para que ellos lleguen a tener un espíritu emprendedor, dentro de 5 años se ve trabajando en una empresa y poniendo en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos. Es una persona responsable y segura de sus metas, planea una vez finalizada su carrera seguir especializándose.
texts.en: Marling will be a business administrator in a short time.  She’s asking for a loan to pay for her final degree course and graduate.  She is inspired to complete her career by her two children because she wants to set an example for them so that they will develop an entrepreneurial spirit.  In five years, she sees herself working for a firm and putting the knowledge she’s acquired into practice.  She is a responsible person who is sure of her goals; once she graduates she plans to continue specializing.

loans.use: to pay for her final degree courses.

loans.name: Frank

texts.es: Frank, de 19 años es un joven trabajador. Vive en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito del tambo; en compañía de sus padres y hermanos a los que quiere mucho.  A base de esfuerzo y entusiasmo este ejemplar joven, comenzó a estudiar una carrera profesional en la universidad del estado. Sus días se centran en diferentes actividades, una de ellas es el trabajo como “taxista”, con un auto que adquirió gracias a su trabajo. Cuenta que se siente algo cansado, púes tiene que compartir su tiempo con sus estudios,  tareas de la universidad y su trabajo. Pero ese esfuerzo es recompensado, pues será dentro de algunos años todo un ingeniero, “que se formó solo”, como él, orgulloso comenta. Ahora desea reparar por completo su auto y así trabajar sin preocupación. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “rompiendo fronteras” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo.
