Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Frank, de recibir su apoyo invertirá el dinero solicitado en arreglar su auto para poder trabajar sin preocupaciones.
texts.en:
Frank, 19, is a young worker.  He lives in his own house located in Tambo District with his parents and siblings that he loves very much.  Based on effort and enthusiasm this exemplary young man started to learn a professional career at the state university.  His days are centered on various activities.  One of them is working as a “taxi driver” with a car he acquired thanks to his work.  He relates that he feels a bit tired because he also has to share his time with his studies, school work and his job.  But the effort is rewarded because he’ll become every bit of an engineer in a few years and, as he himself proudly comments: “I did it on my own.” 

He’d like to completely service his car to continue working worry-free.  He belongs to the “Rompiendo Fronteras” communal bank and this is his first MFP loan.  He’s happy because he’ll have financial support and will feel surer about advancing with his work.  He promises to make his installment payments.  He likes being part of his association because all the members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.  If Frank were to get your support, he will use the money to service his car to be able to work without any worries.

loans.use: to send his car to the mechanic.

loans.name: Zoila De Jesus

texts.es:
Zoila, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para fortalecer el negocio, y por la buena atención que recibe, ella invertirá este préstamo en la compra D. lociones, maquillajes, cremas, labiales y demás cosméticos, esta nueva compra le permite a Zoila ofrecer más y mejores productos.
Las condiciones D. Zoila como comerciante, han mejorado, dandole más oportunidad D. crecimiento.
texts.en: Zoila has decided on a new loan to strengthen the business and because of the good service she receives.  She will use this loan to buy lotions, make-up, creams, lipstick and other cosmetics.  This new purchase will allow Zoila to have more and better products on offer.  Zoila’s conditions as a merchant have improved giving her more opportunity for growth.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Dionicio

texts.es: Dionicio, de 28 años es un hombre responsable. Vive en compañía de Maribel, su esposa desde hace 2 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Jonatan, Franco y Emerson, a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Pantipata.  Desde joven asumió muchas responsabilidades. Entre ellas su familia; es así que dedicó sus fuerzas a la agricultura, actividad que aprendió desde que era niño. Sus principales sembríos constan de Yauco, maíz, alverja y demás productos oriundos de la zona. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo, son los días de cosecha, pues obtiene mejores ganancias en los comerciantes que visitan la feria de Acostambo, donde lleva a vender sus alimentos. Asimismo su esposa le ayuda con la crianza de animales menores como vacas, toros y ovejas, los que comercializa a buen precio después de engordarlos. Ahora espera trabajar con esmero para el futuro de sus hijos. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “tancar puquio” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Dionicio de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 3 a 4 vacas para su negocio.
texts.en:
Dionicio, 28, is a responsible man. He lives with Maribel, his wife of two years. Together they have three children: Jonatan, Franco and Emerson, whom they care for in their own home, located in the cluster of homes known as Pantipata. Since his youth he has assumed many responsibilities, among them his family. Thus he devoted his efforts to farming, a business he learned when he was a boy. His primary crops are Yauco coffee beans, corn, peas and other products native to the area. What he enjoys most about his work are the days of harvest, since he makes good earnings from the merchants who visit the Acostambo market, where he takes his foodstuffs to sell. His wife helps him as well with caring for small animals such as cows, bulls and sheep, which they sell for a good price after fattening them.  

Now he hopes to work diligently for the future of his children. He belongs to the communal bank "Tancar Puquio" and this is his second loan with MFP. He is happy to be with the organization, because he will have financial support and thus feel confident of advancing in his work. He promises to make his loan payments. Additionally, he appreciates being part of his association because all of its members are responsible people and provide a lot of support to each other. Dionicio, upon receiving his loan, will invest the requested amount in the purchase of three or four cows for his business.

loans.use: to buy three or four cows.

loans.name: Alexis Agustin

texts.es:
el sr. Alexis Agustín tiene 38 años de edad, vive en unión libre y es padre de 4 hijos, Alexis es Caficultor y Agricultor, cuenta con más de 8 años de experiencia en el cultivo de café. 
el sr. Alexis utilizara el credito para comprar un sistema solar y gozar de este servicio para iluminar su casa por las noches, ya que solo se han alumbrado con candiles y candelas, mismos que son dañinos para la salud y el medio ambiente.
tambien quiere darles entretenimiento por medio de television a sus hijos, con esto va a mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Mr. Alexis Agustín is 38 years old, lives in a committed relationship and is the father of four children. Alexis is a coffee grower and farmer and has over eight years of experience growing coffee. 

Mr. Alexis will use the loan to purchase a solar powered electric generator and use this service to light his home at night, since up until now they have had light only from oil lamps and candles, which are harmful to human health and the environment. He also wants to provide entertainment to his children via television. Thus his family's quality of life will improve.

loans.use: to purchase a solar powered electric generator

loans.name: Alba Marleny

texts.es:
La señora Alba tiene 39 años de edad, está casada, tiene 4 hijos, reside en la comunidad rural de Rio Bonito en el municipio de Siguatepeque, Comayagua.
Únicamente ella con su pulpería y su esposo con su trabajo aportan a la economía del hogar. Sus hijos tienen las edades de 17, 14, 11 y 8 años todos están estudiando y en sus tiempos libres colaboran atendiendo los clientes en la pulpería.
 Doña Alba Comenzó su negocio hace aproximadamente 4 años, iniciando con la venta de productos comestibles, actualmente ha solicitado un préstamo para abastecer mas su negocio comprando granos básicos, azúcar, huevos, productos de limpieza y refrescos.
Ella está motivada porque considera que el préstamo le servirá para ofrecer más variedad de productos en su negocio y los clientes aumentaran, obteniendo mayores ingresos familiares.
texts.en:
Alba, age 39, is married and has four children.  She lives in the rural community of Rio Bonito in the Siguatepeque municipality, Comayagua.

Only she, with her grocery store, and her husband with his work contribute financially to the household.  Her children are 17, 14, 11, and 8 years old.  They go to school, and in their free time they help tend to the customers in the grocery store.

Alba started her business approximately four years ago.  She started with the sale of food products.  She has currently requested a loan to stock her business more.  She will buy basic grains, sugar, eggs, cleaning products, and soft drinks.

She is motivated because she believes that the loan will be useful to her in offering a greater variety of products in her business.  She will get more customers and greater income for the family.

loans.use: to buy food staples.

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es: Sandra María está estudiando Licenciatura en Farmacia y está en el último año de su carrera, el crédito solicitado será para pagar los módulos para graduarse. Actualmente trabaja  en una farmacia. Ella quiere ser docente de la carrera de farmacia, se considera una persona afortunada por poder tener la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera que a ella le gusta. Los conocimientos que ha adquirido tanto en los estudios como en el trabajo, le hacen una persona capaz de desarrollar esta carrera.
texts.en: Sandra María’s studying for a Bachelor’s in Pharmacy and is in her last years of coursework.  The loan she asked for will be to pay for her final course modules and graduate.  She currently works in a pharmacy.  She wants to teach pharmacy.  She considers herself to be a fortunate person for having the opportunity to study a career she likes.  The knowledge she’s acquired both through her studies and at work makes her a person capable of unfolding in this career.

loans.use: to pay for her final course modules.

loans.name: Veronica Elizabeth

texts.es:
Verónica, vive con su esposo y dos hijos, se dedica a la venta D. mariscos, este negocio nació hace tres años, lo aprendió en su familia y hoy en día le ayuda para generar ingresos para el hogar.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mariscos, entre ellos pescado fresco, langostas, camarones, filete, entre otras clases D. mariscos que son del consumo D. los clientes. Esta compra le ayudara a mantener productos frescos, atender la demanda D. los clientes y estar siempre dedicada a mejorar y crecer en el comercio.
texts.en:
Verónica lives with her husband and two children; she sells seafood.  The business was born three years ago.  She learned it in her family and today it helps her earn household income.

She’s asking for a loan to buy seafood like fresh food, lobster, shrimp and fillet, among other types of seafood that customers consume.  This purchase will help her have fresh products to meet customer demand and always to be focused on improving and growing in business.

loans.use: to buy fresh fish, lobster, shrimp and fillets.

loans.name: Gertrude Mathilde

texts.fr:
Cliente de 41 ans, mariée été mère de 4 enfants dont l'age varie entre 6 a 21 ans, elle ouvre un petite boutique d'alimentation dans sa parcelle.Elle a des ventes considérables de 50.000 a 90.000 frs par jour, elle a fait des considérables épargnes et a rembourse avec succès.

Avec ce nouveau prêt , elle veut renforcer le stock de ses marchandises,compléter des conserves qu'elle ne pouvait acheter avant, des cartons de macédoines, des conserves, des corne beef, des cassoulets...

Elle est entrain de se battre pour aller loin , avec les benefices, elle est entrain de beaucoup épargner parce qu'elle veut ouvrir une boutique plus grande et elle contribue entièrement a payer les etudes de ses enfants.Ces differents prêts lui a fait beaucoup de bien c'est ce qu'elle ne cesse de répéter , elle a une gestion  bien équilibrée et elle ne s'endette plus depuis qu'elle a connu Hope.
texts.en:
She is a 41-year-old customer (of Hope), married with four children ranging in age from 6 to 21 years. She opened a small food shop on her plot. She makes substantial sales of 50,000 to 90,000 francs a day.  She has made significant savings and has repaid her loan successfully.

With this new loan, she wants to strengthen her stock of goods, purchase additional canned goods she could not afford before, such as boxes of canned mixed diced vegetables, canned goods, corned beef, cassoulets ...

She is fighting to go further. With the profits, she is saving a lot because she wants to open a larger store. She contributes fully to pay for her children’s education. She keeps saying that these various loans did her a lot of good. Since she has known Hope, she has a well-balanced management and does not go into debt anymore.

loans.use: purchase canned products, corned beef, sardines, milk powder, condensed milk, etc,

loans.name: Felix

texts.es: Félix, de 20 años es un hombre trabajador y soltero. Vive en casa de sus primo, en el caserío de Pantipata. Se caracteriza por se luchador e independiente. Hace algunos meses salió de su casa, para forjarse un futuro por el mismo y para el bienestar de su familia. Las actividades de este joven son diversas. Las épocas de cosecha de maíz, trabaja como peón en diversos cultivos, donde le pagan 28 soles por día, asimismo traslada tierra con maquinaria pesada, que aprendió a utilizar gracias a su curiosidad, pues le dijo a un amigo que le enseñe. Por otra parte recibió una pequeña parcela de parte de su abuela, en donde siembra alverja, pues nació y se crío en el campo y sabe las técnicas de cultivo. Ahora este talentoso joven, desea incursionar en la compra y venta de toros, donde está seguro tendrá éxito. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “tancar puquio” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Félix de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de un toro para su negocio.
texts.en:
Félix, 20, is a single, hardworking man.  He lives in his cousin’s house in Pantipata hamlet.  He is determined and independent.  He left home a few months ago to forge a future for himself and his family.  This young man’s activities are diverse.  During corn harvest time he works as a day laborer earning 28 soles per day.  He also moves soil using heavy machinery that he learned how to operate because he was curious and asked a friend to teach him.  On the other hand a grandmother left him a small parcel of land where he grows peas since he was born in the country and knows how to farm.

Now this talented young man wants to go into cattle sales where he’s sure to be successful.  He belongs to the “Tancar Puquio” communal bank and this is the first MFP loan.  He’s happy to have financial support because he feels surer to make progress in his work.  He commits to make his installment payments.  It pleases him to be part of his association because all the members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.  If Félix were to get your support, he’ll use the money he requested to buy a bull for his business.

loans.use: to buy a bull.

loans.name: Mary

texts.es: Mary, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo por la necesidad de producir mayores ingresos a su familia, ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de un comal de metal, pago para la reparación de la plancha, compra de unos quintales de maíz. Ella a través de los préstamos ha mejorado sus ventas, ya que cuenta con disponibilidad de materiales y en esta ocasión nuevamente comprara maíz para tener disponible.
texts.en: Mary decided on a new loan because she needs to produce higher income for her family.  She’s asking for the loan to buy a metal griddle, to pay to have her tortilla press repaired and to buy a few quintals of corn.  Through the loans she’s managed to improve her sales because she has materials on hand and on this occasion she’ll buy corn again to have it available.

loans.use: to buy a metal griddle, repair the tortilla press and to buy a few quintals of corn.

loans.name: Miriam De La Paz

texts.es:
Doña Miriam, sigue en el comercio, hoy en dia, se esta dedicando a la venta de cosmetico, en donde cambio de comercio, ya que se dedicaba a la venta de nacatamales y venta de vigoron, pero se le estaba haciendo cansado y las ganancias eran pocas, es por tal razon toma la iniciativa de cambiar sus productos.
Pues ha comenzado bien, ya que tiene clientela y son productos ofertable y al credito, parte de eso, son buenos, con precios accesibles.
Con su credito anterior decicio ah ultimas hora, cambiar el techo, ya que estaba en muy malas condiciones, lo que con este nuevo financianmiento podra comenzar el baño y compra del inodoro, asi como mejorar la higiene de su hogar. Siendo tambien de gran necesidad, devido a tantas epidemias.
Para ella, es sactifactorio, el mejorar su casa, ya que es la que ve por su familia, siendo madre soltera, en donde cada dia se esfuerza para el bien comun , y que gracias a los prestamo se le ha hecho posible.
texts.en:
Miriam continues in commerce.  Today she’s selling cosmetics, a change in line of work since she used to sell nacatamales (Nicaraguan-style tamales) and vigorón [cabbage salad known as curtido (chopped cabbage, tomatoes, onions, and chili pepper marinated in vinegar and salt), boiled manioc, and chicharrones (fried pork with skin or with meat) wrapped in plantain] but it was becoming exhausting and profits were few.  Because of that she decided to go into something else.  She has begun well since she has customers and the products are sellable on credit and besides they are affordably priced.

She decided at the last minute to use her previous loan to replace her roof because it was in very poor shape so will use this new loan to start on the bathroom and to buy a toilet to improve her home’s hygiene in addition to being very necessary because of so many epidemics.  For her, improving her home is satisfying because she’s the one looking after her family since she’s a single mother.  Every day she strives for the common good and thanks to the loans she’s been able to do so.

loans.use: to build a bathroom and install a toilet.

loans.name: Jose Nahun

texts.es:
el sr. José Nahún tiene 25 años de edad, esta casado y tiene 3 hijos, Jose es Caficultor y Agricultor, posee  5 años de experiencia en el cultivo de café y la agricultura. 
José obtiene ingresos todo el año, cuenta con una pulpería que genera ganancias para mantener a su familia y cumplir con otros compromisos, Jose utilizara el credito para comprar un sistema solar y así poder iluminar su casa y su pulperia por las noches, gracias a esto podra atender a sus clientes en horas de la noche y cerrar mas tarde su pulperia.
dejara de utilizara candiles para iluminarse, esto sera de gran ayuda para no dañar la salud de sus hijos.
texts.en:
José Nahún, 25, is married and has three children.  José is a coffee grower and farmer.  He has five years of experience growing coffee and in agriculture.

José has income year round.  He has a grocery store that generates profits to support his family and fulfill other commitments.

José will use the loan to buy a solar system and so be able to light his house and his grocery store at night.  Thanks to this he will be able to wait on his customers at night and close his business later.  He will stop using oil lamps for light, which will be a great help in not endangering the health of his children.

loans.use: to buy a solar generator.

loans.name: Estrella

texts.es: Estrella, de 51 años, es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos: Wilfredo y Yamile, a los que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Chilca. Afronta muchos problemas uno de ellos, son los problemas con su esposo, del que se encuentra separado. A pesar de ello continúa trabajando, pues tiene que velar por sus hijos. Su actividad económica por 20 años, es la venta de carne. Cuenta que su trabajo consiste en la compra de ganado porcino en cantidad, sobre todo a los más gorditos y sanos, los que mata para vender la carne en ferias regionales y de los distritos. Con ellos obtiene buenas ganancias, además aprovecha el puesto que tiene para vender productos de belleza a los clientes que ya la conocen. Le va muy bien en su negocio, “vendo más cantidad de carne en las festividades”, afirma. Por ello sus planes son abrir una chicharronería (lugar donde se vende platos a base de carne de cerdo), le falta muy poco para concretar su objetivo. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “IDME” y este es el vigésimocuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Estrella de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en el alquiler de su nuevo restaurante, además de platos y demás utensilios para la venta de los alimentos.
texts.en:
Estrella, age 51, is a simple woman. She lives with her two children, Wilfredo and Yamile, whom she cares for in her own house, located in the district of Chilca. She faces a lot of problems. One of them is her husband, from whom she is separated. In spite of this she continues working since she has to take care of her children.

For 20 years, she has been in the business of selling meat. Her work consists of buying large quantities of pigs, in particular the fattest and healthiest ones. She slaughters them in order to sell the meat at in regional and district markets. She gets good earnings from this business. In addition, she has a stall for selling beauty products to customers that already know her.

Her businesses are doing well. “I sold a lot of meat during the festivals,” she says. That’s why she plans on opening a “chicharronería” (a restaurant where pork dishes are sold). She lacks very little in order to achieve this goal.

Estrella belongs to the IDME communal bank, and this is her twenty-fourth loan with MFP. She hopes that this collaboration will allow her to continue towards her objectives, and she promises, once again, to pay all her installments. In addition, she is thankful to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive. Upon receiving her loan, Estrella will invest the money applied for in renting her new restaurant, as well as in purchasing dishes and other utensils needed for selling meals.

loans.use: to rent a place for her restaurant and purchase dishes and utensils.

loans.name: Zaida Antonia

texts.es: Zaida mujer emprendedora, trabajadora con el ciclo anterior compro mercadería para su negocio, logro ubicado el negocio en unos de los mercado de la capital, que en meses atrás sufrió un asalto dejándola con menor cantidad de mercadería, afectando su bienestar económico ya que no tenía la cantidades suficiente para cumplir con su clientela actuales y no poder seguir pagando el tramo la llevaron a tomar otras medidas, desciendo trasladar el negocio a otro punto de venta. Requerir el préstamo para invertir en la compra de productos básico, uso personales como: arroz, aceite, frijoles, jabón de baño, trastos y ropa, crema de cabello, desodorantes, golosinas, frutas, vegetales entre otros productos. Agradece a la financiera por el apoyo al desarrollo de su negocio permitiéndole surtir nuevamente de productos en variedad.
texts.en:
Zaida is a hard-working and entrepreneurial woman who used her previous loan to buy merchandise for her business.  She managed to re-locate her business to one of the markets in the capital because, months ago, she suffered a robbery which left her with a lower quantity of merchandise.  This affected her financial well-being as she didn't have enough stock to meet the needs of her current customers and wasn't able to continue paying for her sales spot.  This led her to take other measures, deciding to move her business to another sales location.

Zaida needs this loan to invest in buying basic products such as rice, oil, beans, bath soap, clothing, hair cream, deodorants, candies, fruits, vegetables, etc.  She is grateful to the financial institution for their support in developing her business, allowing her to re-stock it with a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Marco Tulio

texts.es:
Marco, se dedica a la venta de agua embotellada, vive con su esposa y un hijo de 9 años de edad, él trabaja todos los días de la semana en su vehículo, vendiendo agua embotellada, además en su vivienda también ofrece para los clientes.
Él está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de un pedido de agua embotellada, para aumentar el inventario, teniendo más capacidad para atender la demanda y sobre todo generar más ganancias. El quiere mejorar el negocio, aumentar el número de clientes, para distribuirles agua y de esta manera contribuir a la superación de su familia.
texts.en:
Marco sells bottled water.  He lives with his wife and 9-year-old son.  He works every day of the week in his vehicle selling bottled water; he also sells it to his customers at home.

He’s asking for a loan to pay for a delivery of bottled water to increase his inventory to be able to meet increased customer demand and, above all, to generate more profits.  He wants to improve the business, increase the number of customer to sell water to and contribute to his family’s betterment this way.

loans.use: to pay for a delivery of bottled water.

loans.name: Yede

texts.es: Yede, de 27 años es una mujer sencilla. Vive en compañía de Fredy, su esposo desde hace 7 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos: Lisbeth, Juan Carlos y Luzmila a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el anexo de Pantipata.  Como toda mujer del campo, trabajadora y con aspiraciones. Comienza sus días en los campos, cuidando de sus sembríos de maíz, alverja y papa. Los cuales le brindan el único sustento económico para su familia. Las ganas de trabajar de está mujer son extraordinarios; pues su última hija tiene unos meses de nacida y necesita muchos cuidados. Su esposo la ayuda en los trabajos forzados, cargando los sacos de alimentos en la cosecha y trasladando los animales que cría a la feria de Acostambo, los días viernes; donde ella recibe un dinero extra con la venta de las ovejas y vacas. Ahora desea tener un negocio donde pueda obtener una ganancia adicional. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “tancar puquio” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Yede de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de animales vacunos y ovinos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Yede, 27, is an unassuming woman.  She lives with Fredy, her husband of 7 years.  They have three children: Lisbeth, Juan Carlos and Luzmila who they care for in their own house located in Pantipata Annex.  Like any hardworking woman from the countryside with hopes, she starts her days in the fields caring for her corn, pea and potato crops which provide her family’s only source of income.  This woman’s will to work is extraordinary because her youngest daughter is just a few months old and needs much care.  Her husband helps her with the heavy jobs, carrying sacks of feed and during harvest and transporting animals she raises to the Acostambo livestock market on Fridays where she earns extra money selling sheep and cattle.  She’d now like to have a business to earn additional profits.

She belongs to the “Tancar Puquio” communal bank and this is her first MFP loan.  She’s happy because she’ll have financial support so she feels surer that she’ll make progress with her work.  She commits to make her installment payments and she is pleased to be a member of her association because all the members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.  If Yede were to receive your support, she’ll use the requested money to buy cattle and sheep for her business.

loans.use: to buy cattle and sheep.

loans.name: Luisa

texts.es:
la sra. Luisa tiene 47 años de edad, es soltera pero tiene 2 hijos, mismos que le ayudan en su cultivo de cafe. Luisa tiene muchos años de experiencia en el manejo del cafe, esta es la fuente de ingreso para el sustento de su familia.
Doña Luisa utilizara el credito para la compra de un Sistema Solar, en su comunidad no cuentan con el servicio de energía Eléctrica, y al tenerlo, sus condiciones de vida mejoraran, su mayor anhelo es comprase un T.V para mirar las programaciones durante la noche.
texts.en: Luisa, 47, is single but has two children that help her grow coffee.  Luisa has many years’ experience with coffee crops; this is her family’s source of income.  Luisa will use the loan to buy a solar generator because her community does not have electricity and having it her living conditions will improve.  Her greatest wish is to buy herself a television set to watch programs at night.

loans.use: to buy a solar generator.

loans.name: Santos Eusebio

texts.es:
El Sr. Santos Eusebio, tiene 34 años de edad y 13 años de casado, tiene 3 hijos de 7, 10 y 12 años de edad, todos están estudiando, vive en la aldea El Tigre, Santa Cruz de Yojoa.

Santos tiene dos años de tener un negocio de venta de ropa para damas y niños, gorras, fajas, sandalias, bolsos y zapatos. Esta actividad la realiza a diario, pero el sábado y domingo vende en un puesto de venta En Taulabe, es una aldea cercana de su casa. Ya tiene su clientela establecida.
Este negocio lo inicio con dinero propio, y las ganancias las ha reinvertido para ir incrementando su inventario.
Este préstamo es el primero que solicita y es para comprar más ropa y zapatos, ya que viene la temporada buena de ventas.
El plan que tiene es mantener su negocio surtido para sacar mas ganancias y de allí sacar los gastos de educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Santos Eusebio is 34 years old, and he has been married for 13 years.  He has three children; ages 7, 10, and 12.  The children go to school.  He lives in the village of El Tigre in Santa Cruz, Yojoa.

For two years Santos has had his business of selling women’s and children’s clothes, hats, belts, sandals, purses, and shoes.  He does this every day, but on Saturday and Sunday he sells at a place in Taulabe, which is a village close to his house.  He already has an established customer base.

He started this business with his own money, and he has reinvested his earnings in order to increase his inventory.

This is the first loan that he has requested.  The loan is to buy more clothes and shoes because the good season for sales is coming.  

The plan that he has is to keep his business stocked in order to get more earnings.  He will pay for his children’s educational expenses from that income.

loans.use: to buy clothes, shoes, and other products to sell.

location.town: El Tigre, Santa Cruz de Yojoa

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor, de 41 años es un hombre trabajador. Se casó hace 10 años con, Hilda su esposa. Ambos tienen un hijo, Joel al que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Pantipata. Su actividad económica se centra en la agricultura. La siembra de alverja, papa y maíz son los principales cultivos que tiene. En todo este tiempo pudo adquirir sus propios terrenos agrícolas; donde trabaja junto a su esposa. Además de compartir su tiempo en la crianza de toros, que engorda para luego venderlos a un mayor precio, ya tiene 4 ejemplares y desea para más adelante poseer más cantidad. “Obtengo buena ganancia en la crianza de estos animales”, comenta, “por ello quiero dedicar más tiempo a la ganadería”. Ahora espera paciente la época de lluvias para sembrar de nuevo. Él pertenece al grupo solidario “Tancar Puquio” y este es el quinto crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Víctor de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de 4 a 5 toros para su negocio.
texts.en:
Víctor, 41, is a hardworking man.  He married Hilda, his wife, ten years ago.  They have a son, Joel, who they care for in their own house located in Pantipata hamlet.  He is a farmer.  His main crops are peas, potatoes and corn.  He managed in this time to acquire his own farmland where he works alongside his wife.  He also raises bulls that he fattens up to then sell at better prices.  He has four head of cattle and wants later on to have more.  “I earn good profits raising these animals,” he comments “that’s why I want to spend more time raising animals.”  He is currently patiently waiting for the rainy season to plant again.


He belongs to the “Tancar Puquio” communal bank and this is his fifth MFP loan.  He’s happy because he’ll have financial support so he feels surer that he’ll make progress with his work.  He commits to make his installment payments and he is pleased to be a member of his association because all the members are responsible, very mutually supportive people.  If Víctor were to receive your support, he’ll use the requested money to buy four or five bulls for his business.

loans.use: to buy five bulls.

loans.name: Leopoldo Arcides

texts.es:
Leopoldo, nuevamente está solicitando un préstamo porque no cuenta con dinero para invertir en el negocio, actualmente comprara una vaca, dos terneros, ya que quiere aumentar el número de ganado en el corral, la compra le permitirá mejorar sus condiciones ganaderas, dándole la oportunidad de mejorar la producción de leche.
Las condiciones de vida de Leopoldo han mejorado, esto debido a las mejoras del negocio por los préstamos.
texts.en: Leopoldo is once again requesting a loan because he doesn’t have money to invest in the business.  This time he’ll buy a cow and two calves because he wants to increase his herd size.  The purchase will help him improve his cattle raising conditions giving him the opportunity to improve milk production.  Leopoldo’s living conditions have improved thanks to the business improvements the loans brought about.

loans.use: to buy a cow and two calves.

loans.name: Maria Eulalia

texts.es:
la sra. María Eulalia tiene 57 años de edad, es viuda y madre 5 hijos, los cuales se han quedado viviendo con ella para apoyarla en los trabajos, su actividad principal es la caficultura, cuenta con más de 10 años de experiencia.
 
Doña María utilizara el credito para comprar una planta solar,  pues nos comento que así se va a sentir más segura por las noches, al ver que a cualquier hora de la noche puede iluminarse y ya no andar caminando o palpando en la oscuridad cuando le toca levantarse,  es algo que a anhelado toda su vida y que le será de bienestar para ella y sus hijos que la acompañan.
texts.en:
María Eulalia, 57, is a widow and the mother of five children who have stayed living with her to help her in her work.  Her principal job is growing coffee.  She has more than 10 years of experience.

María will use the loan to buy a solar generator.  She told us that in this way she will feel safer at night, seeing that at any hour of the night she can turn on the light and not have to walk or feel in the darkness when she has to get up.

This is something she has wanted her whole life that will help her well-being and that of the children who are with her.

loans.use: to buy a solar generator.

loans.name: El Eden Group

texts.es: Un grupo con mucho en común que es el entusiasmo por surgir en los negocios propios, así es el Edén una alcancía comunal con características D. éxito. Conformado por 8 socias hace más D. 2 años. Cada integrante se dedica a diversos comercios, tal es así el caso D. la señora Juana integrante D. dicha alcancía, la señora Juana  con 38 años D. edad madre D. dos hijos que aun dependen D. ella, vio la forma D. surgir económicamente con la venta D. comida por las mañanas, también con el apoyo D. ventas D. verduras y D. juguetes. Lleva más D. 12 años dedicándose con esmero a este oficio el cual le ha dado muchas satisfacciones  para ella y su familia. Con el reciente préstamo lo invertirá en la compra D. juguetes para la campaña naviD.ña ya que se acerca  pronto. Como la señora  Juana  el resto D. los integrantes tiene una historia en particular que contar, pero todas coinciden en el esmero y el desempeño que realizan cada día por el bienestar D. sus familias.
texts.en:
This group has a lot in common, including enthusiasm for moving ahead with their own businesses.  The communal bank is called "El Edén", and is characterized by success.  It was started by 8 members, two years ago.  The members work in various businesses.

For example, Señora Juana S. is a member of this communal bank.  Señora Juana is 38 years old, and is the mother of two children who are still financially dependent.  She saw a way of progressing financially through selling food in the mornings, and also is helped by selling vegetables and toys.  She has been working in this field with great attention for more than twelve years, and it has given her and her family much satisfaction.

With her recent loan, she will invest in purchasing toys for the upcoming Christmas season.

Like Señora Juana, the rest of the members each have their own story, but they all share the same level of care and accomplishment that they undertake each day for the well-being of their families.

loans.use: to buy toys for the upcoming Christmas season

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more charcoal, kanga, fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Patricia Esmeralda

texts.es:
Patricia, tiene casa propia, vive con sus tres hijos quienes están estudiando, ella administra una tienda donD. ofrece productos D. primera necesidad, como boquitas, dulces, aceite, papel higiénico, pastas, entre otras cosas que son D. uso domestico, este negocio nació hace 7 años.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. mercadería por mayoreo, como el arroz, azúcar, café, maíz, maicillo, huevos, estos los va a adquirir a un bajo costo, si los compra por mayor cantidad, siendo más favorable para ganar por cada venta.
Este préstamo le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, y fortalecer sus ingresos, las aspiración D. Patricia es ver a sus hijos formados académicamente, con la oportunidad D. superarse.
texts.en:
Patricia has her own house and lives with her three children, who are studying.  She runs a store where she sells convenience items such as snacks, sweets, oil, toilet paper, pasta, and other things of household use.  She started this business seven years ago.

She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise wholesale, such as rice, sugar, coffee, corn, sorghum, and eggs.  She is going to get them at a low price if she buys them wholesale, this being more favorable for making money for each sale.  This loan will help her improve the business and strengthen her income.

Patricia's goal is to see her children educated, with the opportunity to improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, coffee, corn, sorghum, and eggs.

loans.name: Oscar Armando

texts.es:
Oscar, se decidió por un nuevo préstamo porque en la inversión anterior tuvo buenos resultados, mejorando la producción de los cultivos, con la compra de insumos; por el momento también comprara abono y herbicidas para la nueva siembra, ya que él y su familia dependen de los ingresos que le genera la venta de granos básicos.
Él manifiesta que su familia no ha aumentado, pero sí el trabajo ha sido mejor, las ventas fueron más provechosas, todo al buen manejo del préstamo.
texts.en: Oscar decided to request a new loan because he had good results with the previous investment improving his crops with the purchase of farm supplies.  At present, he will again buy manure and herbicide for his new crops because he and his family depend on the income he earns from selling basic grains.  He states that his family has not grown but that work has been better, sales were more profitable thanks to the good management of the loan.

loans.use: to buy manure and herbicide.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia pertenece al banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Sonia tiene 34 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cuatro hijos, ella nació en la ciudad Salvación y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Su principal actividad económica de Sonia es la venta de comestibles y tiene una tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Sonia requiere el préstamo para comprar mercedaria como por ejemplo arroz, azúcar, fideos y otras cosas más.    

Sonia agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Sonia belongs to the “Tesoritos del Manu” communal bank and the bank’s meetings are every thirty days in the city of Salvación in Manu Province, Madre de Dios Department.

Sonia is 34 years old and in a common law relationship; she has four children.  She was born in the city of Salvación and that’s where she carries out her commercial activities.  Her main activity is foodstuffs sales in a home-based grocery store.  She’s been in this business for several years now and does very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work.

On this occasion Sonia needs the loan to buy stock merchandise like rice, sugar, noodles and other things.  Sonia is grateful for and values the loan and commits to make her monthly payments.

loans.use: to buy  more stock items for her store.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Francisco Manuel

texts.es:
Don Francisco, es un hombre que continua en el comercio de la venta y compra de chatarra, en donde estos años, le ha ido bien, al invertir mas en materiales para vender y que gracias a prestamo se le hizo posible hacer mas grande su capital, generandole mejores ganancias.
Con su credito anterior logro terminar su muro, que le da mas reguardo a su propiedad, como mejor seguridad a su familia, lo que esta contento por esta mejora y que junto a su esposa siguen trabajando en este pequeño negocio.
Con su nuevo financiamiento, invertira en la compra de alumino, bronce, hierro,cobre, acero, para, cumplir con la demanda de su negocio.
texts.en:
Francisco is a man who is continuing with his scrap metal business where he’s done well all these years; he will invest in more materials to sell.  Thanks to the loan he was able to increase his capital generating improved profits.

With his last loan he was able to finish building his wall to provide increased security for his property as well as for his family.  He is happy about this improvement since he continues working in his small business with his wife.

He will use the new loan to buy aluminum, bronze, iron, copper and steel to meet his business’ demand.

loans.use: to buy more metals.

loans.name: Yenny De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Yenny, vive con sus tres hijos, el lugar donde residen es propio, ella se dedica a la venta de pasteles y pupusas, ella tiene tres años de estar en la venta, este negocio surge por la necesidad de tener una ocupación y sobre todo un ingreso económico.
Ella esta solicitando un préstamo para la compra de ingredientes para la venta, más que todos los productos no perecederos como el maíz, aceite, sal, bolsas para empacar y condimentos, la inversión le ayudara para mantener los materiales y de esta manera aumentar la producción.
La aspiración de Yenny es fortalecer el negocio a través de los préstamos, ver por sus hijos la manera para que se superen.
texts.en:
Yenny lives with her three children.  The place they live is their own.  She works selling pastries and "pupusas" [tortillas stuffed with meat and vegetables].  She has been doing this work for three years.  The business came up because of her need to have a job and, above all, an income.

She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients to sell, more than anything else non-perishable items such as corn, oil, salt, grocery bags, and condiments.  The loan will help her maintain her supplies and so increase her production.

Yenny's goal is to strengthen her business with loans and to see a way for her children to improve themselves.

loans.use: to buy corn, oil, salt, grocery bags, and condiments.

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria pertenece al banco comunal “Tesoritos del Manu” y las reuniones de las socias del banco comunal son cada treinta días en la ciudad de Salvación provincia de Manu departamento de Madre de Dios. 

Gregoria tiene 57 años de edad y tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos, ella nació en la ciudad Puno y desde hace 40 años que vive en la ciudad de Salvación y donde desarrolla sus actividades económicas. Su principal actividad económica de Gregoria es la venta de helados de forma ambulatoria. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo.  

En esta oportunidad Gregoria requiere el préstamo para comprar insumos como por ejemplo azúcar, frutas y otras cosas más.    

Gregoria agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales.
texts.en:
Gregoria belongs to the “Tesoritos del Manu” communal bank, which meets once a month in the town of Salvación, in Manú province, in Madre de Dios department. Gregoria, 57, is in a common-law relationship, and has five children. She was born in the city of Puno, and has been living in the town of Salvación for 40 years, where she makes her living.  

Gregoria's main livelihood is selling ice cream on the street.  She has been in this business for several years now, and it's going well, thanks to the effort she puts into her work. On this occasion, Gregoria needs the loan to buy ingredients such as sugar, fruit, and other things.  

Gregoria values and appreciates the loan, and is committed to making her monthly instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy ingredients such as sugar, fruit, and other things for making ice cream.

location.town: Salvacion - Manu - Manu - Madre de Dios

loans.name: Deisy Tamara

texts.es:
Deisy, vive con su esposo y una hija, ella administra una tienda, la inicio hace tres años con la ayuda de la familia, ofrece a los clientes los productos necesarios para los quehaceres del hogar y atiende durante todo el día, pues dicho negocio está en su vivienda.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: pan, huevos, queso, boquitas, arroz, sopas instantáneas, café, azúcar, esto le ayudara para mejorar el negocio, dando un mejor servicio a los clientes.
La aspiración de Deisy es que su negocio sea más prospero, ser una cliente responsable en los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Deisy lives with her husband and daughter, and runs a store. She started it three years ago, with her family's help. She provides customers with necessary household products and she is open all day, as the business is in her house. 

She is applying for a loan in order to buy merchandise such as bread, eggs, cheese, snacks, rice, instant soups, coffee, and sugar. This loan will help her improve her business, and give better service to customers. Deisy's ambition is to have a more prosperous business, and be a responsible client in paying her instalments.

loans.use: To buy bread, eggs, cheese, snacks, rice, instant soups, coffee and sugar.

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es:
El socio es el Sr. Wilfredo; el tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; El socio sigue con sus negocios de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de restaurant junto con su esposa administran los dos negocios,el socio vende diferentes productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azucar,fideos y aceite y tambien su esposa prepara diferentes platos de comida como pollo al horno,estofado de pollo y sopas,el socio por medio de estos pequeños negocios saca adelante a sus hijos,el scoio quiere ampliar y mejorar la atencion de restaurant y rienda de abarrotes. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz,carne,pollo y verduras para el restaurant y también productos como arroz, azúcar, aceite y leche para la tienda de abarrotes.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Wilfredo, 40, lives with his partner, and has a son.  He continues to have a grocery store and restaurant. He and his wife run the two businesses. 

He sells various household necessities, such as rice, sugar, noodles, and oil. As well, his wife prepares different dishes such as baked chicken, chicken stew, and soups. He is supporting his family by means of these small businesses. He wants to expand and improve the restaurant service and the grocery store. 

He is applying for the loan in order to buy cooking ingredients for the restaurant, such as rice, meat, chicken and vegetables, as well as products for the grocery store, such as rice, sugar, cooking oil and milk.

Wilfredo is happy to receive the loan, and is committed to making his instalment payments.

loans.use: To buy cooking ingredients for the restaurant, such as rice, meat, chicken and vegetables, as well as products for the grocery store, such as rice, sugar, cooking oil and milk.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es: José, nuevamente está solicitando préstamo, ya que la necesidad de seguir invirtiendo y creciendo en el negocio, le estimulan para continuar con esta ayuda, él necesita comprar dos cerdos para la granja, pues este negocio tiene movimiento, ya que los cerdos crecen luego y se comercializan. José a reflejado un buen manejo en los prestamos, y ha mejorado la granja de cerdos.
texts.en: José is requesting a new loan.  The need to continue investing and growing in his business drive him to continue seeking help.  He needs to buy two pigs for his farm as his business is doing well as his pigs grow and then he sells them.  José has managed his loans well and has improved his pig farm.

loans.use: to buy two pigs for his farm

loans.name: Gregoria

texts.es:
Gregoria, se dedica a la venta D. productos D. primera necesidad, vive con su familia y una hija, ella administra una tienda donD. ofrece productos no perecederos que son necesarios para los hogares en el día a día.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra D. arroz, aceite, frijoles, maíz, productos enlatados, y más para surtir el negocio, mejorando así el servicio hacia los clientes y con oportunidad D. generar mayores ventas.
La aspiración D. Gregoria es que su negocio crezca, además D. que su hija tenga todo lo necesario para poderse desarrollar académicamente.
texts.en:
Gregoria sells staple foods.  She lives with her family and a daughter and she manages a store that offers non-perishable products that are everyday necessities for the home.

She is requesting a loan to buy rice, oil, beans, corn, canned goods, and more to supply her business and improve the service to her customers so that she can generate more sales.

Gregoria’s dream is that the business grows and also that her daughter has all she needs to be able to develop academically.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, beans, corn, and canned goods

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy watermelons, pineapple, bananas, papaya and plantains

loans.name: Juice Group

texts.es: Carmen, es la presidenta del grupo JUICE (“Juntos Unidos Iremos al Camino del Éxito”) el grupo está conformado por 11 miembros que a su vez son amigos y vecinos que tiene como objetivo alcanzar metas en conjunto. Entre ellos  está la presidenta Carmen D. 35 años D. edad casada y madre D. dos hijos. Carmen  es profesora D. educación y también se dedica diariamente a la venta D. productos D. belleza y a la par venta D. lencería,  gracias a las ventas D. ambos productos  ha podido generar  una economía estable en su hogar. Con el reciente préstamo piensa invertirlo en la compra D. más productos D. belleza como son cremas para la piel y lencería para la venta para la campaña naviD.ña. En el futuro le gustaría poder inaugurar  una tienda D. productos D. belleza y expandir sus ventas a diversas zonas D. la ciudad. Así como Rosa cada integrante del grupo, tiene una meta en particular, que es el éxito y la mejoría económica D. sus negocios y  la estabilidad económica para sus familias.
texts.en:
Carmen is the president of the "Juice" (Juntos Unidos Iremos al Camino del Éxito) communal bank. The group is maD. up eleven members who are both friends and neighbors, and whose aim is reaching their goals together.  Among them is Carmen, the president, who is 35, married, and the mother of two children. 

Carmen is a teacher, and also works every day selling beauty products and lingerie. Thanks to sales of both products, she has been able to generate steady income for her household. She intends to use the recent loan to buy more beauty products, such as skin creams, and lingerie to sell during the Christmas shopping season.  

In the future she would like to start a beauty products store and expand her sales to different areas of the city. As with Carmen, each member of the group has their own particular goal, which for them means success, improving their business finances, and financial stability for their families.

loans.use: To buy beauty products and lingerie to sell during the Christmas shopping season.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy corn, beans, rice, oil and instant soups.

loans.name: Susan

texts.es: Susan, de 20 años; es una joven luchadora. Vive en compañía de su mamá Yolanda, su papá Walter y su hermano José, en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Chilca. Estudia ingeniería civil en una universidad reconocida, donde paga una mensualidad. Por esa razón incursionó en el negocio de venta de productos para el hogar. Con el tiempo junto lo necesario para aperturar una ferretería simple, aún le falta mucho, pero espera que con su esfuerzo pueda convertir en un negocio reconocido y sobre todo rentable. Sus principales ventas constan de cemento, fierros, clavos de todo tamaño y agregados. Cuenta que los fines de semana es donde ella tiene mayores ingresos. Ahora desea mejorar las ganancias que percibe pues desea culminar sus estudios y comenzar nuevos proyecto, sabe que para lograrlo necesita un buen capital de dinero, que está segura de ahorra. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “IDME” y este es el séptimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Susan, de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en comprar mercadería como: fierros y cemento para su negocio.
texts.en:
Susan, aged 20, is a young woman who strives hard.  She lives with her mom Yolanda, her dad Walter, and her brother, José, in their own home located in the Chilca district.  She is studying civil engineering at a well-known university where she pays monthly fees.  For this reason, she has ventured into a business selling household products.  Over time, she has pulled together what was necessary to open a simple hardware store  She is still lacking many things, but she hopes that with her efforts, she will be able to turn her business into one that's well-known and above all profitable.  The main things she sells are cement, iron, and nails of all sizes and grades.  The weekends are when she earns most.  

She now wants to improve her earnings as she wants to finish her studies and start new projects.  She knows that to achieve this she needs some good financial capital, that will be sure to be saved. 

She belongs the "IDME" communal bank, and this is her seventh loan with MFP, so she hopes for your collaboration to be able to continue with her goals.  For her part, she promises once again to comply with her repayments.  Additionally, she likes being part of the communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive.

On receiving your support, Susan will invest the requested money in purchasing merchandise such as iron and cement for her business.

loans.use: to buy iron and cement.

loans.name: Ivett

texts.es: Ivett, de 22 año es una mujer soltera que vive en compañía de su mamá  Dora, su papá Secundino y sus hermanos a los que cuida con mucho amor en su casa propia, ubicada en el distrito de Tambo. Como mujer responsable, ella aprendió hace algún tiempo la actividad artística de “bisutería”, donde realiza aretes, collares, pulseras y demás accesorios femeninos a base de materiales reciclables. Le va muy bien en su negocio; pues constantemente realiza nuevos diseños, muy vistosos y a la moda. Acondicionó un pequeño taller en su casa, donde realiza su trabajo; ella comenta que el dinero que invierte en ello es muy poco, por lo que recibe una buena ganancia si vende en grandes cantidades. Además le agrada negociar sus pedidos, pues es hábil en las ventas; por lo que ahora desea ampliar su negocio para tener mejores ganancias. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “rompiendo fronteras” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde esta contenta, porque tendrá apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su trabajo. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación, porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias. Ivett de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de materiales como: perlas, ganchos, y demás adornos para su negocio.
texts.en:
Ivett is 22 years old.  She is a single mother who lives with her mom Dora, her dad Secundino, and her siblings, who she cares for with a lot of love in their own home which is located in Tambo district.  As a responsible woman, she learned the jewelry trade some time ago.  She learned to make earrings, bracelets and other women's accessories from recyclable materials.  Her business is going very well as she is constantly making new designs which are very attractive and fashionable.  She set up a small workshop in her home where she carries out her work.  She says that the money she invests is very little but that she makes good profits if she sells in large quantities.  She says that she enjoys negotiating her orders as she is skillful in making sales.  She would now like to expand her business in order to make better profits.

Ivett belongs to the 'Rompiendo Fronteras' (Breaking Down Borders) community bank and this is her second loan from MFP.  She is happy to have financial support.  This will make her feel safer in making progress in her work.  For her part, she pledges to make her repayments on time.  Ivett enjoys being a member of her community bank because all the members are responsible people who are very supportive of each other.  With your support, Ivett will invest the money she has requested in buying materials such as pearls, hooks and other accessories for her business.

loans.use: to buy pearls, hairpins, and other accessories

loans.name: Esperanza Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Esperanza continua en el comercio, con su pulperia y alquiler de cuartos pues es el medio de apoyar a su familia, su esposo trabajando de albañil, y de sus cinco hijos, solo dos estan a su cargo, siendo los otros tres independiente.
Con su credito anterior logro la mejora a un cuarto, lo que es de gran beneficio al poder dar un mejor servicio a sus inquilinos. Y que es atraves de los prestamo que ha venido avanzando mas rapido con sus proyectos. Que a pesar que todo esta ah altos costos, se ha equilibrado para salir adelante en la pulperia.
Hoy con este nuevo financiamiento comprara un freezer, para comprar mas productos de bebida y productos lacteos, lo que vendera mas y podra mantener al cliente sastifecho.
texts.en:
Esperanza continues in commerce with her grocery store and renting rooms since this is how she helps support her family; her husband works as a bricklayer.  Only two of her five children are still in her care, the other three are independent.

She used her previous loan to do improvements to one of the rooms which was of great benefit because she can provide better service to her tenants.  Through the loans she’s been advancing faster with her projects.  Despite costs of everything being higher she has managed to balance out and continue forward with the grocery store.

With this new loan she will buy a freezer to be able to buy more beverages and dairy products which will lead to increased sales and customer satisfaction.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Antonio tiene 27 años y vive junto a su familia en la aldea de Carrizal en el municipio de Taulabe. Su esposa Alma es ama de casa y cuida a dos niños de 7 y 4 años de edad, y un bebe de 4 meses. 

Antonio se dedica a la extracción de piedra para la elaboración de cal. Cal es normalmente utilizada en abonos, en la construcción de viviendas, y también para tratar silos de maíz. Antonio empezó el negocio hace 10 años cuando su padre le dejó el terreno donde ahora extrae la piedra.  Le motivó poner este negocio para generar más ingresos para apoyar a su familia. 

Antonio solicitó su primer crédito con un monto de L6,000 para invertir en transporte y mano de obra para ayudarle en la extracción de piedra. En el futuro, Antonio desea comprar su propio camión para transportar su producto.
texts.en:
Antonio, age 27, lives with his family in the village of Carrizal in the Taulabe municipality.  His wife, Alma, is a housewife.  She takes care of two children; ages seven and four, and a four month old baby.

Antonio’s work is extracting rocks in order to make lime powder.  Lime powder is normally used in fertilizers, in building houses, and to treat corn silos.  Antonio started this business ten years ago when his father left him the land where he now extracts the rocks.

He was motivated to establish this business in order to generate more income to support his family.

Antonio requested his first loan for the amount of 6,000 lempiras for transportation and for the labor to help him extract the rocks.

In the future Antonio wishes to buy his own truck to transport his product.

loans.use: to pay for transportation and labor.

loans.name: Collique Unido Group

texts.es:
La Sra. Delsy Elia, tiene 29 años de edad, vive en la zona de Collique en el distrito de Comas al igual que sus compañeras del grupo "Collique Unido".
La Sra. Delsy Elia se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza y ropa a pedido, inició éste negocio hace unos años primero con la venta de productos de belleza, poco a poco y visitando a sus clientes ellos no sólo pedían cosméticos o perfumes, le empezaron a pedir ropa y es así que ella piensa en ampliar su negocio e invierte un poco de capital en ropa.
gracias a su negocio ha logrado obtener su independencia económica y brindar a su familia lo necesario para viri tranquilamente.
El pr+estamo solicitado lo invertirá en la compra de juguetes para aprovechar la venta en la campaña navideña.
texts.en:
Delsy Elia, 29, lives in the Collique zone in Comas District as do the rest of her fellow members of the “Collique Unido” group.

Delsy Elia sells beauty products and clothes on order.  She started this business a few years ago first selling the beauty products.  Gradually her customers started asking her not only for cosmetics or perfume but also clothes and that’s why she intends to expand the business and invest some capital in clothes.

Thanks to her business she’s become independent economically and is able to provide her family everything necessary to live in peace.

She will use the requested loan to buy toys to take advantage of the Christmas season.

loans.use: to buy toys.

loans.name: Ludmila

texts.en:
Ludmila is a widow with one son. She lives in Zaporozhye city and sells men's and women's shoes. Ludmila has been in this business for 11 years. She is a hard-working person and a good entrepreneur.

Ludmila sells her inventories  at two markets different markets. She takes her inventory to a small city and sells there during the week. Then she goes back a market in Zaporozhye city and work there during the weekend. 

Ludmila would like a loan of 5,000 Gryvnas to purchase winter inventory. She can purchase it with a good discount and make more profit. This will help her to raise her son, since her business is the only source of income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase winter inventory.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en: Valentina is widowed. She has a retail business selling men's clothing at the Yulana market in Pavlograd town. She has been in this business for 3 years  only. Valentina has plans to develop her business and sell shoes along with clothing. She offers great client service and attracts clients with her prices and the good location of her kiosk. Valentina would like to borrow 6,000 Ukrainian grivna to purchase men's sweaters.

loans.use: to purchase men's sweaters.

loans.name: Vladimir

texts.ru:
Владимир женат.  У него и жены Галины две взрослые дочери.

Владимир занимается фермерством. Он выращивает пшеницу, ячмень и подсолнух. Владимир трудолюбивый и ответственный. Интересный факт, то, что он ветеран афганской войны. Владимир член совета ветеранов-афганцев. И он ставит для себя социальные цели. Например, помочь ветеранам-афганцам, инвалидам-афганцам. 

Владимир просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 15000 гривен на ремонт дома. Он хотел бы отремонтировать половину с дома и сделать отдельный вход для дочери.
texts.en: Vladimir is married.  He and his wife Galina have two adult daughters.  Vladimir is involved in a farming business and grows wheat, barley and sunflowers.  He is a hardworking and responsible person.  An interesting fact about him is that he is a veteran of the Afghan war and is a member of the Afghan-war veterans union.  Thus, he sets socially responsible goals for himself, such as to help Afghan-war veterans and disabled Afghan-war veterans.  Vladimir is requesting a loan in the sum of 15,000 hryvnia to make repairs to his house.  He wants to repair half of the house and build a separate entrance for his daughter.

loans.use: to make repairs to his house

loans.name: Ruth Elizabeth

texts.es:
Ruth de 22 años, es una persona muy trabajadora que ha podido salir a delante con la ayuda de Dios.
Su negocio es la  venta de ropa en la cual tiene muchas aspiraciones de crecimiento de su negocio.
El trabajo lo realiza sola, lo inicia todas las mañanas hasta las noches que retorna a su vivienda.
La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia y de no tener mucha mercadería, ya que ella no cuenta con lo suficiente.
Ella solicita este préstamo para invertir en el negocio, ya que se acerca la mayor venta del año que es en el mes de diciembre.
Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda y que su negocio pueda aumentar económicamente.
texts.en:
Ruth, 22, is a very hardworking person who has known how to get ahead with God’s help.  Her business is clothing sales and she has hopes that the business will grow.  She works alone starting early in the morning and continuing into the evening when she returns home.

The difficulty she has is delinquency and not having very much merchandise because she lacks sufficient funds.  She’s asking for this loan to invest in the business since the year’s best selling season, December, is approaching.  Her dream is to finish building her house and that her business will grow economically.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gloria, solicita un nuevo préstamo, por la necesidad de aumentar la mercadería en el negocio, este nuevo financiamiento lo invertirá en faldas, pantalones, shorts, ropa para niños y ropa interior, estos préstamos le fortalecen el negocio, dándole una mejor vistosidad ante los clientes, ya que ofrece nuevos productos para vestir.
Gloria esta contenta y agradece por habersele aprobado este prestamo, ya que para hacer el pago del prestamo anterior tuvo un atraso.
texts.en: Gloria is asking for a new loan because she needs to increase the amount of merchandise she has in stock.  She will use this new loan to buy skirts, pants, shorts, children’s clothes and underwear.  These loans strengthen her business giving her more visibility among customers because she has new items of clothing on display.  Gloria is happy and grateful that the loan was approved because she was late with one of her previous loan’s payments.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Jose Balmore

texts.es: José, se decidió por una nueva solicitud, debido a la necesidad de aumentar el inventario de ropa, pues tiene planeado comprar blusas, faldas, ropa de niño y ropa interior, con la intención de mejorar la atención a los clientes, estos préstamos le han permitido a José un incremento en las ventas, ya que la disponibilidad de mercadería le ayuda para con los clientes.
texts.en: José decided to request a new loan because he needs to increase his stock of clothing; he plans to buy blouses, skirts, children’s clothes and underwear hoping to improve customer preference.  The loans have helped José increase sales because it’s helpful to have merchandise available for customers.

loans.use: to buy clothing.

loans.name: Neptali

texts.es:
el sr. Neptalí tiene 27 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha procreado 2 hijos, su actividad principal es la caficultura, tiene 6 años de experiencia en el manejo y cultivo del cafe, esta actividad es la fuente de ingresos para el sustento de su familia.
 Neptalí utilizara el credito para la compra de un sistema solar, es lo que ha anhelado en toda su vida,  nunca ha gozado de este servicio tan básico.
Neptali no desea que sus hijos crezcan inhalando el humo de los candiles, que es muy dañino para la salud.
texts.en:
Neptalí, 27, lives in a common law relationship and has two children.  His main activity is growing coffee; he has six years’ experience farming coffee.  This activity is his family’s source of income.

Neptalí will use the loan to buy a solar generator; it’s something he’s wanted his entire life having never enjoyed this most basic of services.  He does not want his children to grow up inhaling candle smoke that’s very damaging to health.

loans.use: to buy a solar generator.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es: María, solicita el préstamo para la compra de productos para la tienda como aceite, gaseosas, jugos, refrescos, dulces, churros, estos productos le ayudan para atender la demanda de los clientes. El préstamo anterior se noto bastante que el inventario de María aumento, cambiando la manera de atender a los clientes, y el movimiento en las ventas fue mayor.
texts.en: María is asking for a loan to buy stock merchandise for the store like oil, soft-drinks, juice, refreshments, candy and snacks which will help her meet customer demand.  It was quite noticeable that María’s stock inventory increased with the previous loan and sales were better.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Jose Cresencio

texts.es:
el sr. Jose Crecencio tiene 50 años de edad, esta casado y padre de 3 hijos, Jose se dedica a la caficultura desde hace varios años, gracias a su negocio recibe ganancias las cuales las necesita para el sustento de su familia. 
Don José utilizara el credito para comprar su propio sistema solar y poder iluminarse por las noches y no es dañina como los candiles, en zona donde él vive no se cuenta con el servicio de energía eléctrica y por las noches toda su vida les ha tocado alumbrase con candiles o rajas de ocote. esto mejorara la calidad de vida de su familia. nos comento que se siente muy feliz ya que esto es un paso grande para la comunidad donde el reside.
texts.en:
José Crecencio, 50, is married and the father of three children.  José has been a coffee grower for several years.  Thanks to this business he earns profits needed to support his family.

José will use the loan to buy his own solar generator so that he can have light at night that’s not damaging like candle light.  The zone where he lives does not have electric services and at night they have to use candles or pitch pine for illumination.  This will improve his family’s quality of life.  He told us that he feels very happy because this is a big step for the community he lives in.

loans.use: to buy a solar generator.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy hair coloring, nail polish, lipstick and make-up.

loans.name: Bessy Carolina

texts.es:
Bessy, vive con sus hijos y su familia, se dedica a atender una granja de pollos y una tienda de productos de primera necesidad, este negocio es propio, inicio hace tres años, por la necesidad de generar ingresos para su familia.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de 20 quintales de concentrado y 1000 pollos de engorde pequeños,  la compra le permitirá abastecer la granja, iniciar un nuevo crecimiento de pollos para que dentro de algunos meses inicie la venta.
La aspiración de Bessy es convertirse en una microempresaria de éxito, sacar a delante a sus hijos, con puro esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Bessy lives with her children and her family.  She runs a chicken farm and a grocery store.  The business is hers and she started it three years ago needing to generate family income.  

She’s asking for a loan to buy 20 quintals of feed concentrate and 1000 chicks to raise.  The purchase will allow her to equip the farm and start a new chick growing period so that they can be sold in a few months. 

Bessy’s hope is to become a successful micro businesswoman and to raise her children through just with her efforts.

loans.use: to buy 20 quintals of feed concentrate and 1000 chicks to raise.

loans.name: Oscar Ivan

texts.es:
el sr. Oscar S. tiene 33 años de edad, vive en unión libre y ha procreado 2 hijos, su actividad principal es la caficultura, tiene 5 años de experiencia, y esta es la fuente de mayor ingreso para el sustento de su familia.- don Oscar utilizara el credito para la compra de un Sistema Solar, ya que en su comunidad no cuentan con el servicio de energía Eléctrica y toda su vida se han alumbrado con candiles y candelas. sabemos que esta manera de alumbrase son dañinos para el medio ambiente y la salud misma.
asi mismo podra tener entretenimiento para su familia y podra comprarse un telefono movil para comunicarse con sus familiares ya que no lo compraba porque no tenia en donde cargar la pila.
texts.en:
Mr. Oscar S. is 33. He is in a common-law marriage and has two children. His main source of income for supporting his family is coffee growing, and he has five years' experience doing so. Oscar will use this loan to purchase a solar-powered generator, since his community does not have electricity. All his life, they have lit their home with oil lamps and candles. We know that this is harmful for the environment and for personal health.
Oscar will now also be able to provide entertainment for his family and buy himself a cell phone to communicate with other family members; he hasn't bought one until now because he had no way to charge the battery.

loans.use: compra de planta solar.

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo, esto porque necesita comprar mercadería para surtir el negocio, la compra será en stiker, pulseras, juguetes, collares, para los jóvenes. José ha logrado a través de los préstamos, mejorar su negocio y satisfacer la demanda de los clientes.
Hasta el momento no tiene ningún inconveniente en cuanto al manejo de los préstamos, espera que de igual manera este nuevo préstamo le sirva para mejorar.
texts.en:
José has decided to request a new loan because he needs to buy merchandise with which to stock his business.  He will buy stickers, bracelets, games and necklaces for young people.  Through loans, José has managed to improve his business and satisfy his customers' needs.

Up to now, José has not experienced any problems in managing his loans.  He hopes that this new loan will also help him to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise (stickers, bracelets, games, necklaces)

loans.name: Esperanza Para El Futuro Group

texts.es: Elizabeth es integrante de la Alcancía Comunal “Esperanza para el futuro” grupo conformado por 08 personas entre hombres y mujeres responsables y trabajadores. Elizabeth tiene 19 años de edad es soltera y actualmente vive con sus padres, ella se dedica a la compra y venta de productos como queques, alfajores, turrones, panes entre otros, la cual lleva trabajando de esta manera hace mas 01 año, gracias a este negocio a podido aportar con sus estudios ya que nos comenta que está en la universidad siguiendo la carrera de Administración y Negocios Internacionales. Elizabeth es una joven empeñosa que su mayor deseo es  de terminar satisfactoriamente su carrera y sabemos que con mucho esfuerzo lo va a conseguir.  Con el crédito que solicito va a invertir en su negocio comprando productos como alfajores, turrones, piononos y  queques y  así poder ofrecer a sus clientes. La Alcancía Comunal “Esperanza para el Futuro” agradece el crédito  brindado.
texts.en: Elizabeth is part of the Communal Bank "Hope for the future," made of up 8 people, both men and women, who are all responsible and hard-working. Elizabeth is 19 years old and is single.  She currently lives with her parents and she works buying and selling products like cakes, candies, nougats, and assorted breads.  She has been working in this area for more than one year.  Thanks to this business she has been able to pay for her schooling, since she has told us that she is in the University pursing a degree in International Business.  Elizabeth is a young hard-working woman, and her greatest desire is to finish her career, and we know that with much effort she will be able to accomplish that.  With the loan that she is requesting she will invest in her business buying products such as candies, nougats, speciality breads, cream puffs, and cakes and thus be able to offer them to her clients.  The communal bank "Hope for the Future" is thankful for the loan offered.

loans.use: to buy products such as candies, nougats, speciality breads, cream puffs, and cakes.

loans.name: Ana Betty

texts.es:
Ana, necesita nuevamente un préstamo, porque quiere comprar productos para el negocio, como bolsos, cinchos, repuestos para bicicletas, esta compra fortalecerá el negocio y así como en el anterior, vera un aumento en las ganancias, mejorando su actividad comercial.
La familia de Ana continúan siendo los mismos, no han aumentado y gracias a Dios todos siguen con salud, solamente apoyándola en el negocio.
texts.en: Ana needs a loan again because she wants to buy products for her business like purses, belts and bicycle spare parts.  This purchase will strengthen the business like the last one did and she’ll see an increase in profits improving her commercial activity.  Ana’s family continues unchanged, they haven’t increased and thanks be to God continue in good health just helping her with the business.

loans.use: to buy purses, belts and bicycle spare parts.

loans.name: Gloria Esperanza

texts.es:
Gloria, vive con su familia, conformada por su esposo y un hijo, ella administra una tienda en la que ofrece D. toda clase D. productos necesarios en un hogar, la idea fue D. ella, para ayudar a su familia, lo atienD. D. 6:00am a 8:00pm.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la inversión en el negocio, comprara mercadería como jabón, detergentes para lavar ropa, trastos, papel higiénico, la inversión le ayudara para crecer y poder atender la demanda D. los clientes.
Su objetivo es llegar a tener el negocio fuerte, que atienD. a todos los clientes D. la zona, convirtiéndolo en un minisúper.
texts.en:
